            </XMath>
          </Math>.
With
<Math mode="inline" tex="d:\Omega_{k,m}\to{\mathbb{N}}^{k}" text="d colon Omega _ (list@(k, m)) to N ^ k" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m8.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m8.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m8.1">k</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m8.2">m</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> defined by <Math mode="inline" tex="d((p,q))=q-p" text="d * open-interval@(p, q) = q - p" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m9.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m9.3">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m9.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m9.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m9.1">p</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m9.2">q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the pair <Math mode="inline" tex="(\Omega_{k,m},d)" text="open-interval@(Omega _ (list@(k, m)), d)" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m10.4"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m10.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m10.4">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m10.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m10.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m10.1">k</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m10.2">m</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m10.3">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
is a <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graph.
We write <Math mode="inline" tex="\Omega_{k}" text="Omega _ k" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> when <Math mode="inline" tex="m" text="m" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is infinite in every coordinate.</p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S2.p4">
      <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S2.p4.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be a <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S2.p4.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graph.
Then <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S2.p4.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">row-finite</text> if <Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda^{n}" text="v * Lambda ^ n" xml:id="S2.p4.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is finite for every <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S2.p4.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{N}}^{k}" text="n element-of N ^ k" xml:id="S2.p4.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
A vertex <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S2.p4.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">source</text> if there exists <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{N}}^{k}" text="n element-of N ^ k" xml:id="S2.p4.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda^{n}=\emptyset" text="v * Lambda ^ n = empty-set" xml:id="S2.p4.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
that is, <Math mode="inline" tex="v" text="v" xml:id="S2.p4.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> receives no paths of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S2.p4.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. We say <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S2.p4.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">locally convex</text> if for every <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S2.p4.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="1\leq i,j\leq k" text="formulae@(1 less= i, j less= k)" xml:id="S2.p4.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p4.m14.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p4.m14.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S2.p4.m14.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S2.p4.m14.2">
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="i\neq j" text="i not-equals j" xml:id="S2.p4.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\in v\Lambda^{e_{i}}" text="lambda element-of v * Lambda ^ (e _ i)" xml:id="S2.p4.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu\in v\Lambda^{e_{j}}" text="mu element-of v * Lambda ^ (e _ j)" xml:id="S2.p4.m17">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, the sets
<Math mode="inline" tex="s(\lambda)\Lambda^{e_{j}}" text="s * lambda * Lambda ^ (e _ j)" xml:id="S2.p4.m18">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p4.m18.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p4.m18.1">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\mu)\Lambda^{e_{i}}" text="s * mu * Lambda ^ (e _ i)" xml:id="S2.p4.m19">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p4.m19.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p4.m19.1">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> are nonempty <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RSY03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Definition 3.10]</cite>.
Thus if <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S2.p4.m20">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> has no sources, then <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S2.p4.m21">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is locally convex. In this paper we only consider locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S2.p4.m22">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graphs.</p>
    </para>
    <subsection xml:id="S2.SSx1">
      <title>Paths, infinite paths and boundary paths</title>
      <para xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1">
        <p>The Cuntz-Krieger relation (KP4) for <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graphs without sources (see Section <ref labelref="LABEL:sec-family"/>) involves the
<!--  %**** String Line 150 **** -->sets <Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda^{n}" text="v * Lambda ^ n" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of paths of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with
range <Math mode="inline" tex="v" text="v" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. When <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has sources, <Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda^{n}" text="v * Lambda ^ n" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> could be empty. The technical innovation in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RSY03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>
is to introduce the set <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> consisting of paths <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda" text="lambda" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)\leq n" text="d * lambda less= n" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p1.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m9.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> which cannot be extended to paths <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\mu" text="lambda * mu" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)&lt;d(\lambda\mu)\leq n" text="d * lambda less d * lambda * mu less= n" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p1.m11.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m11.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p1.m11.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m11.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus</p>
        <equation xml:id="S2.Ex6">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\Lambda^{\leq n}:=\{\lambda\in\Lambda:d(\lambda)\leq n,\text{\ and\ }d(\lambda%&#10;)_{i}&lt;n_{i}\text{\ implies\ }s(\lambda)\Lambda^{e_{i}}=\emptyset\}," text="Lambda ^ (absent less= n) assign conditional-set@(lambda element-of Lambda, formulae@(d * lambda less= n, [ and ] * d * lambda _ i less n _ i * [ implies ] * s * lambda * Lambda ^ (e _ i) = empty-set))" xml:id="S2.Ex6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.Ex6.m1.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex6.m1.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>

                              <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>

                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>

                              </XMApp>

                                <XMApp>

                                </XMApp>
                                <XMText> implies </XMText>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S2.Ex6.m1.3"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex6.m1.3">λ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                            </XMApp>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and then <Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda^{\leq n}:=v\Lambda\cap\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="v * Lambda ^ (absent less= n) assign v * Lambda intersection Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
is always nonempty.
For example, if <Math mode="inline" tex="n=e_{i}" text="n = e _ i" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="1\leq i\leq k" text="1 less= i less= k" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p1.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then</p>
        <equation xml:id="S2.Ex7">
          <Math mode="display" tex="v\Lambda^{\leq e_{i}}=\begin{cases}v\Lambda^{e_{i}}&amp;\text{ if }v\Lambda^{e_{i}%&#10;}\neq\emptyset;\\&#10;\{v\}&amp;\text{ otherwise.}\end{cases}" text="v * Lambda ^ (absent less= e _ i) = cases@(v * Lambda ^ (e _ i), [ if ] * v * Lambda ^ (e _ i) not-equals empty-set, set@(v), [ otherwise.])" xml:id="S2.Ex7.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    <XMArray>
                      <XMRow>
                        <XMCell align="left">
                          <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex7.m1.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post7"/>

                                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMText> if </XMText>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post7"/>
                                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMCell>

                          <XMDual xml:id="S2.Ex7.m1.3">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="set"/>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMCell>
                        <XMCell align="left">
                          <XMText xml:id="S2.Ex7.m1.4"> otherwise.</XMText>
                        </XMCell>
                      </XMRow>
                    </XMArray>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S2.SSx1.p2">
        <p>A <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graph morphism is a degree-preserving functor. An <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">infinite path</text> in a <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p2.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graph <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p2.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p2.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graph morphism <Math mode="inline" tex="x:\Omega_{k}\to\Lambda" text="x colon Omega _ k to Lambda" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p2.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
In a graph with sources, not every finite path is contained in an infinite path, and
another technical innovation of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RSY03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> is to replace the space <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{\infty}" text="Lambda ^ infinity" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p2.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
of infinite paths with a space of so-called boundary paths.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graph and <Math mode="inline" tex="m\in({\mathbb{N}}\cup\{\infty\})^{k}" text="m element-of (N union set@(infinity)) ^ k" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m3.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m3.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m3.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m3.1">∞</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. In Definition 3.14 of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RSY03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, a graph morphism
<Math mode="inline" tex="x:\Omega_{k,m}\to\Lambda" text="x colon Omega _ (list@(k, m)) to Lambda" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m4.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m4.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m4.1">k</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m4.2">m</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is defined to be a <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">boundary path</text> of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="m" text="m" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
if</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:boundarypath" xml:id="S2.E1">
          <tags>
            <tag>(2.1)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">2.1</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="v\in\Omega_{k,m}^{0}\text{ and }v\Omega_{k,m}^{\leq e_{i}}=\{v\}\text{ imply }%&#10;x(v)\Lambda^{\leq e_{i}}=\{x(v)\}." text="v element-of (Omega _ (list@(k, m))) ^ 0 * [ and ] * v * (Omega _ (list@(k, m))) ^ (absent less= e _ i) = set@(v) * [ imply ] * x * v * Lambda ^ (absent less= e _ i) = set@(x * v)" xml:id="S2.E1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.E1.m1.8"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.E1.m1.8">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.E1.m1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.E1.m1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E1.m1.1">k</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E1.m1.2">m</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMText> and </XMText>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.E1.m1.3"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.E1.m1.4"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E1.m1.3">k</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E1.m1.4">m</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S2.E1.m1.5"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E1.m1.5">v</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMText> imply </XMText>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.E1.m1.6"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E1.m1.6">v</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.E1.m1.8.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.E1.m1.8.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E1.m1.7"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E1.m1.7">v</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Thus a boundary path maps sources to sources, and every infinite path is a boundary path. We denote the set of boundary paths by <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has no sources, then <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{\leq\infty}=\Lambda^{\infty}" text="Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity) = Lambda ^ infinity" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Since we identify the object <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in\Omega_{k,m}" text="n element-of Omega _ (list@(k, m))" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m9.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m9.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m9.1">k</XMTok>

                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m9.2">m</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with the identity morphism <Math mode="inline" tex="(n,n)" text="open-interval@(n, n)" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                  <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m10.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m10.1">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m10.2">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> at <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we write <Math mode="inline" tex="x(n)" text="x * n" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m12.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for the vertex <Math mode="inline" tex="x(n,n)" text="x * open-interval@(n, n)" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                  <XMWrap>

                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m13.2">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then the range of a boundary path <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the vertex <Math mode="inline" tex="r(x):=x(0)" text="r * x assign x * 0" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m15.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m15.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m15.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m15.2">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We set <Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda^{\leq\infty}:=\Lambda^{\leq\infty}\cap r^{-1}(v)" text="v * Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity) assign Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity) intersection r ^ (- 1) * v" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>

                </XMApp>

                    <XMApp>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m16.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m16.1">v</XMTok>

                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda^{\infty}:=\Lambda^{\infty}\cap r^{-1}(v)" text="v * Lambda ^ infinity assign Lambda ^ infinity intersection r ^ (- 1) * v" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
