                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m17.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m17.1">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. A boundary path <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is completely determined by the set of paths <Math mode="inline" tex="\{x(0,n):n\leq d(x)\}" text="conditional-set@(x * open-interval@(0, n), n less= d * x)" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m19.4"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m19.5"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m19.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m19.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m19.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m19.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m19.2">n</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m19.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m19.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m19.3">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, hence can be composed with finite paths, and there is a converse factorisation property. We denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma" text="sigma" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the partially-defined shift map on <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> which
is defined by <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma^{m}(x)=x(m,\infty)" text="sigma ^ m * x = x * open-interval@(m, infinity)" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m22.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m22.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m22.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m22.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m22.2">m</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m22.3">∞</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="x element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> when <Math mode="inline" tex="m\leq d(x)" text="m less= d * x" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m24">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.SSx1.p3.m24.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.SSx1.p3.m24.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
  </section>
  <section inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:KPwithoutsources LABEL:Lambdamin LABEL:oldKPrelations LABEL:page5 LABEL:sec-family" xml:id="S3">
    <tags>
      <tag>3</tag>
      <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
      <tag role="typerefnum">§3</tag>
    </tags>
    <title><tag close=". ">3</tag>Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
        </XMath>
      </Math>-families</title>
    <toctitle><tag close=" ">3</tag>Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.m2">
        <XMath>
          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
        </XMath>
      </Math>-families</toctitle>
    <para xml:id="S3.p1">
      <p>Throughout this section, <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S3.p1.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graph
and <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.p1.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a commutative ring with <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S3.p1.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
Define <Math mode="inline" tex="G(\Lambda):=\{\lambda^{*}:\lambda\in\Lambda\}" text="G * Lambda assign conditional-set@(lambda ^ *, lambda element-of Lambda)" xml:id="S3.p1.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m5.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m5.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m5.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m5.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p1.m5.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p1.m5.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and call each
<Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda^{*}" text="lambda ^ *" xml:id="S3.p1.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> a <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">ghost path</text>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S3.p1.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, then we identify <Math mode="inline" tex="v" text="v" xml:id="S3.p1.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="v^{*}" text="v ^ *" xml:id="S3.p1.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
We extend the degree functor <Math mode="inline" tex="d" text="d" xml:id="S3.p1.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and the range and source maps <Math mode="inline" tex="r" text="r" xml:id="S3.p1.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="s" text="s" xml:id="S3.p1.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> to <Math mode="inline" tex="G(\Lambda)" text="G * Lambda" xml:id="S3.p1.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m13.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m13.1">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> by</p>
      <equation xml:id="S3.Ex1">
        <Math mode="display" tex="d(\lambda^{*})=-d(\lambda),\quad r(\lambda^{*})=s(\lambda)\quad\text{ and }%&#10;\quad s(\lambda^{*})=r(\lambda)." text="formulae@(d * lambda ^ * = - d * lambda, formulae@(r * lambda ^ * = list@(s * lambda, [ and ]), s * lambda ^ * = r * lambda))" xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.5"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMDual xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.5">
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.5.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.5.1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.5.1.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.5.2">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.5.2.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.5.2.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.5.2.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.5.2.1.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.5.2.1.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.5.2.1.2"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.4"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.5.2.1.2">
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.2"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.2">λ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                              <XMText xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.4"> and </XMText>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.5.2.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.5.2.2.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.5.2.2.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex1.m1.3"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1.3">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>We extend the factorisation property to the ghost paths by setting <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mu\lambda)^{*}=\lambda^{*}\mu^{*}" text="(mu * lambda) ^ * = lambda ^ * * mu ^ *" xml:id="S3.p1.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m14.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p1.m14.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. We denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="G(\Lambda^{\neq 0})" text="G * Lambda ^ (absent not-equals 0)" xml:id="S3.p1.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m15.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p1.m15.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> the set of ghost paths that are not vertices.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S3.p2">
      <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be a row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S3.p2.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graph without sources. Recall from <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Definition 3.1]</cite> that a
<text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p2.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family <Math mode="inline" tex="(P,S)" text="open-interval@(P, S)" xml:id="S3.p2.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m4.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m4.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p2.m4.1">P</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p2.m4.2">S</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> 
in an <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.p2.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p2.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math></text> consists of two functions <Math mode="inline" tex="P:\Lambda^{0}\to A" text="P colon Lambda ^ 0 to A" xml:id="S3.p2.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="S:\Lambda^{\not=0}\cup G(\Lambda^{\not=0})\to A" text="S colon Lambda ^ (absent not-equals 0) union G * Lambda ^ (absent not-equals 0) to A" xml:id="S3.p2.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="not-equals" name="not-=" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m8.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.p2.m8.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="not-equals" name="not-=" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> such that</p>
      <enumerate xml:id="S3.I1">
        <item xml:id="S3.I1.ix1">
          <tags>
            <tag>(KP1)</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">item (KP1)</tag>
          </tags>
          <para xml:id="S3.I1.ix1.p1">
            <p><Math mode="inline" tex="\{P_{v}:v\in\Lambda^{0}\}" text="conditional-set@(P _ v, v element-of Lambda ^ 0)" xml:id="S3.I1.ix1.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.I1.ix1.p1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.I1.ix1.p1.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.I1.ix1.p1.m1.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.I1.ix1.p1.m1.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is an orthogonal set of idempotents in the sense
that <Math mode="inline" tex="P_{v}P_{w}=\delta_{v,w}P_{v}" text="P _ v * P _ w = delta _ (list@(v, w)) * P _ v" xml:id="S3.I1.ix1.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.I1.ix1.p1.m2.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.I1.ix1.p1.m2.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I1.ix1.p1.m2.1">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I1.ix1.p1.m2.2">w</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>,</p>
          </para>
        </item>
        <item xml:id="S3.I1.ix2">
          <tags>
            <tag>(KP2)</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">item (KP2)</tag>
          </tags>
          <para xml:id="S3.I1.ix2.p1">
            <p>for all <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda^{\neq 0}" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda ^ (absent not-equals 0)" xml:id="S3.I1.ix2.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.I1.ix2.p1.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.I1.ix2.p1.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I1.ix2.p1.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I1.ix2.p1.m1.2">μ</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\mu)=s(\lambda)" text="r * mu = s * lambda" xml:id="S3.I1.ix2.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.I1.ix2.p1.m2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I1.ix2.p1.m2.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.I1.ix2.p1.m2.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I1.ix2.p1.m2.2">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, we have</p>
            <equation xml:id="S3.Ex2">
              <Math mode="display" tex="S_{\lambda}S_{\mu}=S_{\lambda\mu},\;S_{\mu^{*}}S_{\lambda^{*}}=S_{(\lambda\mu)%&#10;^{*}},\;P_{r(\lambda)}S_{\lambda}=S_{\lambda}=S_{\lambda}P_{s(\lambda)},\;P_{s%&#10;(\lambda)}S_{\lambda^{*}}=S_{\lambda^{*}}=S_{\lambda^{*}}P_{r(\lambda)}," text="formulae@(formulae@(S _ lambda * S _ mu = S _ (lambda * mu), formulae@(S _ (mu ^ *) * S _ (lambda ^ *) = S _ ((lambda * mu) ^ *), P _ (r * lambda) * S _ lambda = S _ lambda = S _ lambda * P _ (s * lambda))), P _ (s * lambda) * S _ (lambda ^ *) = S _ (lambda ^ *) = S _ (lambda ^ *) * P _ (r * lambda))" xml:id="S3.Ex2.m1">

        <item xml:id="S3.I1.ix3">
          <tags>
            <tag>(KP3)</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">item (KP3)</tag>
          </tags>
          <para xml:id="S3.I1.ix3.p1">
            <p>for all <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda^{\neq 0}" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda ^ (absent not-equals 0)" xml:id="S3.I1.ix3.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.I1.ix3.p1.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.I1.ix3.p1.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I1.ix3.p1.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I1.ix3.p1.m1.2">μ</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)=d(\mu)" text="d * lambda = d * mu" xml:id="S3.I1.ix3.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.I1.ix3.p1.m2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I1.ix3.p1.m2.1">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.I1.ix3.p1.m2.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I1.ix3.p1.m2.2">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, we have</p>
            <equation xml:id="S3.Ex3">
              <Math mode="display" tex="S_{\lambda^{*}}S_{\mu}=\delta_{\lambda,\mu}P_{s(\lambda)}," text="S _ (lambda ^ *) * S _ mu = delta _ (list@(lambda, mu)) * P _ (s * lambda)" xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex3.m1.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1.4">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex3.m1.1"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex3.m1.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1.2">μ</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex3.m1.3"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex3.m1.3">λ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
            </equation>
          </para>
        </item>
        <item xml:id="S3.I1.ix4">
          <tags>
            <tag>(KP4)</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">item (KP4)</tag>
          </tags>
          <para xml:id="S3.I1.ix4.p1">
            <p>for all <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S3.I1.ix4.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and all <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{N}}^{k}\setminus\{0\}" text="n element-of N ^ k set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S3.I1.ix4.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.I1.ix4.p1.m2.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.I1.ix4.p1.m2.1">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, we have</p>
            <equation xml:id="S3.Ex4">
              <Math mode="display" tex="P_{v}=\sum_{\lambda\in v\Lambda^{n}}S_{\lambda}S_{\lambda^{*}}." text="P _ v = (sum _ (lambda element-of v * Lambda ^ n))@(S _ lambda * S _ (lambda ^ *))" xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
            </equation>
          </para>
        </item>
      </enumerate>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S3.p3">
      <p>The sum in (KP4) is finite because <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p3.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is row-finite.
The relations (KP1)–(KP4) were obtained in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, §3]</cite> by adding to the usual
Cuntz-Krieger relations from <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="KumPas00" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>. A Cuntz-Krieger <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p3.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-family <Math mode="inline" tex="(P,S)" text="open-interval@(P, S)" xml:id="S3.p3.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m3.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m3.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m3.1">P</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m3.2">S</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
in the algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="B(H)" text="B * H" xml:id="S3.p3.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m4.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m4.1">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of linear bounded operators on a Hilbert space <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S3.p3.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> consists of an
orthogonal set <Math mode="inline" tex="\{P_{v}\}" text="set@(P _ v)" xml:id="S3.p3.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m6.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m6.1">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of projections and a set <Math mode="inline" tex="\{S_{\lambda}\}" text="set@(S _ lambda)" xml:id="S3.p3.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m7.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m7.1">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of partial isometries
<Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\lambda}" text="S _ lambda" xml:id="S3.p3.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with initial projection <Math mode="inline" tex="P_{s(\lambda)}" text="P _ (s * lambda)" xml:id="S3.p3.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m9.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m9.1">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, satisfying weaker versions of (KP1)–(KP4).
The geometric structure of <Math mode="inline" tex="B(H)" text="B * H" xml:id="S3.p3.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m10.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m10.1">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is rich enough to yield (KP1)–(KP4) as given above, where
<Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\lambda^{*}}" text="S _ (lambda ^ *)" xml:id="S3.p3.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is the Hilbert space adjoint of <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\lambda}" text="S _ lambda" xml:id="S3.p3.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. For example, the Cuntz-Krieger relation
corresponding to
(KP2) is just <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\lambda}S_{\mu}=S_{\lambda\mu}" text="S _ lambda * S _ mu = S _ (lambda * mu)" xml:id="S3.p3.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>; the rest of (KP2) comes for free.
See §3 of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> for more detail. 
<!--  %**** String Line 225 **** --></p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S3.p4">
      <p>An important consequence of the Kumjian-Pask relations is that the algebra generated by a
Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p4.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-family <Math mode="inline" tex="(P,S)" text="open-interval@(P, S)" xml:id="S3.p4.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m2.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m2.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p4.m2.1">P</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p4.m2.2">S</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}_{R}\{S_{\lambda}S_{\mu^{*}}:\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda\}" text="(span _ R)@(S _ lambda * S _ (mu ^ *) colon list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda)" xml:id="S3.p4.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m3.3"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m3.4"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p4.m3.3">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">span</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p4.m3.4">
                    <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m3.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m3.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p4.m3.1">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p4.m3.2">μ</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
where we use the convention that <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{v}:=P_{v}" text="S _ v assign P _ v" xml:id="S3.p4.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{v^{*}}:=P_{v}" text="S _ (v ^ *) assign P _ v" xml:id="S3.p4.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S3.p4.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. When <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p4.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
has no sources, this follows from <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 3.3]</cite>, which says that if <Math mode="inline" tex="n\geq d(\lambda),d(\mu)" text="n &gt;= list@(d * lambda, d * mu)" xml:id="S3.p4.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m8.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m8.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p4.m8.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m8.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p4.m8.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p4.m8.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m8.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p4.m8.2">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, then</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq-span" xml:id="S3.E1">
        <tags>
          <tag>(3.1)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">3.1</tag>
        </tags>
        <Math mode="display" tex="S_{\lambda^{*}}S_{\mu}=\sum_{d(\lambda\alpha)=n,\;\lambda\alpha=\mu\beta}S_{%&#10;\alpha}S_{\beta^{*}}." text="S _ (lambda ^ *) * S _ mu = (sum _ (formulae@(d * lambda * alpha = n, lambda * alpha = mu * beta)))@(S _ alpha * S _ (beta ^ *))" xml:id="S3.E1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S3.E1.m1.3"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.E1.m1.3">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.E1.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.E1.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.E1.m1.1">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.E1.m1.1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.E1.m1.1.1">
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
