                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="2.8pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.E1.m1.2">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>Definition <ref labelref="LABEL:KPsources"/> below gives a notion of Kumjian-Pask family which applies to <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S3.p4.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graphs
<Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p4.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with sources. It is based on the approach by Raeburn, Sims and Yeend in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RSY03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> for
Cuntz-Krieger <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p4.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-families. The purpose of the new relations (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.p4.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="2">
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>) and (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.p4.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="2">
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>) is to ensure
that we obtain a version of (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq-span"/>).</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_defn" inlist="thm theorem:defn" labels="LABEL:KPsources" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Definition 3.1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3.1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Definition 3.1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Definition 3.1</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graph (possibly with sources).
A Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family <Math mode="inline" tex="(P,S)" text="open-interval@(P, S)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m4.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m4.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m4.1">P</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m4.2">S</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
in an <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> consists of two functions <Math mode="inline" tex="P:\Lambda^{0}\to A" text="P colon Lambda ^ 0 to A" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="S:\Lambda^{\neq 0}\cup G(\Lambda^{\neq 0})\to A" text="S colon Lambda ^ (absent not-equals 0) union G * Lambda ^ (absent not-equals 0) to A" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m8.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m8.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that (KP1) and (KP2) hold, and</p>
        <enumerate xml:id="S3.I2">
          <item xml:id="S3.I2.ix5">
            <tags>
              <tag>(KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.I2.ix5.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="7">
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>)</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.I2.ix5.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="7">
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>)</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S3.I2.ix5.p1">
              <p>for all <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{N}}^{k}\setminus\{0\}" text="n element-of N ^ k set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S3.I2.ix5.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.I2.ix5.p1.m1.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.I2.ix5.p1.m1.1">0</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S3.I2.ix5.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.I2.ix5.p1.m2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.I2.ix5.p1.m2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I2.ix5.p1.m2.1">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I2.ix5.p1.m2.2">μ</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>, we have</p>
              <equation xml:id="S3.Ex5">
                <Math mode="display" tex="S_{\lambda^{*}}S_{\mu}=\delta_{\lambda,\mu}P_{s(\lambda)};" text="S _ (lambda ^ *) * S _ mu = delta _ (list@(lambda, mu)) * P _ (s * lambda)" xml:id="S3.Ex5.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex5.m1.4"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex5.m1.4">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex5.m1.1"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex5.m1.2"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex5.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex5.m1.2">μ</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex5.m1.3"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex5.m1.3">λ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
              </equation>
            </para>
          </item>
          <item xml:id="S3.I2.ix6">
            <tags>
              <tag>(KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.I2.ix6.m1">
                  <XMath>

                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>

                </Math>)</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.I2.ix6.m2">
                  <XMath>

                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>)</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S3.I2.ix6.p1">
              <p>for all <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S3.I2.ix6.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{N}}^{k}\setminus\{0\}" text="n element-of N ^ k set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S3.I2.ix6.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.I2.ix6.p1.m2.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.I2.ix6.p1.m2.1">0</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>,</p>
              <equation xml:id="S3.Ex6">
                <Math mode="display" tex="P_{v}=\sum_{\lambda\in v\Lambda^{\leq n}}S_{\lambda}S_{\lambda^{*}}." text="P _ v = (sum _ (lambda element-of v * Lambda ^ (absent less= n)))@(S _ lambda * S _ (lambda ^ *))" xml:id="S3.Ex6.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex6.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex6.m1.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid4"/>
                              <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
              </equation>
<!--  %**** String Line 250 **** -->            </para>
          </item>
        </enumerate>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S3.p5">
      <p>Since (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.p5.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="2">
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>) is the same as the fourth Cuntz-Krieger relation
of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RSY03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Definition 3.3]</cite>,
we get the following.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:lem-kp4alt" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 3.2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3.2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 3.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 3.2</text></tag> (<cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RSY03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proposition 3.11]</cite>).</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph. Then (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>)
holds at <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> if and only if, for <Math mode="inline" tex="1\leq i\leq k" text="1 less= i less= k" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with
<Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda^{e_{i}}\neq\emptyset" text="v * Lambda ^ (e _ i) not-equals empty-set" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="P_{v}=\sum_{\lambda\in v\Lambda^{e_{i}}}S_{\lambda}S_{\lambda^{*}}" text="P _ v = (sum _ (lambda element-of v * Lambda ^ (e _ i)))@(S _ lambda * S _ (lambda ^ *))" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>

a Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m4">

                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>

              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>

                  <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.

then</text></p>

    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.p7">
        <p>Fix <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{N}}^{k}" text="n element-of N ^ k" xml:id="S3.p7.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda),d(\mu)\leq n" text="list@(d * lambda, d * mu) less= n" xml:id="S3.p7.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m2.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m2.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p7.m2.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m2.1">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p7.m2.4">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m2.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m2.2">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then</p>

                      <XMApp>

          <p class="ltx_intertext">by applying (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.Ex12.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="10">
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>) to each summand. By unique factorisation, for each <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.Ex12.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> there is just one <Math mode="inline" tex="\beta" text="beta" xml:id="S3.Ex12.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of the given degree such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\alpha=\mu\beta" text="lambda * alpha = mu * beta" xml:id="S3.Ex12.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and the sums collapse to</p>
          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex13">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle=\sum_{\alpha\in s(\lambda)\Lambda^{\leq n-d(\lambda)},\lambda%&#10;\alpha=\mu\beta}S_{\alpha}S_{\beta^{*}}" text="absent = (sum _ (formulae@(alpha element-of s * lambda * Lambda ^ (absent less= n - d * lambda), lambda * alpha = mu * beta)))@(S _ alpha * S _ (beta ^ *))" xml:id="S3.Ex13.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid9"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex13.m3.3"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex13.m3.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex13.m3.3">
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex13.m3.2"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex13.m3.2">λ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                        <XMDual>
                                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex13.m3.1"/>
                                          <XMWrap>
                                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex13.m3.1">λ</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                          </XMWrap>
                                        </XMDual>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex13.m3.4">
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
              <MathBranch>
                <td align="right"/>
                <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle=\sum_{\alpha\in s(\lambda)\Lambda^{\leq n-d(\lambda)},\lambda%&#10;\alpha=\mu\beta}S_{\alpha}S_{\beta^{*}}" text="absent = (sum _ (formulae@(alpha element-of s * lambda * Lambda ^ (absent less= n - d * lambda), lambda * alpha = mu * beta)))@(S _ alpha * S _ (beta ^ *))" xml:id="S3.Ex13.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid9"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex13.m2.3"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex13.m2.4"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex13.m2.3">
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex13.m2.2"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex13.m2.2">λ</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                          <XMApp>
                                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                            <XMDual>
                                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex13.m2.1"/>
                                              <XMWrap>
                                                <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex13.m2.1">λ</XMTok>
                                                <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                              </XMWrap>
                                            </XMDual>
                                          </XMApp>
                                        </XMApp>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex13.m2.4">
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>

                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
        <p>This proves the lemma after noting that the purely graph-theoretic result <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RSY03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 3.6]</cite> says that composing <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda" text="lambda" xml:id="S3.p7.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha\in s(\lambda)\Lambda^{\leq n-d(\lambda)}" text="alpha element-of s * lambda * Lambda ^ (absent less= n - d * lambda)" xml:id="S3.p7.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m4.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m4.2">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m4.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m4.1">λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> gives the path <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\alpha\in\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="lambda * alpha element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S3.p7.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_cor" inlist="thm theorem:cor" labels="LABEL:cor-span" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4">
      <tags>
        <tag>Corollary 3.4</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3.4</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Corollary 3.4</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Corollary 3.4</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph and <Math mode="inline" tex="(P,S)" text="open-interval@(P, S)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m3.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m3.1">P</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m3.2">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
a Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-family in an <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. The subalgebra generated by <Math mode="inline" tex="(P,S)" text="open-interval@(P, S)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m7.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m7.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m7.1">P</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m7.2">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is
<!--  %**** String Line 300 **** --><Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{S_{\alpha}S_{\beta^{*}}:\alpha,\beta\in\Lambda%&#10;,s(\alpha)=s(\beta)\}" text="span@(S _ alpha * S _ (beta ^ *) colon list@(alpha, beta) element-of Lambda, s * alpha = s * beta)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>

                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>

                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>

                            </XMWrap>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>

                          <XMDual>

                            <XMWrap>

                              <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m8.4">β</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>

              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.p8">
        <p>We have <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\alpha}S_{\beta^{*}}=S_{\alpha}P_{s(\alpha)}P_{s(\beta)}S_{\beta^{*}}" text="S _ alpha * S _ (beta ^ *) = S _ alpha * P _ (s * alpha) * P _ (s * beta) * S _ (beta ^ *)" xml:id="S3.p8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p8.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p8.m1.1">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p8.m1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p8.m1.2">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
by (KP2), so <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\alpha}S_{\beta^{*}}=0" text="S _ alpha * S _ (beta ^ *) = 0" xml:id="S3.p8.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> unless <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\alpha)=s(\beta)" text="s * alpha = s * beta" xml:id="S3.p8.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p8.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p8.m3.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p8.m3.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p8.m3.2">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by (KP1). The result now
follows from Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:lspfamily"/> and (KP2).
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S3.p9">
      <p>The set of <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">minimal common extensions of <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda" xml:id="S3.p9.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p9.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p9.m1.1">λ</XMTok>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math></text> is</p>
      <equation xml:id="S3.Ex14">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\Lambda^{\min}(\lambda,\mu):=\{(\alpha,\beta):\lambda\alpha=\mu\beta,d(\lambda%&#10;\alpha)=d(\lambda)\vee d(\mu)\}." text="Lambda ^ minimum * open-interval@(lambda, mu) assign conditional-set@(open-interval@(alpha, beta), formulae@(lambda * alpha = mu * beta, d * lambda * alpha = d * lambda or d * mu))" xml:id="S3.Ex14.m1">

    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_cor" inlist="thm theorem:cor" labels="LABEL:cor-altKP3'" xml:id="S3.Thmthm5">
      <tags>
        <tag>Corollary 3.5</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3.5</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Corollary 3.5</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Corollary 3.5</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm5.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph and <Math mode="inline" tex="(P,S)" text="open-interval@(P, S)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m3.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m3.1">P</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m3.2">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
a family in an <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> satisfying (KP1), (KP2) and (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>). Then (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>) holds if and
only if, for all <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda" xml:id="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m8.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m8.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m8.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm5.p1.m8.2">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,</text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:KP3'alt" xml:id="S3.E2">
          <tags>
            <tag>(3.2)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">3.2</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="S_{\lambda^{*}}S_{\mu}=\sum_{(\alpha,\beta)\in\Lambda^{\min}(\lambda,\mu)}S_{%&#10;\alpha}S_{\beta^{*}}." text="S _ (lambda ^ *) * S _ mu = (sum _ (open-interval@(alpha, beta) element-of Lambda ^ minimum * open-interval@(lambda, mu)))@(S _ alpha * S _ (beta ^ *))" xml:id="S3.E2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.E2.m1.5"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.E2.m1.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>

                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.E2.m1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.E2.m1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>

                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.E2.m1.2">β</XMTok>
