                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.E2.m1.3"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.E2.m1.4"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.E2.m1.3">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.E2.m1.4">μ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.p10">
        <p>Suppose (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.p10.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) holds. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="(P,S)" text="open-interval@(P, S)" xml:id="S3.p10.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m2.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m2.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p10.m2.1">P</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p10.m2.2">S</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p10.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family.
Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda" xml:id="S3.p10.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m4.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m4.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p10.m4.1">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p10.m4.2">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and apply Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:lspfamily"/> with
<!--  %**** String Line 325 **** --><Math mode="inline" tex="n=d(\lambda)\vee d(\mu)" text="n = d * lambda or d * mu" xml:id="S3.p10.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p10.m5.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m5.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p10.m5.2">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> to get
<Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\lambda^{*}}S_{\mu}=\sum_{(\alpha,\beta)\in\Lambda^{\min}(\lambda,\mu)}S_{%&#10;\alpha}S_{\beta^{*}}" text="S _ (lambda ^ *) * S _ mu = (sum _ (open-interval@(alpha, beta) element-of Lambda ^ minimum * open-interval@(lambda, mu)))@(S _ alpha * S _ (beta ^ *))" xml:id="S3.p10.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m6.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m6.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p10.m6.1">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p10.m6.2">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">min</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m6.3"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.p10.m6.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p10.m6.3">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p10.m6.4">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p11">
        <p>Conversely, suppose that for all <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda" xml:id="S3.p11.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m1.2">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, (<ref labelref="LABEL:KP3'alt"/>) holds.
Fix <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{N}}^{k}\setminus\{0\}" text="n element-of N ^ k set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S3.p11.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m2.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p11.m2.1">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and let <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S3.p11.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m3.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m3.1">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m3.2">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Note
that <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)\vee d(\mu)\leq n" text="d * lambda or d * mu less= n" xml:id="S3.p11.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m4.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m4.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m4.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m4.2">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. First suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)=d(\mu)" text="d * lambda = d * mu" xml:id="S3.p11.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m5.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m5.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m5.2">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex15">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\Lambda^{\min}(\lambda,\mu)=\begin{cases}\{(s(\lambda),s(\lambda))\}&amp;\text{if %&#10;$\lambda=\mu$;}\\&#10;\emptyset&amp;\text{else,}\end{cases}" text="Lambda ^ minimum * open-interval@(lambda, mu) = cases@(set@(open-interval@(s * lambda, s * lambda)), [if =λμ;], empty-set, [else,])" xml:id="S3.Ex15.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">min</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex15.m1.5"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex15.m1.6"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex15.m1.5">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex15.m1.6">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="cases"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex15.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex15.m1.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex15.m1.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex15.m1.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">{</XMTok>
                    <XMArray>
                      <XMRow>
                        <XMCell align="left">
                          <XMDual xml:id="S3.Ex15.m1.1">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex15.m1.1.3"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                              <XMDual xml:id="S3.Ex15.m1.1.3">
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex15.m1.1.3.1"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex15.m1.1.3.2"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex15.m1.1.3.1">
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex15.m1.1.1"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex15.m1.1.1">λ</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex15.m1.1.3.2">
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex15.m1.1.2"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex15.m1.1.2">λ</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMCell>
                        <XMCell align="left">
                          <XMText xml:id="S3.Ex15.m1.2">if <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda=\mu" text="lambda = mu" xml:id="S3.Ex15.m1.m1">
                              <XMath>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMath>
                            </Math>;</XMText>
                        </XMCell>
                      </XMRow>
                      <XMRow>
                        <XMCell align="left">
                          <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID" xml:id="S3.Ex15.m1.3">∅</XMTok>
                        </XMCell>
                        <XMCell align="left">
                          <XMText xml:id="S3.Ex15.m1.4">else,</XMText>
                        </XMCell>
                      </XMRow>
                    </XMArray>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and (<ref labelref="LABEL:KP3'alt"/>) gives <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\lambda^{*}}S_{\mu}=\delta_{\lambda,\mu}P_{s(\lambda)}" text="S _ (lambda ^ *) * S _ mu = delta _ (list@(lambda, mu)) * P _ (s * lambda)" xml:id="S3.p11.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m6.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m6.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m6.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m6.2">μ</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m6.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m6.3">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Second, suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)\neq d(\mu)" text="d * lambda not-equals d * mu" xml:id="S3.p11.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m7.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m7.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m7.2">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then at least one of <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu" text="list@(lambda, mu)" xml:id="S3.p11.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m8.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m8.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m8.1">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m8.2">μ</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has degree
less than <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S3.p11.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, say <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)&lt;n" text="d * lambda less n" xml:id="S3.p11.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m10.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. But <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\in\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="lambda element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S3.p11.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and so there is
no <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.p11.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)&lt;d(\lambda\alpha)\leq n" text="d * lambda less d * lambda * alpha less= n" xml:id="S3.p11.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m13.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m13.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m13.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p11.m13.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Now</p>

                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex17.m2.2">β</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                            <XMDual xml:id="S3.Ex17.m2.6">
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex17.m2.6.1"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex17.m2.6.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex17.m2.6.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex17.m2.6.2">
                                  <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex17.m2.3"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex17.m2.3">μ</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex17.m2.4"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex17.m2.4">λ</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
        <p>since <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)\neq d(\mu)" text="d * lambda not-equals d * mu" xml:id="S3.p11.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m14.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m14.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m14.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m14.2">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. But <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu\in\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="mu element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S3.p11.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> too, so <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{\min}(\lambda,\mu)=\emptyset" text="Lambda ^ minimum * open-interval@(lambda, mu) = empty-set" xml:id="S3.p11.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">min</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m16.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m16.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m16.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m16.2">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
By (<ref labelref="LABEL:KP3'alt"/>)
<Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\lambda^{*}}S_{\mu}=0" text="S _ (lambda ^ *) * S _ mu = 0" xml:id="S3.p11.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\neq\mu" text="lambda not-equals mu" xml:id="S3.p11.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> implies that <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\lambda^{*}}S_{\mu}=\delta_{\lambda,\mu}P_{s(\lambda)}" text="S _ (lambda ^ *) * S _ mu = delta _ (list@(lambda, mu)) * P _ (s * lambda)" xml:id="S3.p11.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m19.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m19.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m19.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m19.2">μ</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m19.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m19.3">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Thus in either case, <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\lambda^{*}}S_{\mu}=\delta_{\lambda,\mu}P_{s(\lambda)}" text="S _ (lambda ^ *) * S _ mu = delta _ (list@(lambda, mu)) * P _ (s * lambda)" xml:id="S3.p11.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m20.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m20.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m20.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m20.2">μ</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p11.m20.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p11.m20.3">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
<!--  %**** String Line 350 **** -->as required.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S3.p12">
      <p>In order to demonstrate the existence of a nonzero Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p12.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-family
we need to impose the
“local convexity” condition from <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RSY03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_prop" inlist="thm theorem:prop" labels="LABEL:prop:nonzerofam" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6">
      <tags>
        <tag>Proposition 3.6</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3.6</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Proposition 3.6</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Proposition 3.6</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph. Then there exist an <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and a
Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-family <Math mode="inline" tex="(P,S)" text="open-interval@(P, S)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m6.1">P</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m6.2">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\lambda},S_{\lambda^{*}},P_{v}\neq 0" text="list@(S _ lambda, S _ (lambda ^ *), P _ v) not-equals 0" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m8.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m8.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m8.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m8.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m8.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m8.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for all <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\in\Lambda" text="lambda element-of Lambda" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. In particular, for every
<Math mode="inline" tex="r\in R\setminus\{0\}" text="r element-of R set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m11.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m11.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, we have <Math mode="inline" tex="rP_{v}\neq 0" text="r * P _ v not-equals 0" xml:id="S3.Thmthm6.p1.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.p13">
        <p>We modify the construction of the infinite-path representation of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> and instead
build a ‘boundary-path representation’. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{F}}_{R}(\Lambda^{\leq\infty})" text="F _ R * Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S3.p13.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p13.m1.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be the free <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.p13.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-module
on <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S3.p13.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
For each <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S3.p13.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S3.p13.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p13.m5.1">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p13.m5.2">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
define functions <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{v},f_{\lambda}" text="list@(f _ v, f _ lambda)" xml:id="S3.p13.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m6.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m6.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p13.m6.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p13.m6.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{\mu}:\Lambda^{\leq\infty}\to{\mathbb{F}}_{R}(\Lambda^{\leq\infty})" text="f _ mu colon Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity) to F _ R * Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S3.p13.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p13.m7.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.p13.m7.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by</p>

                                </XMCell>

                              <XMRow>
                                <XMCell align="left">
                                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.Ex19.m2.3">0</XMTok>
                                </XMCell>
                                <XMCell align="left">
                                  <XMText xml:id="S3.Ex19.m2.4"> otherwise,</XMText>
                                </XMCell>
                              </XMRow>
                            </XMArray>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>

            <MathFork>

        <p>By the universal property of free modules, there exist nonzero

      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p14">
        <p>We claim that <Math mode="inline" tex="(P,S)" text="open-interval@(P, S)" xml:id="S3.p14.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>

                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p14.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family in

            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-algebra
<Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{End}({\mathbb{F}}_{R}(\Lambda^{\leq\infty}))" text="End@(F _ R * Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity))" xml:id="S3.p14.m4">
            <XMath>

                <XMApp>

                  <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m4.2"/>

                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p14.m4.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>

                        <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>

          </Math>. Relations (KP1) and (KP2) are
straight-forward to check. To see (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.p14.m5">

          </Math>), fix <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{N}}^{k}\setminus\{0\}" text="n element-of N ^ k set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S3.p14.m6">

                  </XMWrap>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="x element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S3.p14.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\mu)\neq r(\lambda)" text="r * mu not-equals r * lambda" xml:id="S3.p14.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p14.m9.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m9.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p14.m9.2">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then both
<Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\lambda^{*}}S_{\mu}=S_{\lambda^{*}}P_{r(\lambda)}P_{r(\mu)}S_{\mu}" text="S _ (lambda ^ *) * S _ mu = S _ (lambda ^ *) * P _ (r * lambda) * P _ (r * mu) * S _ mu" xml:id="S3.p14.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m10.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p14.m10.1">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m10.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p14.m10.2">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\delta_{\lambda,\mu}P_{s(\lambda)}" text="delta _ (list@(lambda, mu)) * P _ (s * lambda)" xml:id="S3.p14.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m11.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m11.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p14.m11.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p14.m11.2">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m11.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p14.m11.3">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="S3.p14.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. So we may assume <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\mu)=r(\lambda)" text="r * mu = r * lambda" xml:id="S3.p14.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m13.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p14.m13.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p14.m13.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p14.m13.2">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Notice that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex21">
          <Math mode="display" tex="S_{\lambda^{*}}S_{\mu}(x)=\begin{cases}S_{\lambda^{*}}(\mu x)&amp;\text{if }x(0)=s%&#10;(\mu)\text{ and $\mu x=\lambda y$ for some $y\in\Lambda^{\leq\infty}$};\\&#10;0&amp;\text{otherwise}.\end{cases}" text="S _ (lambda ^ *) * S _ mu * x = cases@(S _ (lambda ^ *) * mu * x, [if ] * x * 0 = s * mu * [ and =⁢μx⁢λy for some ∈yΛ≤∞], 0, [otherwise])" xml:id="S3.Ex21.m1">
