      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p15">
        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in r(\lambda)\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of r * lambda * Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S3.p15.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p15.m1.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p15.m1.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p15.m1.2">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p15.m1.3">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p15.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p15.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
<Math mode="inline" tex="(\mu x)(0,d(\lambda))=\lambda" text="mu * x * open-interval@(0, d * lambda) = lambda" xml:id="S3.p15.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p15.m2.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p15.m2.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p15.m2.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p15.m2.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p15.m2.2">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p15.m2.4">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.p15.m2.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p15.m2.1">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> implies
either <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda=\mu\lambda^{\prime}" text="lambda = mu * lambda ^ prime" xml:id="S3.p15.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu=\lambda\mu^{\prime}" text="mu = lambda * mu ^ prime" xml:id="S3.p15.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for
some <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda^{\prime},\mu^{\prime}\in\Lambda" text="list@(lambda ^ prime, mu ^ prime) element-of Lambda" xml:id="S3.p15.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p15.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p15.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p15.m5.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p15.m5.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. But then <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda=\mu" text="lambda = mu" xml:id="S3.p15.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by
the definition of <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S3.p15.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Hence <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mu x)(0,d(\lambda))=\lambda" text="mu * x * open-interval@(0, d * lambda) = lambda" xml:id="S3.p15.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p15.m8.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p15.m8.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p15.m8.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p15.m8.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p15.m8.2">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p15.m8.4">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.p15.m8.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p15.m8.1">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu=\lambda" text="mu = lambda" xml:id="S3.p15.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Thus</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx5">
          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex22">
            <MathFork>

              <Math tex="\displaystyle=\delta_{\lambda,\mu}P_{s(\lambda)}(x)" text="absent = delta _ (list@(lambda, mu)) * P _ (s * lambda) * x" xml:id="S3.Ex23.m3">

        <p>and (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.p15.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) holds.
<!--  %**** String Line 425 **** --></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p16">
        <p>For (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S3.p16.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>), fix <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S3.p16.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="1\leq i\leq k" text="1 less= i less= k" xml:id="S3.p16.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with
<Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda^{e_{i}}\neq\emptyset" text="v * Lambda ^ (e _ i) not-equals empty-set" xml:id="S3.p16.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since
<Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p16.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is locally convex, it suffices to show that
<Math mode="inline" tex="P_{v}=\sum_{\lambda\in v\Lambda^{e_{i}}}S_{\lambda}S_{\lambda^{*}}" text="P _ v = (sum _ (lambda element-of v * Lambda ^ (e _ i)))@(S _ lambda * S _ (lambda ^ *))" xml:id="S3.p16.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem-kp4alt"/>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="x element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S3.p16.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Then</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx6">
          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex24">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle\sum_{\lambda\in v\Lambda^{e_{i}}}S_{\lambda}S_{\lambda^{*}}(x)=%&#10;\sum_{\lambda\in v\Lambda^{e_{i}}}\delta_{\lambda,x(0,e_{i})}x=\begin{cases}x&amp;%&#10;\text{if }r(x)=v;\\&#10;0&amp;\text{otherwise},\end{cases}" text="(sum _ (lambda element-of v * Lambda ^ (e _ i)))@(S _ lambda * S _ (lambda ^ *) * x) = (sum _ (lambda element-of v * Lambda ^ (e _ i)))@(delta _ (list@(lambda, x * open-interval@(0, e _ i))) * x) = cases@(x, [if ] * r * x = v, 0, [otherwise])" xml:id="S3.Ex24.m3">

          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex25">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle=P_{v}(x).\qed" text="absent = P _ v * x" xml:id="S3.Ex25.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex25.m3.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex25.m3.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex25.m3.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex25.m3.1">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="PUNCT">∎</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
              <MathBranch>
                <td align="right"/>
                <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle=P_{v}(x).\qed" text="absent = P _ v * x" xml:id="S3.Ex25.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex25.m2.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex25.m2.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex25.m2.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex25.m2.1">x</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="PUNCT">∎</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S3.p17">
      <p>We are now ready to show that there is an <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.p17.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra which is “universal for Kumjian-Pask
<Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p17.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-families”; the proof is very similar to the one for <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S3.p17.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graphs without sources <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Theorem 3.4]</cite>, so we will just give an outline addressing the main points.
This <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.p17.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra is graded over <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{Z}}^{k}" text="Z ^ k" xml:id="S3.p17.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and to see that the graded subgroups have a nice description uses Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:lspfamily"/>; so we will need to check carefully that the argument used when <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p17.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> has no sources still works when <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{n}" text="Lambda ^ n" xml:id="S3.p17.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is replaced by <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S3.p17.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. We will follow the convention of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> and use lower-case letters for universal Kumjian-Pask families.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_thm" inlist="thm theorem:thm" labels="LABEL:thm-KP" xml:id="S3.Thmthm7">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem 3.7</tag>

        <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem 3.7</tag>
      </tags>

      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm7.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.Thmthm7.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S3.Thmthm7.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph.</text></p>
        <enumerate xml:id="S3.I3">

          <item labels="LABEL:item-b" xml:id="S3.I3.i2">
            <tags>
              <tag>(2)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">2</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 2</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S3.I3.i2.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">The subsets</text></p>
              <equation xml:id="S3.Ex26">
                <Math mode="display" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)_{n}:={\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{s_{\alpha}%&#10;s_{\beta^{*}}:d(\alpha)-d(\beta)=n\}" xml:id="S3.Ex26.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex26.m1.1">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">span</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
              </equation>
              <p><text font="italic">form a </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{Z}}^{k}" text="Z ^ k" xml:id="S3.I3.i2.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">-grading of </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S3.I3.i2.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.I3.i2.p1.m2.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.I3.i2.p1.m2.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.I3.i2.p1.m2.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I3.i2.p1.m2.1">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">.</text></p>
            </para>
          </item>
        </enumerate>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.p18">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="X:=\Lambda^{0}\cup\Lambda^{\neq 0}\cup G(\Lambda^{\neq 0})" text="X assign Lambda ^ 0 union Lambda ^ (absent not-equals 0) union G * Lambda ^ (absent not-equals 0)" xml:id="S3.p18.m1">
            <XMath>

<Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\lambda}=q(\lambda)" text="s _ lambda = q * lambda" xml:id="S3.p18.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p18.m12.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p18.m12.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\lambda^{*}}=q(\lambda^{*})" text="s _ (lambda ^ *) = q * lambda ^ *" xml:id="S3.p18.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p18.m13.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p18.m13.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Then <Math mode="inline" tex="(p,s)" text="open-interval@(p, s)" xml:id="S3.p18.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p18.m14.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p18.m14.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p18.m14.1">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p18.m14.2">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p18.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family in the <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.p18.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S3.p18.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p18.m17.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p18.m17.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p18.m17.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p18.m17.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p19">
        <p>Now let <Math mode="inline" tex="(Q,T)" text="open-interval@(Q, T)" xml:id="S3.p19.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m1.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m1.1">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m1.2">T</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p19.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family in an <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.p19.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p19.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Define <Math mode="inline" tex="f:X\to A" text="f colon X to A" xml:id="S3.p19.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by <Math mode="inline" tex="f(v)=Q_{v}" text="f * v = Q _ v" xml:id="S3.p19.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m6.1">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="f(\lambda)=T_{\lambda}" text="f * lambda = T _ lambda" xml:id="S3.p19.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m7.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="f(\lambda^{*})=T_{\lambda^{*}}" text="f * lambda ^ * = T _ (lambda ^ *)" xml:id="S3.p19.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                    <XMWrap>

                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m8.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
The universal property of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{F}}_{R}(w(X))" text="F _ R * w * X" xml:id="S3.p19.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m9.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m9.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m9.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m9.1">X</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> gives a unique <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.p19.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-algebra homomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="\psi:{\mathbb{F}}_{R}(w(X))\to A" text="psi colon F _ R * w * X to A" xml:id="S3.p19.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m11.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m11.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m11.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such
that <Math mode="inline" tex="\psi|_{X}=f" text="evaluated-at@(psi, X) = f" xml:id="S3.p19.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="evaluated-at"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m12.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m12.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m12.1">ψ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m12.2">X</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="(Q,T)" text="open-interval@(Q, T)" xml:id="S3.p19.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m13.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m13.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m13.1">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m13.2">T</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kumjian-Pask family, <Math mode="inline" tex="I\subseteq\ker(\psi)" text="I subset-of-or-equals kernel@(psi)" xml:id="S3.p19.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m14.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m14.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="kernel" role="OPFUNCTION" xml:id="S3.p19.m14.1">ker</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m14.2">ψ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus there exists a unique
<Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.p19.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-algebra homomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}:\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)\to A" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T)) colon (KP _ R)@(Lambda) to A" xml:id="S3.p19.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m16.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m16.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m16.1">Q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m16.2">T</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m16.4"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m16.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p19.m16.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m16.3">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}\circ q=\psi" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T)) compose q = psi" xml:id="S3.p19.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m17.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m17.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m17.1">Q</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m17.2">T</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. It follows that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}\circ p=Q" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T)) compose p = Q" xml:id="S3.p19.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m18.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m18.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m18.1">Q</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m18.2">T</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}\circ s=T" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T)) compose s = T" xml:id="S3.p19.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m19.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p19.m19.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m19.1">Q</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p19.m19.2">T</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p20">
        <p>Now fix <Math mode="inline" tex="r\in R\setminus\{0\}" text="r element-of R set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S3.p20.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p20.m1.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p20.m1.1">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S3.p20.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="rp_{v}" text="r * p _ v" xml:id="S3.p20.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> were zero then <Math mode="inline" tex="r\pi_{Q,T}(p_{v})=rQ_{v}" text="r * pi _ (list@(Q, T)) * p _ v = r * Q _ v" xml:id="S3.p20.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p20.m4.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p20.m4.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p20.m4.1">Q</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p20.m4.2">T</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p20.m4.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p20.m4.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> would be
zero for every Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p20.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family <Math mode="inline" tex="(Q,T)" text="open-interval@(Q, T)" xml:id="S3.p20.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p20.m6.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p20.m6.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p20.m6.1">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p20.m6.2">T</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. But this is not the case for the Kumjian-Pask family of Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:nonzerofam"/>.
Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="rp_{v}\neq 0" text="r * p _ v not-equals 0" xml:id="S3.p20.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. This completes the proof of (<ref labelref="LABEL:item-a"/>).</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p21">
        <p>For (<ref labelref="LABEL:item-b"/>), extend the degree map to words on <Math mode="inline" tex="X" text="X" xml:id="S3.p21.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by setting <Math mode="inline" tex="d:w(X)\to{\mathbb{Z}}^{k}" text="d colon w * X to Z ^ k" xml:id="S3.p21.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p21.m2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p21.m2.1">X</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
by <Math mode="inline" tex="d(w)=\sum_{i=1}^{|w|}d(w_{i})" text="d * w = ((sum _ (i = 1)) ^ (absolute-value@(w)))@(d * w _ i)" xml:id="S3.p21.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMDual>

                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>

                        <XMRef idref="S3.p21.m3.1"/>
                      </XMApp>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p21.m3.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.p21.m3.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
By <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proposition 2.7]</cite>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{F}}_{R}(w(X))" text="F _ R * w * X" xml:id="S3.p21.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                      <XMDual>

            </XMath>
          </Math> is graded over <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{Z}}^{k}" text="Z ^ k" xml:id="S3.p21.m5">
            <XMath>

          </Math> by
the subgroups</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex27">
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\mathbb{F}}_{R}(w(X))_{n}:=\Big{\{}\sum_{w\in w(X)}r_{w}w:r_{w}\neq 0\implies&#10;d%&#10;(w)=n\Big{\}}." text="F _ R * (w * X) _ n assign conditional-set@((sum _ (w element-of w * X))@(r _ w * w), r _ w not-equals 0 implies d * w = n)" xml:id="S3.Ex27.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex27.m1.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex27.m1.4">

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>

                      </XMApp>

                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>

                            </XMApp>

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex27.m1.4.3">
                          <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>

                          <XMApp>

                            </XMDual>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>

              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
