<!--  %**** String Line 500 **** -->      <para xml:id="S3.p22">
        <p>We claim that the ideal <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S3.p22.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> defined in the proof of (<ref labelref="LABEL:item-a"/>) is graded. For this, it suffices to see that <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S3.p22.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is generated by homogeneous elements, that is, elements in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{F}}_{R}(w(X))_{n}" text="F _ R * (w * X) _ n" xml:id="S3.p22.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m3.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p22.m3.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m3.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p22.m3.1">X</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{Z}}^{k}" text="n element-of Z ^ k" xml:id="S3.p22.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The generators of <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S3.p22.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in (i) are a linear combination of words of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="S3.p22.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, hence are homogeneous of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="S3.p22.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda=\mu\nu" text="lambda = mu * nu" xml:id="S3.p22.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p22.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> then <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda-\mu\nu" text="lambda - mu * nu" xml:id="S3.p22.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a linear combination of words of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)" text="d * lambda" xml:id="S3.p22.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m11.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p22.m11.1">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, so all the generators in (ii) are homogeneous. Also, <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda-r(\lambda)\lambda" text="lambda - r * lambda * lambda" xml:id="S3.p22.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m12.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p22.m12.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is homogeneous of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda" text="lambda" xml:id="S3.p22.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and similarly all the generators in (iii) are homogeneous of some degree<note mark="1" role="footnote" xml:id="footnote1"><tags>
              <tag>1</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">footnote 1</tag>
            </tags>This has caused some confusion before: for example in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="T" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proof of Proposition 4.7]</cite>, <Math mode="inline" tex="e-r(e)e" text="e - r * e * e" xml:id="footnote1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="footnote1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="footnote1.m1.1">e</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for an edge <Math mode="inline" tex="e" text="e" xml:id="footnote1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> in a graph is claimed to be <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="footnote1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graded whereas it is <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="footnote1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graded.</note>. The elements in (iv) are either of the form <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda^{*}\lambda-s(\lambda)" text="lambda ^ * * lambda - s * lambda" xml:id="S3.p22.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m14.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p22.m14.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> or of the form <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda^{*}\mu" text="lambda ^ * * mu" xml:id="S3.p22.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>; the former is homogeneous of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="S3.p22.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and the latter is homogeneous of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\mu)-d(\lambda)" text="d * mu - d * lambda" xml:id="S3.p22.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m17.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p22.m17.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p22.m17.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p22.m17.2">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. A word <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\lambda^{*}" text="lambda * lambda ^ *" xml:id="S3.p22.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has degree <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="S3.p22.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and hence the generators in (v) are homogeneous of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="S3.p22.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S3.p22.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a graded ideal.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p23">
        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S3.p23.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is graded, the quotient <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S3.p23.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m2.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m2.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p23.m2.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p23.m2.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{F}}_{R}(w(X))" text="F _ R * w * X" xml:id="S3.p23.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m3.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p23.m3.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m3.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p23.m3.1">X</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S3.p23.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is graded by the subgroups</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex28">
          <Math mode="display" tex="({\mathbb{F}}_{R}(w(X))/I)_{n}:={\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{q(w):w\in w(X)%&#10;,d(w)=n\}." text="((F _ R * w * X) / I) _ n assign span@(q * w colon formulae@(w element-of w * X, d * w = n))" xml:id="S3.Ex28.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex28.m1.6"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex28.m1.6">
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex28.m1.6.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex28.m1.6.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex28.m1.6.1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex28.m1.6.1.1">
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex28.m1.1"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex28.m1.1">X</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex28.m1.5"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex28.m1.6.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.Ex28.m1.5">span</XMTok>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex28.m1.6.2">
                            <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex28.m1.2"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>

                              </XMApp>

                                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex28.m1.6.2.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex28.m1.3"/>

                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex28.m1.6.2.2">
                                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex28.m1.4"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex28.m1.4">w</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>By Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor-span"/>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)={\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{s_{\alpha}s_{%&#10;\beta^{*}}:\alpha,\beta\in\Lambda,s(\alpha)=s(\beta)\}" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda) = span@(s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *) colon list@(alpha, beta) element-of Lambda, s * alpha = s * beta)" xml:id="S3.p23.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m5.7"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m5.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p23.m5.7">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p23.m5.1">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m5.6"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m5.8"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m5.9"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S3.p23.m5.6">span</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p23.m5.8">
                        <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m5.2"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m5.3"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p23.m5.2">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p23.m5.3">β</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p23.m5.9">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m5.4"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p23.m5.4">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.p23.m5.5"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p23.m5.5">β</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We need to show that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex29">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)_{n}:={\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{s_{\alpha}%&#10;s_{\beta^{*}}:d(\alpha)-d(\beta)=n\}=({\mathbb{F}}_{R}(w(X))/I)_{n}." xml:id="S3.Ex29.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">span</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>

                    </XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                  <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>

                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>First, fix <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\lambda}s_{\mu^{*}}\in\{s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}:d(\alpha)-d(\beta)=n\}" text="s _ lambda * s _ (mu ^ *) element-of conditional-set@(s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *), d * alpha - d * beta = n)" xml:id="S3.p23.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

Then <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\lambda}s_{\mu^{*}}=q(\lambda)q(\mu^{*})=q(\lambda\mu^{*})" text="s _ lambda * s _ (mu ^ *) = q * lambda * q * mu ^ * = q * lambda * mu ^ *" xml:id="S3.p23.m7">

and <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda\mu^{*})=d(\lambda)-d(\mu)=n" text="d * lambda * mu ^ * = d * lambda - d * mu = n" xml:id="S3.p23.m8">

                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>

                    </XMDual>

                </XMApp>

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus
<Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\lambda}s_{\mu}^{*}\in\{q(w):d(w)=n,w\in w(X)\}\in({\mathbb{F}}_{R}(w(X))/I%&#10;)_{n}" text="s _ lambda * (s _ mu) ^ * element-of conditional-set@(q * w, formulae@(d * w = n, w element-of w * X)) element-of ((F _ R * w * X) / I) _ n" xml:id="S3.p23.m9">

                  <XMDual>

                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p24">
        <p>That <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mathbb{F}}_{R}(w(X))/I)_{n}\subseteq\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)_{n}" xml:id="S3.p24.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p24.m1.1">X</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                  <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p24.m1.2">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> follows immediately from the next lemma; the proof is very similar to that of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 3.5]</cite>, but we need to check replacing <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{n}" text="Lambda ^ n" xml:id="S3.p24.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S3.p24.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in the argument does not cause problems.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" xml:id="S3.Thmthm8">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 3.8</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3.8</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 3.8</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 3.8</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm8.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="X:=\Lambda^{0}\cup\Lambda^{\neq 0}\cup G(\Lambda^{\neq 0})" text="X assign Lambda ^ 0 union Lambda ^ (absent not-equals 0) union G * Lambda ^ (absent not-equals 0)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m1.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="q:{\mathbb{F}}_{R}(w(X))\to\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="q colon F _ R * w * X to (KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m2.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m2.3">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m2.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m2.1">X</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m2.4"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m2.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m2.4">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m2.2">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be the quotient map.
If <Math mode="inline" tex="w\in w(X)" text="w element-of w * X" xml:id="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>

                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="q(w)\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)_{d(w)}" xml:id="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm8.p1.m4.2">w</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>

                <XMApp>

                  <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>

                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

<!--  %**** String Line 525 **** -->    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.p25">
        <p>The proof is by induction on <Math mode="inline" tex="|w|" text="absolute-value@(w)" xml:id="S3.p25.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p25.m1.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p25.m1.1">w</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We treat the cases <Math mode="inline" tex="|w|=1,2" text="absolute-value@(w) = list@(1, 2)" xml:id="S3.p25.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p25.m2.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p25.m2.1">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p25.m2.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p25.m2.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p25.m2.2">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p25.m2.3">2</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> separately. Recall that by our convention <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{v}:=p_{v}" text="s _ v assign p _ v" xml:id="S3.p25.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{v^{*}}:=p_{v}" text="s _ (v ^ *) assign p _ v" xml:id="S3.p25.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S3.p25.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p26">
        <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="|w|=1" text="absolute-value@(w) = 1" xml:id="S3.p26.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m1.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m1.1">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> there are two possibilities. If <Math mode="inline" tex="w=\lambda" text="w = lambda" xml:id="S3.p26.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\in\Lambda" text="lambda element-of Lambda" xml:id="S3.p26.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="q(w)=s_{\lambda}=s_{\lambda}s_{s(\lambda)^{*}}" text="q * w = s _ lambda = s _ lambda * s _ (s * lambda ^ *)" xml:id="S3.p26.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m4.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m4.2">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m4.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m4.1">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)-d(s(\lambda))=d(\lambda)" text="d * lambda - d * s * lambda = d * lambda" xml:id="S3.p26.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m5.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m5.4"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.p26.m5.4">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m5.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m5.2">λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m5.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m5.3">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and so
<Math mode="inline" tex="q(w)\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)_{d(w)}" xml:id="S3.p26.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m6.2">w</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m6.3">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m6.1">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Otherwise, if <Math mode="inline" tex="w=\lambda^{*}" text="w = lambda ^ *" xml:id="S3.p26.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="q(w)=s_{\lambda^{*}}=s_{s(\lambda)}s_{\lambda^{*}}" text="q * w = s _ (lambda ^ *) = s _ (s * lambda) * s _ (lambda ^ *)" xml:id="S3.p26.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m8.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m8.2">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m8.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m8.1">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="d(s(\lambda))-d(\lambda)=d(\lambda^{*})" text="d * s * lambda - d * lambda = d * lambda ^ *" xml:id="S3.p26.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m9.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.p26.m9.3">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m9.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m9.1">λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m9.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m9.2">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m9.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p26.m9.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, so <Math mode="inline" tex="q(w)\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)_{d(w)}" xml:id="S3.p26.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m10.2">w</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m10.3">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p26.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p26.m10.1">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p27">
        <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="|w|=2" text="absolute-value@(w) = 2" xml:id="S3.p27.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p27.m1.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p27.m1.1">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> there are four possibilities: <Math mode="inline" tex="w=\lambda\mu^{*},\lambda\mu,\mu^{*}\lambda^{*}" text="w = list@(lambda * mu ^ *, lambda * mu, mu ^ * * lambda ^ *)" xml:id="S3.p27.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p27.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p27.m2.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p27.m2.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p27.m2.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p27.m2.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p27.m2.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda^{*}\mu" text="lambda ^ * * mu" xml:id="S3.p27.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The first three possibilities are quickly dealt with since</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx7">

          <equation xml:id="S3.Ex31">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle q(\lambda\mu)=s_{\lambda\mu}s_{s(\mu)^{*}}\text{\ and \ }d(%&#10;\lambda\mu)-d(s(\mu))=d(\lambda\mu)," text="q * lambda * mu = s _ (lambda * mu) * s _ (s * mu ^ *) * [ and  ] * d * lambda * mu - d * s * mu = d * lambda * mu" xml:id="S3.Ex31.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex31.m2.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex31.m2.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex31.m2.3.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex31.m2.3.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>

                                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex32.m1.4.2">
