                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex32.m1.3"/>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex32.m1.3">μ</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S3.Ex32.m1.4.3"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex32.m1.4.3">
                                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex32.m1.4.3.1"/>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex32.m1.4.3.1">
                                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                          </XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex32.m1.4.4"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex32.m1.4.4">
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
        <p>So suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="w=\lambda^{*}\mu" text="w = lambda ^ * * mu" xml:id="S3.p27.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="m=d(\mu)\vee d(\lambda)" text="m = d * mu or d * lambda" xml:id="S3.p27.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p27.m5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p27.m5.1">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p27.m5.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p27.m5.2">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. By Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:lspfamily"/> we have</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex33">
          <Math mode="display" tex="q(\lambda^{*}\mu)=s_{\lambda^{*}}s_{\mu}=\sum_{\lambda\alpha=\mu\beta,\lambda%&#10;\alpha\in\Lambda^{\leq m}}s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}." text="q * lambda ^ * * mu = s _ (lambda ^ *) * s _ mu = (sum _ (formulae@(lambda * alpha = mu * beta, lambda * alpha element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= m))))@(s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *))" xml:id="S3.Ex33.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex33.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex33.m1.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex33.m1.3.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex33.m1.3.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>

                          <XMApp>

                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>

              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>In each summand, <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\alpha=\mu\beta" text="lambda * alpha = mu * beta" xml:id="S3.p27.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> implies <Math mode="inline" tex="d(w)=d(\mu)-d(\lambda)=d(\alpha)-d(\beta)" text="d * w = d * mu - d * lambda = d * alpha - d * beta" xml:id="S3.p27.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p27.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p27.m7.1">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p27.m7.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p27.m7.2">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p27.m7.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p27.m7.3">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p27.m7.4"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p27.m7.4">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p27.m7.5"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p27.m7.5">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, so <Math mode="inline" tex="q(w)\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)_{d(w)}" xml:id="S3.p27.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p27.m8.2">w</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p27.m8.3">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p27.m8.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p27.m8.1">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as needed.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p28">
        <p>Now let <Math mode="inline" tex="n\geq 2" text="n &gt;= 2" xml:id="S3.p28.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="q(y)\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)_{d(y)}" xml:id="S3.p28.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p28.m2.2">y</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p28.m2.3">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p28.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p28.m2.1">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every word <Math mode="inline" tex="y" text="y" xml:id="S3.p28.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="|y|\leq n" text="absolute-value@(y) less= n" xml:id="S3.p28.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p28.m4.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p28.m4.1">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="w" text="w" xml:id="S3.p28.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a word with <Math mode="inline" tex="|w|=n+1" text="absolute-value@(w) = n + 1" xml:id="S3.p28.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p28.m6.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p28.m6.1">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="q(w)\not=0" text="q * w not-equals 0" xml:id="S3.p28.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="not-=" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p28.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p28.m7.1">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="w" text="w" xml:id="S3.p28.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> contains a subword <Math mode="inline" tex="w_{i}w_{i+1}=\lambda\mu" text="w _ i * w _ (i + 1) = lambda * mu" xml:id="S3.p28.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda" text="lambda" xml:id="S3.p28.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu" text="mu" xml:id="S3.p28.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are composable in <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S3.p28.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> since otherwise <Math mode="inline" tex="q(\lambda\mu)=0" text="q * lambda * mu = 0" xml:id="S3.p28.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p28.m13.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p28.m13.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="w^{\prime}" text="w ^ prime" xml:id="S3.p28.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be the word obtained from <Math mode="inline" tex="w" text="w" xml:id="S3.p28.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by replacing <Math mode="inline" tex="w_{i}w_{i+1}" text="w _ i * w _ (i + 1)" xml:id="S3.p28.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with the single path <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\mu" text="lambda * mu" xml:id="S3.p28.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex34">
          <Math mode="display" tex="q(w)=s_{w_{1}}\cdots s_{w_{i-1}}s_{\lambda}s_{\mu}s_{w_{i+2}}\cdots s_{w_{n+1}%&#10;}=s_{w_{1}}\cdots s_{w_{i-1}}s_{\lambda\mu}s_{w_{i+2}}\cdots s_{w_{n+1}}=q(w^{%&#10;\prime})." text="q * w = s _ w _ 1 * cdots * s _ w _ (i - 1) * s _ lambda * s _ mu * s _ w _ (i + 2) * cdots * s _ w _ (n + 1) = s _ w _ 1 * cdots * s _ w _ (i - 1) * s _ (lambda * mu) * s _ w _ (i + 2) * cdots * s _ w _ (n + 1) = q * w ^ prime" xml:id="S3.Ex34.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex34.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex34.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
