        </equation>
        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="|w^{\prime}|=n" text="absolute-value@(w ^ prime) = n" xml:id="S3.p28.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p28.m18.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p28.m18.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="d(w^{\prime})=d(w)" text="d * w ^ prime = d * w" xml:id="S3.p28.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p28.m19.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p28.m19.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p28.m19.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p28.m19.1">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the inductive hypothesis implies that <Math mode="inline" tex="q(w)\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)_{d(w)}" xml:id="S3.p28.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p28.m20.2">w</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p28.m20.3">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p28.m20.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p28.m20.1">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. A similar argument shows that <Math mode="inline" tex="q(w)\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)_{d(w)}" xml:id="S3.p28.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p28.m21.2">w</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p28.m21.3">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p28.m21.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p28.m21.1">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> whenever <Math mode="inline" tex="w" text="w" xml:id="S3.p28.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> contains a subword <Math mode="inline" tex="w_{i}w_{i+1}=\lambda^{*}\mu^{*}" text="w _ i * w _ (i + 1) = lambda ^ * * mu ^ *" xml:id="S3.p28.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
<!--  %**** String Line 550 **** --></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.p29">
        <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="w" text="w" xml:id="S3.p29.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> contains no subword of the form <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\mu" text="lambda * mu" xml:id="S3.p29.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda^{*}\mu^{*}" text="lambda ^ * * mu ^ *" xml:id="S3.p29.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then, since <Math mode="inline" tex="|w|\geq 3" text="absolute-value@(w) &gt;= 3" xml:id="S3.p29.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p29.m4.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p29.m4.1">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, it must have a subword of the form <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda^{*}\mu" text="lambda ^ * * mu" xml:id="S3.p29.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. By Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:lspfamily"/> we write <Math mode="inline" tex="q(w)" text="q * w" xml:id="S3.p29.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p29.m6.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p29.m6.1">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as a sum of terms <Math mode="inline" tex="q(y^{i})" text="q * y ^ i" xml:id="S3.p29.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p29.m7.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p29.m7.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="|y^{i}|=n+1" text="absolute-value@(y ^ i) = n + 1" xml:id="S3.p29.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p29.m8.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p29.m8.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="d(y^{i})=d(w)" text="d * y ^ i = d * w" xml:id="S3.p29.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p29.m9.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p29.m9.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p29.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p29.m9.1">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="|w|\geq 3" text="absolute-value@(w) &gt;= 3" xml:id="S3.p29.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p29.m10.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p29.m10.1">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, each nonzero summand <Math mode="inline" tex="q(y^{i})" text="q * y ^ i" xml:id="S3.p29.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p29.m11.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p29.m11.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> contains a factor of the form <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\beta^{*}}s_{\gamma^{*}}" text="s _ (beta ^ *) * s _ (gamma ^ *)" xml:id="S3.p29.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> or one of the form <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\delta}s_{\alpha}" text="s _ delta * s _ alpha" xml:id="S3.p29.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and the argument above shows that every <Math mode="inline" tex="q(y^{i})\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)_{d(w)}" xml:id="S3.p29.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p29.m14.2">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p29.m14.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p29.m14.1">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="q(w)\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)_{d(w)}" xml:id="S3.p29.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p29.m15.2">w</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p29.m15.3">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p29.m15.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p29.m15.1">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as well.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
  </section>
  <section inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:sec-uniquenessthms" xml:id="S4">
    <tags>
      <tag>4</tag>
      <tag role="refnum">4</tag>
      <tag role="typerefnum">§4</tag>
    </tags>
    <title><tag close=". ">4</tag>The uniqueness theorems</title>
    <toctitle><tag close=" ">4</tag>The uniqueness theorems</toctitle>
    <para xml:id="S4.p1">
      <p>Throughout this section, <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S4.p1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S4.p1.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graph, and <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S4.p1.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a commutative ring with <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S4.p1.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p2">
      <p>There are two uniqueness theorems in the theory of Kumjian-Pask algebras. The graded-uniqueness theorem has no hypotheses on the graph, so
applies very generally. The Cuntz-Krieger uniqueness theorem assumes the graph satisfies an “aperiodicity” condition.
The proofs of both theorems are straightforward once key helper-results (Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:AaHRS4.3"/> and Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:aperiodic"/>) have been established.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_thm" inlist="thm theorem:thm" labels="LABEL:gut" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem 4.1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">4.1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem 4.1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem 4.1</text></tag> (The graded-uniqueness theorem).</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph.
Suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{Z}}^{k}" text="Z ^ k" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graded <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-algebra and
<Math mode="inline" tex="\phi:\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)\to A" text="phi colon (KP _ R)@(Lambda) to A" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.1">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a graded <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-algebra
homomorphism. If <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi(rp_{v})\neq 0" text="phi * r * p _ v not-equals 0" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m8.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m8.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for all <Math mode="inline" tex="r\in R\setminus\{0\}" text="r element-of R set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m9.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m9.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,
then <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is injective.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_thm" inlist="thm theorem:thm" labels="LABEL:ckthm" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem 4.2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">4.2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem 4.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem 4.2</text></tag> (The Cuntz-Krieger uniqueness theorem).</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph satisfying the aperiodicity condition</text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:aperiodic" xml:id="S4.E1">
          <tags>
            <tag>(4.1)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">4.1</tag>
          </tags>
          <text class="ltx_markedasmath" font="italic">for every <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S4.E1.m1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, there exists <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in v\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="x element-of v * Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S4.E1.m1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha\neq\beta" text="alpha not-equals beta" xml:id="S4.E1.m1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> implies <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha x\neq\beta x" text="alpha * x not-equals beta * x" xml:id="S4.E1.m1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi:\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)\to A" text="phi colon (KP _ R)@(Lambda) to A" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m3.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m3.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m3.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m3.1">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
<!--  %**** String Line 575 **** -->be an <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-algebra homomorphism into an <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi(rp_{v})\neq 0" text="phi * r * p _ v not-equals 0" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m7.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m7.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for all <Math mode="inline" tex="r\in R\setminus\{0\}" text="r element-of R set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m8.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m8.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is injective.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S4.p3">
      <p>The aperiodicity condition (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:aperiodic"/>) we have chosen to use is from
<cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RSY03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Theorem 4.3]</cite>, is often called ‘condition <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S4.p3.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>’ in the literature, and generalises the many notions of
‘aperiodicity’ for <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S4.p3.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graphs without sources. See Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem-pain"/> below for more details.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p4">
      <p>We start by establishing that every nonzero element of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S4.p4.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p4.m1.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p4.m1.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p4.m1.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p4.m1.1">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> can be
written in a certain form; this form differs from the one for graphs without sources only in the use of
<Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S4.p4.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in place of <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{n}" text="Lambda ^ n" xml:id="S4.p4.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:lem:11" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 4.3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">4.3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 4.3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 4.3</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Every nonzero <Math mode="inline" tex="a\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="a element-of (KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m1.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m1.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
can be written in normal form: that is, there exists <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{N}}^{k}\setminus\{0\}" text="n element-of N ^ k set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
and a finite subset <Math mode="inline" tex="F" text="F" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda\times\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="Lambda * Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that</text></p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex1">
          <Math mode="display" tex="a=\sum_{(\alpha,\beta)\in F}r_{\alpha,\beta}s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}" text="a = (sum _ (open-interval@(alpha, beta) element-of F))@(r _ (list@(alpha, beta)) * s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *))" xml:id="S4.Ex1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex1.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex1.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex1.m1.1">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex1.m1.2">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex1.m1.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex1.m1.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex1.m1.3">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex1.m1.4">β</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">where <Math mode="inline" tex="r_{\alpha,\beta}\in R\setminus\{0\}" text="r _ (list@(alpha, beta)) element-of R set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m5.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m5.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m5.1">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m5.2">β</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m5.3"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m5.3">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\alpha)=s(\beta)" text="s * alpha = s * beta" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m6.1">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m6.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m6.2">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for all <Math mode="inline" tex="(\alpha,\beta)\in F" text="open-interval@(alpha, beta) element-of F" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m7.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m7.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m7.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm3.p1.m7.2">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.p5">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="0\neq a\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="0 not-equals a element-of (KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S4.p5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m1.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m1.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p5.m1.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p5.m1.1">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. By Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor-span"/> we can write <Math mode="inline" tex="a" text="a" xml:id="S4.p5.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as a finite sum</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex2">
          <Math mode="display" tex="a=\sum_{(\mu,\nu)\in G}r_{\mu,\nu}s_{\mu}s_{\nu^{*}}," text="a = (sum _ (open-interval@(mu, nu) element-of G))@(r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * s _ mu * s _ (nu ^ *))" xml:id="S4.Ex2.m1">

          </Math>
        </equation>

            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then, using (KP2) and (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S4.p5.m10">

        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex3">
          <Math mode="display" tex="s_{\mu}s_{\nu^{*}}=s_{\mu}p_{s(\mu)}s_{\nu^{*}}=s_{\mu}\Big{(}\sum_{\lambda\in&#10;s%&#10;(\mu)\Lambda^{\leq n-d(\nu)}}s_{\lambda}s_{\lambda^{*}}\Big{)}s_{\nu{*}}=\sum_%&#10;{\lambda\in s(\mu)\Lambda^{\leq n-d(\nu)}}s_{\mu\lambda}s_{(\nu\lambda)^{*}}." text="s _ mu * s _ (nu ^ *) = s _ mu * p _ (s * mu) * s _ (nu ^ *) = s _ mu * (sum _ (lambda element-of s * mu * Lambda ^ (absent less= n - d * nu)))@(s _ lambda * s _ (lambda ^ *)) * s _ (list@(nu, *)) = (sum _ (lambda element-of s * mu * Lambda ^ (absent less= n - d * nu)))@(s _ (mu * lambda) * s _ ((nu * lambda) ^ *))" xml:id="S4.Ex3.m1">

                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex3.m1.4">ν</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">⁣</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="S4.Ex3.m1.5">*</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex3.m1.7"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex3.m1.7">μ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                                <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex3.m1.6"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex3.m1.6">ν</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex3.m1.8"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex3.m1.8">
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Substituting back into the expression for <Math mode="inline" tex="a" text="a" xml:id="S4.p5.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and combining terms gives the result.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S4.p6">
      <p>Next we generalise <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="BaH" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 2.3(1)]</cite> to graphs with possible sources.</p>
    </para>

        <p><text font="italic">and the <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graded component <Math mode="inline" tex="r_{\mu,\nu}p_{s(\mu)}" text="r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * p _ (s * mu)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m4.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m4.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m4.1">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m4.2">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m4.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m4.3">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\mu^{*}}as_{\nu}" text="s _ (mu ^ *) * a * s _ nu" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is nonzero.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.p7">
        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="a" text="a" xml:id="S4.p7.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is in normal form, <Math mode="inline" tex="F\subseteq\Lambda\times\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="F subset-of-or-equals Lambda * Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S4.p7.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{N}}^{k}\setminus\{0\}" text="n element-of N ^ k set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S4.p7.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m3.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p7.m3.1">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Fix <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mu,\nu)\in F" text="open-interval@(mu, nu) element-of F" xml:id="S4.p7.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m4.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m4.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m4.1">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m4.2">ν</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. For all <Math mode="inline" tex="(\alpha,\beta)\in F" text="open-interval@(alpha, beta) element-of F" xml:id="S4.p7.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m5.1">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m5.2">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, both <Math mode="inline" tex="\beta" text="beta" xml:id="S4.p7.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu\in\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="nu element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S4.p7.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and hence (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S4.p7.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) gives <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\beta^{*}}s_{\nu}=\delta_{\beta,\nu}p_{s(\nu)}" text="s _ (beta ^ *) * s _ nu = delta _ (list@(beta, nu)) * p _ (s * nu)" xml:id="S4.p7.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m9.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m9.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m9.1">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m9.2">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m9.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m9.3">ν</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx8">
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex4">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle s_{\mu^{*}}as_{\nu}=\sum_{(\alpha,\beta)\in F}r_{\alpha,\beta}s_%&#10;{\mu^{*}}s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}s_{\nu}=\sum_{(\alpha,\nu)\in F}r_{\alpha,\nu}%&#10;s_{\mu^{*}}s_{\alpha}p_{s(\nu)}" text="s _ (mu ^ *) * a * s _ nu = (sum _ (open-interval@(alpha, beta) element-of F))@(r _ (list@(alpha, beta)) * s _ (mu ^ *) * s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *) * s _ nu) = (sum _ (open-interval@(alpha, nu) element-of F))@(r _ (list@(alpha, nu)) * s _ (mu ^ *) * s _ alpha * p _ (s * nu))" xml:id="S4.Ex4.m3">

                <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle s_{\mu^{*}}as_{\nu}" text="s _ (mu ^ *) * a * s _ nu" xml:id="S4.Ex4.m1">
                    <XMath>
