                <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle=\sum_{(\alpha,\beta)\in F}r_{\alpha,\beta}s_{\mu^{*}}s_{\alpha}s%&#10;_{\beta^{*}}s_{\nu}=\sum_{(\alpha,\nu)\in F}r_{\alpha,\nu}s_{\mu^{*}}s_{\alpha%&#10;}p_{s(\nu)}" text="absent = (sum _ (open-interval@(alpha, beta) element-of F))@(r _ (list@(alpha, beta)) * s _ (mu ^ *) * s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *) * s _ nu) = (sum _ (open-interval@(alpha, nu) element-of F))@(r _ (list@(alpha, nu)) * s _ (mu ^ *) * s _ alpha * p _ (s * nu))" xml:id="S4.Ex4.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>

                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex4.m2.3">α</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex4.m2.4">β</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>

                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m15.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m15.2">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S4.p7.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) implies that <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\mu^{*}}s_{\alpha}=0" text="s _ (mu ^ *) * s _ alpha = 0" xml:id="S4.p7.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex6">
          <Math mode="display" tex="s_{\mu^{*}}as_{\nu}=r_{\mu,\nu}p_{s(\mu)}+\sum_{(\alpha,\nu)\in F,d(\alpha)%&#10;\neq d(\mu)}r_{\alpha,\nu}s_{\mu^{*}}s_{\alpha}." text="s _ (mu ^ *) * a * s _ nu = r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * p _ (s * mu) + (sum _ (formulae@(open-interval@(alpha, nu) element-of F, d * alpha not-equals d * mu)))@(r _ (list@(alpha, nu)) * s _ (mu ^ *) * s _ alpha)" xml:id="S4.Ex6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>

        </equation>
        <p>It now follows that the <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="S4.p7.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graded component of <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\mu^{*}}as_{\nu}" text="s _ (mu ^ *) * a * s _ nu" xml:id="S4.p7.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="r_{\mu,\nu}p_{s(\mu)}" text="r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * p _ (s * mu)" xml:id="S4.p7.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m20.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m20.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m20.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m20.2">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m20.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m20.3">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, which is nonzero by Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm-KP"/>(<ref labelref="LABEL:item-a"/>). Now <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\mu^{*}}as_{\nu}" text="s _ (mu ^ *) * a * s _ nu" xml:id="S4.p7.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is nonzero because its <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="S4.p7.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graded component is.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:gut"/>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.p8">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="0\neq a\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="0 not-equals a element-of (KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S4.p8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m1.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m1.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m1.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m1.1">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Write
<Math mode="inline" tex="a=\sum_{(\alpha,\beta)\in F}r_{\alpha,\beta}s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}" text="a = (sum _ (open-interval@(alpha, beta) element-of F))@(r _ (list@(alpha, beta)) * s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *))" xml:id="S4.p8.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m2.1">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m2.2">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m2.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m2.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m2.3">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m2.4">β</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in normal form. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mu,\nu)\in F" text="open-interval@(mu, nu) element-of F" xml:id="S4.p8.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m3.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m3.1">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m3.2">ν</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. By Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:AaHRS4.3"/>,</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex7">
          <Math mode="display" tex="0\neq s_{\mu^{*}}as_{\nu}=r_{\mu,\nu}p_{s(\mu)}+\sum_{(\alpha,\nu)\in F,d(%&#10;\alpha)\neq d(\mu)}r_{\alpha,\nu}s_{\mu^{*}}s_{\alpha}" text="0 not-equals s _ (mu ^ *) * a * s _ nu = r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * p _ (s * mu) + (sum _ (formulae@(open-interval@(alpha, nu) element-of F, d * alpha not-equals d * mu)))@(r _ (list@(alpha, nu)) * s _ (mu ^ *) * s _ alpha)" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.2">ν</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.3">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.8"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.9"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.8">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.4"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.5"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.4">α</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.5">ν</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.9">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.6"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.6">α</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.7"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.7">μ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.10"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex7.m1.11"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.10">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex7.m1.11">ν</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>with <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="S4.p8.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graded component <Math mode="inline" tex="r_{\mu,\nu}p_{s(\mu)}" text="r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * p _ (s * mu)" xml:id="S4.p8.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m5.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m5.2">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m5.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m5.3">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S4.p8.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is graded,
<Math mode="inline" tex="\phi(r_{\mu,\nu}p_{s(\mu)})" text="phi * r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * p _ (s * mu)" xml:id="S4.p8.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m7.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m7.4">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m7.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m7.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m7.1">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m7.2">ν</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m7.3"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m7.3">μ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="S4.p8.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graded component of
<Math mode="inline" tex="\phi(s_{\mu^{*}}as_{\nu})" text="phi * s _ (mu ^ *) * a * s _ nu" xml:id="S4.p8.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m9.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m9.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Now <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi(s_{\mu^{*}})\phi(a)\phi(s_{\nu})=\phi(s_{\mu^{*}}as_{\nu})\neq 0" text="phi * s _ (mu ^ *) * phi * a * phi * s _ nu = phi * s _ (mu ^ *) * a * s _ nu not-equals 0" xml:id="S4.p8.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m10.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m10.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m10.1">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m10.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m10.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m10.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m10.4">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> because its <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="S4.p8.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-graded component <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi(r_{\mu,\nu}p_{s(\mu})\neq 0" text="phi * r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * p _ [s(μ] not-equals 0" xml:id="S4.p8.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m12.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m12.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m12.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m12.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m12.1">μ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m12.2">ν</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                          <XMArg rule="Subscript">
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMArg>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by assumption. It follows that <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi(a)\neq 0" text="phi * a not-equals 0" xml:id="S4.p8.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m13.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m13.1">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as well. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S4.p8.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is injective.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S4.p9">
      <p>One immediate application of the Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:gut"/> is:</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_prop" inlist="thm theorem:prop" xml:id="S4.Thmthm5">
      <tags>
        <tag>Proposition 4.5</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">4.5</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Proposition 4.5</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Proposition 4.5</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.Thmthm5.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S4.Thmthm5.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S4.Thmthm5.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{\mathbb{C}}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ C)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm5.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm5.p1.m3.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm5.p1.m3.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm5.p1.m3.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard upright" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm5.p1.m3.1">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is isomorphic to
a dense subalgebra of <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(\Lambda)" text="C ^ * * Lambda" xml:id="S4.Thmthm5.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm5.p1.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm5.p1.m4.1">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
<!--  %**** String Line 650 **** --></text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.p10">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,t)" text="open-interval@(q, t)" xml:id="S4.p10.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m1.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m1.1">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m1.2">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a generating Cuntz-Krieger <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S4.p10.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family in <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(\Lambda)" text="C ^ * * Lambda" xml:id="S4.p10.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m3.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RSY03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Definition 3.3]</cite>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,t)" text="open-interval@(q, t)" xml:id="S4.p10.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m4.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m4.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m4.1">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m4.2">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S4.p10.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family
in <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(\Lambda)" text="C ^ * * Lambda" xml:id="S4.p10.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m6.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m6.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. (To see this, recall that (KP1) and
(KP2) hold, (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S4.p10.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) and (CK4) are the same and (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S4.p10.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) and (CK3) are the same via Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor-altKP3'"/>.) Thus the universal property of
<Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{\mathbb{C}}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ C)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S4.p10.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m9.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m9.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p10.m9.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m9.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm-KP"/> gives a homomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{q,t}" text="pi _ (list@(q, t))" xml:id="S4.p10.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>

                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m10.1"/>

                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m10.1">q</XMTok>

                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m10.2">t</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> from <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{\mathbb{C}}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ C)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S4.p10.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m11.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m11.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p10.m11.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m11.1">Λ</XMTok>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> onto the dense
subalgebra</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex8">
          <Math mode="display" tex="A:={\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{t_{\lambda}t_{\mu}^{*}:\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda\}" text="A assign span@(t _ lambda * (t _ mu) ^ * colon list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda)" xml:id="S4.Ex8.m1">

        <p>of <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(\Lambda)" text="C ^ * * Lambda" xml:id="S4.p10.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

          </Math>.
To show that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{q,t}" text="pi _ (list@(q, t))" xml:id="S4.p10.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m13.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m13.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m13.1">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m13.2">t</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is injective, we will use the gauge-invariant uniqueness theorem, Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:gut"/>.
Consider the subgroups</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex9">
          <Math mode="display" tex="A_{n}:={\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{t_{\lambda}t_{\mu}^{*}:d(\lambda)-d(\mu%&#10;)=n\}\quad(n\in{\mathbb{Z}}^{k})" xml:id="S4.Ex9.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

              <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.Ex9.m1.3">span</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex9.m1.2">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.p10.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. A calculation using Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor-altKP3'"/> shows that <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{n}A_{m}\subseteq A_{n+m}" text="A _ n * A _ m subset-of-or-equals A _ (n + m)" xml:id="S4.p10.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Since each spanning element <Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\mu}t_{\nu}^{*}" text="t _ mu * (t _ nu) ^ *" xml:id="S4.p10.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.p10.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> belongs to <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{d(\lambda)-d(\mu)}" text="A _ (d * lambda - d * mu)" xml:id="S4.p10.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m18.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m18.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m18.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m18.2">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, every element <Math mode="inline" tex="a" text="a" xml:id="S4.p10.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.p10.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> can be written as a finite sum <Math mode="inline" tex="\sum a_{n}" text="sum@(a _ n)" xml:id="S4.p10.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="a_{n}\in A_{n}" text="a _ n element-of A _ n" xml:id="S4.p10.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="a_{n}\in A_{n}" text="a _ n element-of A _ n" xml:id="S4.p10.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and a finite sum <Math mode="inline" tex="\sum a_{n}=0" text="sum@(a _ n) = 0" xml:id="S4.p10.m24">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then each <Math mode="inline" tex="a_{n}=0" text="a _ n = 0" xml:id="S4.p10.m25">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by the argument of the proof of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 7.4]</cite>, which uses the gauge action of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{T}}^{k}" text="T ^ k" xml:id="S4.p10.m26">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(\Lambda)" text="C ^ * * Lambda" xml:id="S4.p10.m27">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m27.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m27.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\{A_{n}:n\in{\mathbb{Z}}^{k}\}" text="conditional-set@(A _ n, n element-of Z ^ k)" xml:id="S4.p10.m28">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m28.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m28.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p10.m28.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p10.m28.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a grading of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.p10.m29">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. It follows that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{q,t}" text="pi _ (list@(q, t))" xml:id="S4.p10.m30">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m30.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m30.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m30.1">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m30.2">t</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is graded and hence is injective by Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:gut"/>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_prop" inlist="thm theorem:prop" labels="LABEL:prop:aperiodic" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6">
      <tags>
        <tag>Proposition 4.6</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">4.6</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Proposition 4.6</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Proposition 4.6</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph satisfying the aperiodicity condition (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:aperiodic"/>).
Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="0\neq a=\sum_{(\alpha,\beta)\in F}r_{\alpha,\beta}s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}\in%&#10;\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="0 not-equals a = (sum _ (open-interval@(alpha, beta) element-of F))@(r _ (list@(alpha, beta)) * s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *)) element-of (KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m3.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m3.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m3.1">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m3.2">β</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m3.3"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m3.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m3.3">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m3.4">β</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m3.6"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m3.5"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m3.6">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m3.5">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is in normal form. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mu,\nu)\in F" text="open-interval@(mu, nu) element-of F" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m4.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m4.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m4.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m4.2">ν</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
Then there exist <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma,\tau\in\Lambda" text="list@(sigma, tau) element-of Lambda" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m5.1">σ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="tau" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m5.2">τ</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such
that <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\sigma^{*}}as_{\tau}=r_{\mu,\nu}p_{s(\mu)}" text="s _ (sigma ^ *) * a * s _ tau = r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * p _ (s * mu)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m6.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m6.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m6.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m6.2">ν</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m6.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm6.p1.m6.3">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>

<!--  %**** String Line 675 **** -->    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.p11">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mu,\nu)\in F" text="open-interval@(mu, nu) element-of F" xml:id="S4.p11.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. By Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:AaHRS4.3"/>,</p>

                      <XMApp>

                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
