                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.E3.m1.8"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.E3.m1.9"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.E3.m1.8">
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.E3.m1.4"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.E3.m1.5"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E3.m1.4">α</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E3.m1.5">ν</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.E3.m1.9">
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.E3.m1.6"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E3.m1.6">α</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.E3.m1.7"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E3.m1.7">μ</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.E3.m1.10"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.E3.m1.11"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E3.m1.10">α</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E3.m1.11">ν</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="G:=\{\alpha:(\alpha,\nu)\in F,d(\alpha)\neq d(\mu)\}=\emptyset" text="G assign conditional-set@(alpha, formulae@(open-interval@(alpha, nu) element-of F, d * alpha not-equals d * mu)) = empty-set" xml:id="S4.p11.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p11.m2.5"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p11.m2.6"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p11.m2.5">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S4.p11.m2.6">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p11.m2.6.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p11.m2.6.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.p11.m2.6.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.p11.m2.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.p11.m2.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p11.m2.1">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p11.m2.2">ν</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.p11.m2.6.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.p11.m2.3"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p11.m2.3">α</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.p11.m2.4"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p11.m2.4">μ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> then we can take <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma=\mu" text="sigma = mu" xml:id="S4.p11.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\tau=\nu" text="tau = nu" xml:id="S4.p11.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and we are done. So suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="G\neq\emptyset" text="G not-equals empty-set" xml:id="S4.p11.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S4.p12">
        <p>Choose <Math mode="inline" tex="y\in s(\mu)\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="y element-of s * mu * Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S4.p12.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p12.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p12.m1.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:aperiodic"/>) holds. Then for each
<Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha\in G" text="alpha element-of G" xml:id="S4.p12.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha y\neq\mu y" text="alpha * y not-equals mu * y" xml:id="S4.p12.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
So there exists <Math mode="inline" tex="m_{\alpha}\in{\mathbb{N}}^{k}" text="m _ alpha element-of N ^ k" xml:id="S4.p12.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that
<Math mode="inline" tex="(\alpha y)(0,m_{\alpha})\neq(\mu y)(0,m_{\alpha})" text="alpha * y * open-interval@(0, m _ alpha) not-equals mu * y * open-interval@(0, m _ alpha)" xml:id="S4.p12.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p12.m5.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p12.m5.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p12.m5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p12.m5.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p12.m5.1">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p12.m5.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p12.m5.5"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p12.m5.5">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p12.m5.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p12.m5.6"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p12.m5.2">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p12.m5.6">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let
<Math mode="inline" tex="m:=\bigvee_{\alpha\in G}m_{\alpha}" text="m assign (or _ (alpha element-of G))@(m _ alpha)" xml:id="S4.p12.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="or" name="bigvee" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⋁</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. For later use we note that since <Math mode="inline" tex="m_{\alpha}\leq d(y)+d(\alpha)" text="m _ alpha less= d * y + d * alpha" xml:id="S4.p12.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p12.m7.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p12.m7.1">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p12.m7.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p12.m7.2">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, taking the meet of both sides with <Math mode="inline" tex="m" text="m" xml:id="S4.p12.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we get</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex10">
          <Math mode="display" tex="m_{\alpha}=m\wedge m_{\alpha}\leq m\wedge(d(y)+d(\alpha))\leq m\wedge d(y)+d(%&#10;\alpha);" text="m _ alpha = m and m _ alpha less= m and (d * y + d * alpha) less= (m and d * y) + d * alpha" xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex10.m1.5"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex10.m1.5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1.5.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex10.m1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1.1">y</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex10.m1.2"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1.2">α</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex10.m1.3"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1.3">y</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex10.m1.4"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex10.m1.4">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>the same argument gives <Math mode="inline" tex="m_{\alpha}\leq m\wedge d(y)+d(\mu)" text="m _ alpha less= (m and d * y) + d * mu" xml:id="S4.p12.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p12.m9.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p12.m9.1">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p12.m9.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p12.m9.2">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S4.p13">
        <p>We would like to use <Math mode="inline" tex="y(0,m)" text="y * open-interval@(0, m)" xml:id="S4.p13.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p13.m1.1">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p13.m1.2">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> now, but since <Math mode="inline" tex="y" text="y" xml:id="S4.p13.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a boundary path this may not be well-defined, so we will use <Math mode="inline" tex="y(0,m\wedge d(y))" text="y * open-interval@(0, m and d * y)" xml:id="S4.p13.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m3.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m3.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p13.m3.2">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m3.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m3.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p13.m3.1">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> instead.
Then, using (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:Lem4.4"/>),</p>

          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex12">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle=r_{\mu,\nu}s_{y(0,m\wedge d(y))^{*}}p_{s(\mu)}s_{y(0,m\wedge d(y%&#10;))}+\sum_{\alpha\in G}r_{\alpha,\nu}s_{y(0,m\wedge d(y))^{*}}s_{\mu^{*}}s_{%&#10;\alpha}s_{y(0,m\wedge d(y))}" text="absent = r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * s _ (y * (open-interval@(0, m and d * y)) ^ *) * p _ (s * mu) * s _ (y * open-interval@(0, m and d * y)) + (sum _ (alpha element-of G))@(r _ (list@(alpha, nu)) * s _ (y * (open-interval@(0, m and d * y)) ^ *) * s _ (mu ^ *) * s _ alpha * s _ (y * open-interval@(0, m and d * y)))" xml:id="S4.Ex12.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex12.m3.4"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex12.m3.5"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.Ex12.m3.4">0</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex12.m3.5">
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex12.m3.3"/>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex12.m3.3">y</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>

          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex13">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle=r_{\mu,\nu}p_{s(\mu)}+\sum_{\{\alpha\in G:\alpha\neq\mu\}}r_{%&#10;\alpha,\nu}s_{(\mu y(0,m\wedge d(y)))^{*}}s_{\alpha y(0,m\wedge d(y))}" text="absent = r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * p _ (s * mu) + (sum _ (conditional-set@(alpha element-of G, alpha not-equals mu)))@(r _ (list@(alpha, nu)) * s _ ((mu * y * open-interval@(0, m and d * y)) ^ *) * s _ (alpha * y * open-interval@(0, m and d * y)))" xml:id="S4.Ex13.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>

          <p class="ltx_intertext">because <Math mode="inline" tex="r(y)=s(\mu)" text="r * y = s * mu" xml:id="S4.Ex14.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>

              </XMath>
            </Math> and (KP2), and then (KP3), all on the first summand. After composing paths this</p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex15">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle=r_{\mu,\nu}p_{s(\mu)}+\sum_{\alpha\in G}r_{\alpha,\nu}s_{(\mu y)%&#10;(0,m\wedge d(y)+d(\mu))^{*}}s_{(\alpha y)(0,m\wedge d(y)+d(\alpha))}." text="absent = r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * p _ (s * mu) + (sum _ (alpha element-of G))@(r _ (list@(alpha, nu)) * s _ (mu * y * (open-interval@(0, (m and d * y) + d * mu)) ^ *) * s _ (alpha * y * open-interval@(0, (m and d * y) + d * alpha)))" xml:id="S4.Ex15.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex15.m3.16"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex15.m3.16">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex15.m3.1"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex15.m3.2"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex15.m3.1">μ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex15.m3.2">ν</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex15.m3.3"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex15.m3.3">μ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>

        <p>We claim that for every <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha\in G" text="alpha element-of G" xml:id="S4.p13.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{(\mu y)(0,m\wedge d(y)+d(\mu))^{*}}s_{(\alpha y)(0,m\wedge d(y)+d(\alpha))}=0" text="s _ (mu * y * (open-interval@(0, (m and d * y) + d * mu)) ^ *) * s _ (alpha * y * open-interval@(0, (m and d * y) + d * alpha)) = 0" xml:id="S4.p13.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m5.4"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m5.4">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m5.3"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m5.5"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p13.m5.3">0</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m5.5">
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m5.1"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p13.m5.1">y</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m5.2"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p13.m5.2">μ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m5.9"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m5.9">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m5.8"/>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p13.m5.8">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m5.10">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m5.6"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p13.m5.6">y</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m5.7"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p13.m5.7">α</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
To see this, by way of contradiction, suppose there
exists <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha\in G" text="alpha element-of G" xml:id="S4.p13.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex16">
          <Math mode="display" tex="s_{(\mu y)(0,m\wedge d(y)+d(\mu))^{*}}s_{(\alpha y)(0,m\wedge d(y)+d(\alpha))}%&#10;\neq 0." text="s _ (mu * y * (open-interval@(0, (m and d * y) + d * mu)) ^ *) * s _ (alpha * y * open-interval@(0, (m and d * y) + d * alpha)) not-equals 0" xml:id="S4.Ex16.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex16.m1.11"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex16.m1.11">
                    <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex16.m1.4"/>

                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="m_{\alpha}\leq m\wedge d(y)+d(\mu)" text="m _ alpha less= (m and d * y) + d * mu" xml:id="S4.p13.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m7.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p13.m7.1">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m7.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p13.m7.2">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="m_{\alpha}\leq m\wedge d(y)+d(\alpha)" text="m _ alpha less= (m and d * y) + d * alpha" xml:id="S4.p13.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m8.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p13.m8.1">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m8.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p13.m8.2">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we must have <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{(\mu y)(0,m_{\alpha})^{*}}s_{(\alpha y)(0,m_{\alpha})}\neq 0" text="s _ (mu * y * (open-interval@(0, m _ alpha)) ^ *) * s _ (alpha * y * open-interval@(0, m _ alpha)) not-equals 0" xml:id="S4.p13.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m9.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m9.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m9.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m9.3"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p13.m9.1">0</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m9.3">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m9.5"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m9.5">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m9.4"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m9.6"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p13.m9.4">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m9.6">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. But <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mu y)(0,m_{\alpha})" text="mu * y * open-interval@(0, m _ alpha)" xml:id="S4.p13.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m10.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m10.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m10.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m10.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p13.m10.1">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m10.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and (<Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha y)(0,m_{\alpha})\in\Lambda^{\leq m_{\alpha}}" xml:id="S4.p13.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              <XMApp role="POSTSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and hence <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mu y)(0,m_{\alpha})=(\alpha y)(0,m_{\alpha})" text="mu * y * open-interval@(0, m _ alpha) = alpha * y * open-interval@(0, m _ alpha)" xml:id="S4.p13.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m12.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m12.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m12.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m12.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p13.m12.1">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m12.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m12.5"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m12.5">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m12.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m12.6"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p13.m12.2">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m12.6">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S4.p13.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>),
contradicting our choice of <Math mode="inline" tex="m_{\alpha}" text="m _ alpha" xml:id="S4.p13.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. This proves the claim.
Therefore</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex17">
          <Math mode="display" tex="s_{y(0,m\wedge d(y))^{*}}(s_{\mu^{*}}as_{\nu})s_{y(0,m\wedge d(y))}=r_{\mu,\nu%&#10;}p_{s(\mu)}." text="s _ (y * (open-interval@(0, m and d * y)) ^ *) * s _ (mu ^ *) * a * s _ nu * s _ (y * open-interval@(0, m and d * y)) = r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * p _ (s * mu)" xml:id="S4.Ex17.m1">
