                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>The proposition follows with <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma:=\mu y(0,m\wedge d(y))" text="sigma assign mu * y * open-interval@(0, m and d * y)" xml:id="S4.p13.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m15.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m15.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p13.m15.2">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m15.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m15.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p13.m15.1">y</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="\tau:=\nu y(0,m\wedge d(y))" text="tau assign nu * y * open-interval@(0, m and d * y)" xml:id="S4.p13.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m16.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m16.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p13.m16.2">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p13.m16.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.p13.m16.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p13.m16.1">y</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:ckthm"/>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.p14">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="0\neq a\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="0 not-equals a element-of (KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S4.p14.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m1.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m1.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p14.m1.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m1.1">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Write
<Math mode="inline" tex="a=\sum_{(\alpha,\beta)\in F}r_{\alpha,\beta}s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}" text="a = (sum _ (open-interval@(alpha, beta) element-of F))@(r _ (list@(alpha, beta)) * s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *))" xml:id="S4.p14.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m2.1">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m2.2">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m2.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m2.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m2.3">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m2.4">β</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in normal form.
Fix <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mu,\nu)\in F" text="open-interval@(mu, nu) element-of F" xml:id="S4.p14.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m3.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m3.1">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m3.2">ν</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S4.p14.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> satisfies the aperiodicity condition (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:aperiodic"/>),
by Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:aperiodic"/>
there exist <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma,\tau\in\Lambda" text="list@(sigma, tau) element-of Lambda" xml:id="S4.p14.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m5.1">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m5.2">τ</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that
<Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\sigma}^{*}as_{\tau}=r_{\mu,\nu}p_{s(\mu)}" text="(s _ sigma) ^ * * a * s _ tau = r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * p _ (s * mu)" xml:id="S4.p14.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m6.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m6.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m6.1">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m6.2">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m6.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m6.3">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Now
<Math mode="inline" tex="\phi(s_{\sigma}^{*})\phi(a)\phi(s_{\tau})=\phi(s_{\sigma}^{*}as_{\tau})=\phi(r%&#10;_{\mu,\nu}p_{s(\mu)})\neq 0" text="phi * (s _ sigma) ^ * * phi * a * phi * s _ tau = phi * (s _ sigma) ^ * * a * s _ tau = phi * r _ (list@(mu, nu)) * p _ (s * mu) not-equals 0" xml:id="S4.p14.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m7.5"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p14.m7.5">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m7.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m7.4">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m7.6"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p14.m7.6">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m7.7"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p14.m7.7">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m7.8"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p14.m7.8">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m7.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m7.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m7.1">μ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m7.2">ν</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m7.3"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m7.3">μ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by assumption, and hence <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi(a)\neq 0" text="phi * a not-equals 0" xml:id="S4.p14.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p14.m8.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p14.m8.1">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as well. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S4.p14.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is injective.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
<!--  %**** String Line 725 **** -->  </section>
  <section inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:sec-Bratteli" xml:id="S5">
    <tags>
      <tag>5</tag>
      <tag role="refnum">5</tag>
      <tag role="typerefnum">§5</tag>
    </tags>
    <title><tag close=". ">5</tag>Examples of <Math mode="inline" tex="2" text="2" xml:id="S5.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
        </XMath>
      </Math>-graphs with sources<break/>and applications to rank-<Math mode="inline" tex="2" text="2" xml:id="S5.m2">
        <XMath>
          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
        </XMath>
      </Math> Bratteli diagrams</title>
    <toctitle><tag close=" ">5</tag>Examples of <Math mode="inline" tex="2" text="2" xml:id="S5.m3">
        <XMath>
          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
        </XMath>
      </Math>-graphs with sources<break/>and applications to rank-<Math mode="inline" tex="2" text="2" xml:id="S5.m4">
        <XMath>
          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
        </XMath>
      </Math> Bratteli diagrams</toctitle>
    <para xml:id="S5.p1">
      <p>Throughout this section, <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.p1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a commutative ring with <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S5.p1.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S5.p1.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be a <Math mode="inline" tex="2" text="2" xml:id="S5.p1.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graph. We refer to the morphisms of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="(n_{1},0)" text="open-interval@(n _ 1, 0)" xml:id="S5.p1.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p1.m5.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p1.m5.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p1.m5.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S5.p1.m5.1">0</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> as blue paths,
to the morphisms of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="(0,n_{2})" text="open-interval@(0, n _ 2)" xml:id="S5.p1.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p1.m6.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p1.m6.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S5.p1.m6.1">0</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p1.m6.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> as red paths, and write <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{blue}}}}" text="Lambda ^ blue" xml:id="S5.p1.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">blue</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{red}}}}" text="Lambda ^ red" xml:id="S5.p1.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">red</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for the collection of blue and red paths, respectively.
We say a path <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\in\Lambda" text="lambda element-of Lambda" xml:id="S5.p1.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)\neq 0" text="d * lambda not-equals 0" xml:id="S5.p1.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p1.m10.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p1.m10.1">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">cycle</text> if
<Math mode="inline" tex="r(\lambda)=s(\lambda)" text="r * lambda = s * lambda" xml:id="S5.p1.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p1.m11.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p1.m11.1">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p1.m11.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p1.m11.2">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and for <Math mode="inline" tex="0&lt;n\ &lt;d(\lambda)" text="0 less n less d * lambda" xml:id="S5.p1.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="5.0pt">n</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p1.m12.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p1.m12.1">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda(n)\neq s(\lambda)" text="lambda * n not-equals s * lambda" xml:id="S5.p1.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p1.m13.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p1.m13.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p1.m13.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p1.m13.2">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
We say a cycle <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda" text="lambda" xml:id="S5.p1.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">isolated</text>
if for every <Math mode="inline" tex="0&lt;n\ \leq d(\lambda)" text="0 less n less= d * lambda" xml:id="S5.p1.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="5.0pt">n</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p1.m15.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p1.m15.1">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, the sets</p>
      <equation xml:id="S5.Ex1">
        <Math mode="display" tex="r(\lambda)\Lambda^{n}\setminus\{\lambda(0,n)\}\text{ and }s(\lambda)\Lambda^{n%&#10;}\setminus\{\lambda(d(\lambda)-n,d(\lambda))\}" text="r * lambda * Lambda ^ n set-minus set@(lambda * open-interval@(0, n)) * [ and ] * s * lambda * Lambda ^ n set-minus set@(lambda * open-interval@(d * lambda - n, d * lambda))" xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.7"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1.7">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.2"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.3"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1.2">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1.3">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMText> and </XMText>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1.4">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.8"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1.8">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.8.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.8.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1.8.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.5"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1.5">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>

                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1.8.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.6"/>

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>

                </XMWrap>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>are empty.</p>

    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_prop" inlist="thm theorem:prop" labels="LABEL:prop3.5" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Proposition 5.1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">5.1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Proposition 5.1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Proposition 5.1</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a finite <Math mode="inline" tex="2" text="2" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph such that</text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:3.1" xml:id="S5.E1">
          <tags>
            <tag>(5.1)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">5.1</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\ \hfill\parbox{409.719685pt}{&#10;$\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{blue}}}}$ contains no cycles and each vertex %&#10;$v\in\Lambda^{0}$&#10;is the range of an isolated cycle in $\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{red}}}}$%&#10;.&#10;}" text="[Λblue contains no cycles and each vertex ∈vΛ0&#10;is the range of an isolated cycle in Λred.]" xml:id="S5.E1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMText class="ltx_parbox" lpadding="5.0pt" vattach="middle" width="409.7pt"><Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{blue}}}}" text="Lambda ^ blue" xml:id="S5.E1.m1.m1">

is the range of an isolated cycle in </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{red}}}}" text="Lambda ^ red" xml:id="S5.E1.m1.m3">
                  <XMath>

            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="S" text="S" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be the set of sources in <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{blue}}}}" text="Lambda ^ blue" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">blue</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Suppose the vertices in <Math mode="inline" tex="S" text="S" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> all lie on a single isolated cycle in <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{red}}}}" text="Lambda ^ red" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">red</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="Y" text="Y" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> denote the set <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{blue}}}}S" text="Lambda ^ blue * S" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">blue</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of blue paths with source in <Math mode="inline" tex="S" text="S" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
Then <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>

                    <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m10.1"/>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m10.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m10.1">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is isomorphic to <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{Y}(R[x,x^{-1}])" text="M _ Y * R * closed-interval@(x, x ^ (- 1))" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m11">

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m11.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m11.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m11.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m11.2.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m11.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m11.2.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

              <XMath>
                <XMApp>

                        </XMApp>

                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is the ring of Laurent polynomials over <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
