      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S5.p2">
      <p>Any graph satisfying (<ref labelref="LABEL:3.1"/>) is locally convex <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="PRRS" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, page 141]</cite>.
Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop3.5"/> is very similar to Proposition 3.5 of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="PRRS" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, which, with the same hypotheses on <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S5.p2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="R={\mathbb{C}}" text="R = C" xml:id="S5.p2.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, gives an isomorphism of <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(\Lambda)" text="C ^ * * Lambda" xml:id="S5.p2.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m3.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m3.1">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> onto <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{Y}(C({\mathbb{T}}))\cong M_{Y}({\mathbb{C}})\otimes C({\mathbb{T}})" text="M _ Y * C * T approximately-equals ((M _ Y * C) tensor-product C) * T" xml:id="S5.p2.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m4.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m4.4">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m4.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m4.1">T</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m4.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m4.2">C</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m4.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m4.3">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. The proof of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="PRRS" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proposition 3.5]</cite> finds a family <Math mode="inline" tex="\{\theta(\alpha,\beta):\alpha,\beta\in Y\}" text="conditional-set@(theta * open-interval@(alpha, beta), list@(alpha, beta) element-of Y)" xml:id="S5.p2.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m5.5"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m5.6"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m5.5">
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m5.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m5.2">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m5.6">
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m5.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m5.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m5.3">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m5.4">β</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of matrix units and a unitary <Math mode="inline" tex="U" text="U" xml:id="S5.p2.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(\Lambda)" text="C ^ * * Lambda" xml:id="S5.p2.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m7.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m7.1">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\theta(\alpha,\beta)U=U\theta(\alpha,\beta)" text="theta * open-interval@(alpha, beta) * U = U * theta * open-interval@(alpha, beta)" xml:id="S5.p2.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m8.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m8.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m8.1">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m8.2">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m8.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m8.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m8.3">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m8.4">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for all <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha,\beta\in Y" text="list@(alpha, beta) element-of Y" xml:id="S5.p2.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m9.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m9.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m9.1">α</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m9.2">β</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. This gives a homomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi:M_{Y}({\mathbb{C}})\otimes C({\mathbb{T}})" text="phi colon ((M _ Y * C) tensor-product C) * T" xml:id="S5.p2.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m10.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m10.1">C</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m10.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m10.2">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> into <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(\Lambda)" text="C ^ * * Lambda" xml:id="S5.p2.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m11.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m11.1">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. The argument then shows that <Math mode="inline" tex="U" text="U" xml:id="S5.p2.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> has full spectrum, from which it follows that <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S5.p2.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is injective, and then <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S5.p2.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is shown to be surjective.
Since <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.p2.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a ring with <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S5.p2.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, the matrix units <Math mode="inline" tex="\{\theta(\alpha,\beta):\alpha,\beta\in Y\}" text="conditional-set@(theta * open-interval@(alpha, beta), list@(alpha, beta) element-of Y)" xml:id="S5.p2.m17">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m17.5"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m17.6"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m17.5">
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m17.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m17.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m17.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m17.2">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m17.6">
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m17.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m17.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m17.3">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m17.4">β</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> (and the unitary <Math mode="inline" tex="U" text="U" xml:id="S5.p2.m18">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>) live naturally in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S5.p2.m19">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m19.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m19.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m19.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m19.1">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. But in the algebraic setting, the spectral argument is not available; we use the following lemma instead.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:lemma-rowan" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 5.2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">5.2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 5.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 5.2</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="W" text="W" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a ring with <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> where <Math mode="inline" tex="W" text="W" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> contains a set <Math mode="inline" tex="\{\theta(\alpha,\beta):\alpha,\beta\in Y\}" text="conditional-set@(theta * open-interval@(alpha, beta), list@(alpha, beta) element-of Y)" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4.5"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4.6"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4.5">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4.1">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4.2">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4.6">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4.3">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4.4">β</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of matrix units. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha_{0}\in Y" text="alpha _ 0 element-of Y" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="D:=\theta(\alpha_{0},\alpha_{0})W\theta(\alpha_{0},\alpha_{0})" text="D assign theta * open-interval@(alpha _ 0, alpha _ 0) * W * theta * open-interval@(alpha _ 0, alpha _ 0)" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6.4">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then the map <Math mode="inline" tex="w\mapsto(\theta(\alpha_{0},\alpha)w\theta(\beta,\alpha_{0}))_{\alpha,\beta}" text="w maps-to (theta * open-interval@(alpha _ 0, alpha) * w * theta * open-interval@(beta, alpha _ 0)) _ (list@(alpha, beta))" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7.5"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7.5">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7.5.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7.3"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7.5.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7.3">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7.4"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7.5.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7.4">β</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7.5.2">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7.1">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7.2">β</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is an isomorphism of <Math mode="inline" tex="W" text="W" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> onto <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{Y}(D)" text="M _ Y * D" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m9.1">D</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S5.p3">
      <p>The proof of Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemma-rowan"/> is straightforward, see, for example, <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="rowan" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proposition 13.9]</cite>. In the proof of Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop3.5"/> we will apply Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lemma-rowan"/> with <Math mode="inline" tex="\theta(\alpha_{0},\alpha_{0})=p_{\dagger}" text="theta * open-interval@(alpha _ 0, alpha _ 0) = p _ dagger" xml:id="S5.p3.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p3.m1.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p3.m1.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="\dagger" text="dagger" xml:id="S5.p3.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a vertex in the set <Math mode="inline" tex="S" text="S" xml:id="S5.p3.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of sources in <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{blue}}}}" text="Lambda ^ blue" xml:id="S5.p3.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">blue</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:lem-badapple" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 5.3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">5.3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 5.3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 5.3</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a <Math mode="inline" tex="2" text="2" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph satisfying the hypotheses of Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop3.5"/>. Fix a vertex <Math mode="inline" tex="\dagger\in S" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="dagger" role="MULOP" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1">†</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m3.2">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and let <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu" text="mu" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be the unique red path of least nonzero degree with range and source <Math mode="inline" tex="\dagger" text="dagger" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then there is an isomorphism of <Math mode="inline" tex="R[x,x^{-1}]" text="R * closed-interval@(x, x ^ (- 1))" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m6.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m6.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m6.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> onto <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{\dagger}\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)p_{\dagger}" text="p _ dagger * (KP _ R)@(Lambda) * p _ dagger" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m7.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m7.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m7.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m7.1">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="1\mapsto p_{\dagger}" text="1 maps-to p _ dagger" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="x\mapsto s_{\mu}" text="x maps-to s _ mu" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="x^{-1}\mapsto s_{\mu^{*}}" text="x ^ (- 1) maps-to s _ (mu ^ *)" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S5.p4">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha\in\Lambda" text="alpha element-of Lambda" xml:id="S5.p4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\alpha)=\dagger" text="r * alpha = dagger" xml:id="S5.p4.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p4.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p4.m2.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha\in\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{red}}}}" text="alpha element-of Lambda ^ red" xml:id="S5.p4.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">red</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S5.p4.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be the unique red path of nonzero least length <Math mode="inline" tex="n_{2}" text="n _ 2" xml:id="S5.p4.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\alpha\nu)=\dagger" text="s * alpha * nu = dagger" xml:id="S5.p4.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p4.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p4.m6.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. For any <Math mode="inline" tex="\beta" text="beta" xml:id="S5.p4.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, applying (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S5.p4.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) to <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}" text="s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *)" xml:id="S5.p4.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> gives</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:mu" xml:id="S5.E2">
          <tags>
            <tag>(5.2)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">5.2</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}=s_{\alpha}p_{s(\alpha)}s_{\beta^{*}}=s_{\alpha}\sum_{%&#10;\lambda\in s(\alpha)\Lambda^{\leq(0,n_{2})}}s_{\lambda}s_{\lambda^{*}}s_{\beta%&#10;^{*}}=s_{\alpha\nu}s_{(\beta\nu)^{*}}." text="s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *) = s _ alpha * p _ (s * alpha) * s _ (beta ^ *) = s _ alpha * (sum _ (lambda element-of s * alpha * Lambda ^ (absent less= open-interval@(0, n _ 2))))@(s _ lambda * s _ (lambda ^ *) * s _ (beta ^ *)) = s _ (alpha * nu) * s _ ((beta * nu) ^ *)" xml:id="S5.E2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.E2.m1.6"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.E2.m1.6">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.E2.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.E2.m1.1">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>

        </equation>
        <p>The Kumjian-Pask relation (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S5.p4.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) at <Math mode="inline" tex="\dagger" text="dagger" xml:id="S5.p4.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="n=|\mu|e_{2}" text="n = absolute-value@(mu) * e _ 2" xml:id="S5.p4.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p4.m12.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p4.m12.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> says that <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\mu}s_{\mu^{*}}=p_{\dagger}" text="s _ mu * s _ (mu ^ *) = p _ dagger" xml:id="S5.p4.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Writing <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu^{i}" text="mu ^ i" xml:id="S5.p4.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for the path which traverses <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu" text="mu" xml:id="S5.p4.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> exactly <Math mode="inline" tex="i" text="i" xml:id="S5.p4.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> times, we now have</p>

                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>

                                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex2.m2.3"/>

                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>

                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex2.m2.4"/>

                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>

                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex2.m2.10">
                                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                                <XMApp>

      </para>
      <para xml:id="S5.p5">
        <p>Now let <Math mode="inline" tex="E" text="E" xml:id="S5.p5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be the directed graph with one vertex <Math mode="inline" tex="w" text="w" xml:id="S5.p5.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and one edge <Math mode="inline" tex="f" text="f" xml:id="S5.p5.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="L_{R}(E)" text="L _ R * E" xml:id="S5.p5.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m4.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p5.m4.1">E</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be the Leavitt path algebra over <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.p5.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and let <Math mode="inline" tex="\{q_{w},t_{f},t_{f^{*}}\}" text="set@(q _ w, t _ f, t _ (f ^ *))" xml:id="S5.p5.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m6.1"/>

                  <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m6.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m6.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m6.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m6.3">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be the generating Leavitt <Math mode="inline" tex="E" text="E" xml:id="S5.p5.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family in <Math mode="inline" tex="L_{R}(E)" text="L _ R * E" xml:id="S5.p5.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m8.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>

                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The polynomials <Math mode="inline" tex="\{1,x,x^{-1}\}" text="set@(1, x, x ^ (- 1))" xml:id="S5.p5.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>

                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are a Leavitt <Math mode="inline" tex="E" text="E" xml:id="S5.p5.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family in <Math mode="inline" tex="R[x,x^{-1}]" text="R * closed-interval@(x, x ^ (- 1))" xml:id="S5.p5.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m11.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and the universal property of <Math mode="inline" tex="L_{R}(E)" text="L _ R * E" xml:id="S5.p5.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
