                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> gives an <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.p5.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-algebra homomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho:L_{R}(E)\to R[x,x^{-1}]" text="rho colon L _ R * E to R * closed-interval@(x, x ^ (- 1))" xml:id="S5.p5.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m14.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p5.m14.1">E</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m14.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m14.3"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p5.m14.2">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m14.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho(1)=q_{w}" text="rho * 1 = q _ w" xml:id="S5.p5.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m15.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S5.p5.m15.1">1</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho(t_{f})=x" text="rho * t _ f = x" xml:id="S5.p5.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m16.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m16.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho(t_{f^{*}})=x^{-1}" text="rho * t _ (f ^ *) = x ^ (- 1)" xml:id="S5.p5.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m17.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m17.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Now <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho" text="rho" xml:id="S5.p5.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is surjective because the range of <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho" text="rho" xml:id="S5.p5.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> contains the generators <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S5.p5.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="x^{-1}" text="x ^ (- 1)" xml:id="S5.p5.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="R[x,x^{-1}]" text="R * closed-interval@(x, x ^ (- 1))" xml:id="S5.p5.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m22.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m22.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p5.m22.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m22.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and it is one-to-one by definition of the zero polynomial.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S5.p6">
        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{\dagger}=s_{\mu}s_{\mu^{*}}" text="p _ dagger = s _ mu * s _ (mu ^ *)" xml:id="S5.p6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, it follows that <Math mode="inline" tex="\{p_{\dagger},s_{\mu},s_{\mu^{*}}\}" text="set@(p _ dagger, s _ mu, s _ (mu ^ *))" xml:id="S5.p6.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m2.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m2.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m2.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m2.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m2.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m2.3">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Leavitt <Math mode="inline" tex="E" text="E" xml:id="S5.p6.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S5.p6.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m4.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m4.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m4.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p6.m4.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. By the universal property of <Math mode="inline" tex="L_{R}(E)" text="L _ R * E" xml:id="S5.p6.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m5.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p6.m5.1">E</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> again, there is an <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.p6.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-algebra homomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi:L_{R}(E)\to\operatorname{KP}_{R}(E)" text="pi colon L _ R * E to (KP _ R)@(E)" xml:id="S5.p6.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m7.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p6.m7.1">E</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m7.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m7.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m7.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p6.m7.2">E</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(q_{w})=p_{\dagger}" text="pi * q _ w = p _ dagger" xml:id="S5.p6.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m8.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m8.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(t_{f})=s_{\mu}" text="pi * t _ f = s _ mu" xml:id="S5.p6.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m9.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(t_{f^{*}})=s_{\mu^{*}}" text="pi * t _ (f ^ *) = s _ (mu ^ *)" xml:id="S5.p6.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m10.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Now we observe that <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{\dagger}\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)p_{\dagger}={\operatorname{\mathrm{%&#10;span}}}\{s_{\mu^{i}},s_{(\mu^{i})^{*}}:i\in{\mathbb{N}}\}" text="p _ dagger * (KP _ R)@(Lambda) * p _ dagger = span@(s _ (mu ^ i), s _ (mu ^ i ^ *) colon i element-of N)" xml:id="S5.p6.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m11.4"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m11.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m11.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p6.m11.2">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m11.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m11.5"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m11.6"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.p6.m11.3">span</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m11.5">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m11.6">
                        <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m11.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m11.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is graded over <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{Z}}" text="Z" xml:id="S5.p6.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by the subgroups <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{s_{\mu^{i}}\}" text="span@(s _ (mu ^ i))" xml:id="S5.p6.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m13.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p6.m13.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.p6.m13.1">span</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p6.m13.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S5.p6.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is graded, and hence it is injective by the graded-uniqueness theorem <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="T" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Theorem 5.3]</cite>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S5.p7">
        <p>Now <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi\circ\rho^{-1}:R[x,x^{-1}]\to\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="pi compose rho ^ (- 1) colon R * closed-interval@(x, x ^ (- 1)) to (KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S5.p7.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m1.3"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p7.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.p7.m1.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m1.4"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p7.m1.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p7.m1.2">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is injective and satisfies</p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex5">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\pi\circ\rho^{-1}(1)=p_{\dagger},\pi\circ\rho^{-1}(x)=s_{\mu}\text{ and }\pi%&#10;\circ\rho^{-1}(x^{-1})=s_{\mu^{*}}." text="formulae@((pi compose rho ^ (- 1)) * 1 = p _ dagger, (pi compose rho ^ (- 1)) * x = ((s _ mu * [ and ] * pi) compose rho ^ (- 1)) * x ^ (- 1) = s _ (mu ^ *))" xml:id="S5.Ex5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex5.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S5.Ex5.m1.3">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex5.m1.3.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex5.m1.3.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex5.m1.3.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex5.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S5.Ex5.m1.1">1</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex5.m1.3.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex5.m1.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex5.m1.2">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMText> and </XMText>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex5.m1.3.2.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex5.m1.3.2.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>It follows that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi\circ\rho^{-1}" text="pi compose rho ^ (- 1)" xml:id="S5.p7.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has range <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{s_{\mu^{i}},s_{(\mu^{i})^{*}}:i\in{\mathbb{N}}%&#10;\}=p_{\dagger}\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)p_{\dagger}" text="span@(s _ (mu ^ i), s _ (mu ^ i ^ *) colon i element-of N) = p _ dagger * (KP _ R)@(Lambda) * p _ dagger" xml:id="S5.p7.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m3.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m3.4"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m3.5"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.p7.m3.2">span</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p7.m3.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p7.m3.5">
                        <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m3.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p7.m3.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m3.6"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p7.m3.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p7.m3.6">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p7.m3.3">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi\circ\rho^{-1}" text="pi compose rho ^ (- 1)" xml:id="S5.p7.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the required isomorphism.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof of Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop3.5"/>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S5.p8">
        <p>Fix a vertex <Math mode="inline" tex="\dagger\in S" xml:id="S5.p8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="dagger" role="MULOP" xml:id="S5.p8.m1.1">†</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" xml:id="S5.p8.m1.2">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and
let <Math mode="inline" tex="e_{\dagger}" text="e _ dagger" xml:id="S5.p8.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be the edge in <Math mode="inline" tex="S\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{red}}}}S" text="S * Lambda ^ red * S" xml:id="S5.p8.m3">

                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              </XMApp>

            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p8.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.p8.m4.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. For <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha,\beta" text="list@(alpha, beta)" xml:id="S5.p8.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="Y" text="Y" xml:id="S5.p8.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
            </XMath>

              <XMApp>

                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p8.m11.2">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> does not contain <Math mode="inline" tex="e_{\dagger}" text="e _ dagger" xml:id="S5.p8.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
It follows from the proof of Lemma 3.8 of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="PRRS" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, that the elements</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:matrixunits" xml:id="S5.E3">

                        <XMCell align="left">
                          <XMText xml:id="S5.E3.m1.4">if <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\nu(\alpha,\beta))=s(\alpha)" text="s * nu * open-interval@(alpha, beta) = s * alpha" xml:id="S5.E3.m1.m2">
                              <XMath>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S5.E3.m1.m2.4"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.E3.m1.m2.4">
                                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                                          <XMDual>
                                            <XMApp>
                                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                              <XMRef idref="S5.E3.m1.m2.1"/>
                                              <XMRef idref="S5.E3.m1.m2.2"/>
                                            </XMApp>
                                            <XMWrap>
                                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.E3.m1.m2.1">α</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.E3.m1.m2.2">β</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S5.E3.m1.m2.3"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.E3.m1.m2.3">α</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMath>
                            </Math></XMText>
                        </XMCell>
                      </XMRow>
                    </XMArray>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>form a set <Math mode="inline" tex="\{\theta(\alpha,\beta):\alpha,\beta\in Y\}" text="conditional-set@(theta * open-interval@(alpha, beta), list@(alpha, beta) element-of Y)" xml:id="S5.p8.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>

                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p8.m13.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>

                      <XMWrap>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p8.m13.6">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.p8.m13.3"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p8.m13.3">α</XMTok>

                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of matrix units in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S5.p8.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p8.m14.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p8.m14.1"/>

                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p8.m14.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p8.m14.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, that is, <Math mode="inline" tex="\theta(\alpha,\beta)\theta(\sigma,\tau)=\delta_{\beta,\sigma}\theta(\alpha,\tau)" text="theta * open-interval@(alpha, beta) * theta * open-interval@(sigma, tau) = delta _ (list@(beta, sigma)) * theta * open-interval@(alpha, tau)" xml:id="S5.p8.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>

                  </XMDual>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{0}" text="Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S5.p8.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is finite, there exists <Math mode="inline" tex="n_{1}" text="n _ 1" xml:id="S5.p8.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="Y=\Lambda^{\leq(n_{1},0)}" text="Y = Lambda ^ (absent less= open-interval@(n _ 1, 0))" xml:id="S5.p8.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

            </XMath>
          </Math>. Calculate:</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx11">
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex6">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle\sum_{\alpha\in Y}\theta(\alpha,\alpha)=\sum_{\alpha\in Y}s_{%&#10;\alpha}s_{\alpha^{*}}=\sum_{v\in\Lambda^{0}}\sum_{\alpha\in vY}s_{\alpha}s_{%&#10;\alpha^{*}}=\sum_{v\in\Lambda^{0}}\sum_{\alpha\in v\Lambda^{\leq(n_{1},0)}}s_{%&#10;\alpha}s_{\alpha^{*}}=\sum_{v\in\Lambda^{0}}p_{v}=1." text="(sum _ (alpha element-of Y))@(theta * open-interval@(alpha, alpha)) = (sum _ (alpha element-of Y))@(s _ alpha * s _ (alpha ^ *)) = (sum _ (v element-of Lambda ^ 0))@((sum _ (alpha element-of v * Y))@(s _ alpha * s _ (alpha ^ *))) = (sum _ (v element-of Lambda ^ 0))@((sum _ (alpha element-of v * Lambda ^ (absent less= open-interval@(n _ 1, 0))))@(s _ alpha * s _ (alpha ^ *))) = (sum _ (v element-of Lambda ^ 0))@(p _ v) = 1" xml:id="S5.Ex6.m3">

              </Math>
              <MathBranch>
                <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\sum_{\alpha\in Y}\theta(\alpha,\alpha)" text="(sum _ (alpha element-of Y))@(theta * open-interval@(alpha, alpha))" xml:id="S5.Ex6.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid9"/>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex6.m1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex6.m1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex6.m1.1">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex6.m1.2">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
                <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle=\sum_{\alpha\in Y}s_{\alpha}s_{\alpha^{*}}=\sum_{v\in\Lambda^{0}%&#10;}\sum_{\alpha\in vY}s_{\alpha}s_{\alpha^{*}}=\sum_{v\in\Lambda^{0}}\sum_{%&#10;\alpha\in v\Lambda^{\leq(n_{1},0)}}s_{\alpha}s_{\alpha^{*}}=\sum_{v\in\Lambda^%&#10;{0}}p_{v}=1." text="absent = (sum _ (alpha element-of Y))@(s _ alpha * s _ (alpha ^ *)) = (sum _ (v element-of Lambda ^ 0))@((sum _ (alpha element-of v * Y))@(s _ alpha * s _ (alpha ^ *))) = (sum _ (v element-of Lambda ^ 0))@((sum _ (alpha element-of v * Lambda ^ (absent less= open-interval@(n _ 1, 0))))@(s _ alpha * s _ (alpha ^ *))) = (sum _ (v element-of Lambda ^ 0))@(p _ v) = 1" xml:id="S5.Ex6.m2">
                    <XMath>
