                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m1.2">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> because <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda^{\leq n}" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= n)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m2.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m2.2">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and the red
subgraph consists entirely of cycles and hence has no sources. We claim that <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)_{1}=d(\mu)_{1}" text="d * lambda _ 1 = d * mu _ 1" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m3.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m3.1">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m3.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m3.2">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
By way of contradiction,
suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)_{1}&lt;d(\mu)_{1}\leq n_{1}" text="d * lambda _ 1 less d * mu _ 1 less= n _ 1" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m4.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m4.1">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m4.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m4.2">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\lambda)=r(\mu)" text="r * lambda = r * mu" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m5.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m5.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m5.2">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, we must have <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\lambda)\in V_{i}" text="s * lambda element-of V _ i" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m6.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\mu)\in V_{j}" text="s * mu element-of V _ j" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m7.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m7.1">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> where <Math mode="inline" tex="i&lt;j" text="i less j" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\lambda)\notin V_{N}" text="s * lambda not-element-of V _ N" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="not-element-of" name="notin" role="RELOP">∉</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m9.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m9.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. But <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\lambda)" text="s * lambda" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m10.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
must be a source in the blue graph because <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)&lt;n" text="d * lambda less n" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m11.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m11.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. This implies <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\lambda)\in V_{N}" text="s * lambda element-of V _ N" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m12.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m12.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, a contradiction.
Similarly, we cannot have <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\mu)_{1}&lt;d(\lambda)_{1}" text="d * mu _ 1 less d * lambda _ 1" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m13.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m13.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m13.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m13.2">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)=d(\mu)" text="d * lambda = d * mu" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m14">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m14.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m14.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p6.m14.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p6.m14.2">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> as claimed.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S5.SS1.p7">
          <p>Now <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in r(\lambda)\Lambda^{d(\lambda)}" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of r * lambda * Lambda ^ (d * lambda)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p7.m1.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p7.m1.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m1.3">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m1.4">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p7.m1.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m1.2">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p7.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="T_{\lambda^{*}}T_{\mu}=s_{\lambda^{*}}s_{\mu}=\delta_{\lambda,\mu}p_{s(\mu)}=%&#10;\delta_{\lambda,\mu}Q_{s(\mu)}" text="T _ (lambda ^ *) * T _ mu = s _ (lambda ^ *) * s _ mu = delta _ (list@(lambda, mu)) * p _ (s * mu) = delta _ (list@(lambda, mu)) * Q _ (s * mu)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p7.m2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p7.m2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m2.1">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m2.2">μ</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p7.m2.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m2.3">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p7.m2.4"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p7.m2.5"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m2.4">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m2.5">μ</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p7.m2.6"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m2.6">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> by (KP3) for <Math mode="inline" tex="(p,s)" text="open-interval@(p, s)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p7.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p7.m3.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m3.1">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m3.2">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Thus (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>) holds for <Math mode="inline" tex="(Q,T)" text="open-interval@(Q, T)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p7.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p7.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m5.1">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p7.m5.2">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S5.SS1.p8">
          <p>To see (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S5.SS1.p8.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>) holds, we use Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem-kp4alt"/>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}_{N}" text="v element-of (Lambda ^ 0) _ N" xml:id="S5.SS1.p8.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda_{N}^{e_{i}}\neq\emptyset" text="v * (Lambda _ N) ^ (e _ i) not-equals empty-set" xml:id="S5.SS1.p8.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda_{N}^{0}\setminus V_{N}" text="v element-of (Lambda _ N) ^ 0 set-minus V _ N" xml:id="S5.SS1.p8.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="i=1" text="i = 1" xml:id="S5.SS1.p8.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="2" text="2" xml:id="S5.SS1.p8.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and if <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in V_{N}" text="v element-of V _ N" xml:id="S5.SS1.p8.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="i=2" text="i = 2" xml:id="S5.SS1.p8.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. In both cases, (KP4) for <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,t)" text="open-interval@(q, t)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p8.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p8.m9.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p8.m9.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p8.m9.1">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p8.m9.2">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> gives</p>
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex8">
            <Math mode="display" tex="Q_{v}=p_{v}=\sum_{\lambda\in v\Lambda^{e_{i}}}s_{\lambda}s_{\lambda^{*}}=\sum_%&#10;{\lambda\in v\Lambda_{N}^{e_{i}}}s_{\lambda}s_{\lambda^{*}}." text="Q _ v = p _ v = (sum _ (lambda element-of v * Lambda ^ (e _ i)))@(s _ lambda * s _ (lambda ^ *)) = (sum _ (lambda element-of v * (Lambda _ N) ^ (e _ i)))@(s _ lambda * s _ (lambda ^ *))" xml:id="S5.Ex8.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex8.m1.1"/>

                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>

                          </XMApp>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">

                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>

                            <XMApp>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>Thus (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S5.SS1.p8.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>) holds by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem-kp4alt"/>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S5.SS1.p9">
          <p>Denote the generating Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda_{N}" text="Lambda _ N" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-family in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m2">
              <XMath>

                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m2.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> by <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,t)" text="open-interval@(q, t)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. The universal property of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m4">
              <XMath>

              </XMath>
            </Math> (Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm-KP"/>(<ref labelref="LABEL:item-a"/>)) now gives a homomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}:\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})\to\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T)) colon (KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N) to (KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m5">

                  <XMApp>

            </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}(q_{v})=p_{v}" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T)) * q _ v = p _ v" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m6">

            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}(t_{\lambda})=s_{\lambda}" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T)) * t _ lambda = s _ lambda" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m7">
              <XMath>

                    </XMDual>

                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}(t_{\lambda^{*}})=s_{\lambda^{*}}" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T)) * t _ (lambda ^ *) = s _ (lambda ^ *)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m8.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m8.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m8.1">Q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m8.2">T</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m8.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m8.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m9.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m9.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m9.1">Q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m9.2">T</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> has range <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{s_{\mu}s_{\nu^{*}}:\mu,\nu\in\Lambda_{N}\}" text="span@(s _ mu * s _ (nu ^ *) colon list@(mu, nu) element-of Lambda _ N)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m10.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m10.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m10.3">span</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m10.4">
                        <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m10.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m10.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m10.1">μ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m10.2">ν</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
It is clear that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m11.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m11.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m11.1">Q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m11.2">T</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is graded. Since each <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}(q_{v})\neq 0" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T)) * q _ v not-equals 0" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m12.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m12.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m12.1">Q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m12.2">T</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m12.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m12.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, it follows from the graded-uniqueness theorem (Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:gut"/>) that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m13.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p9.m13.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m13.1">Q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p9.m13.2">T</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is injective.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:break-up" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5">
        <tags>
          <tag>Lemma 5.5</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">5.5</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 5.5</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 5.5</text></tag>.</title>
        <para xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda_{N}" text="Lambda _ N" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be a rank-<Math mode="inline" tex="2" text="2" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> Bratteli diagram of depth <Math mode="inline" tex="N" text="N" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.
Let <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{N,i}" text="V _ (list@(N, i))" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be the vertices in <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{N}" text="V _ N" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> of one isolated red cycle, and let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda_{N,i}" text="Lambda _ (list@(N, i))" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m6.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m6.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m6.1">N</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m6.2">i</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be the subgraph of <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda_{N}" text="Lambda _ N" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> of paths with source and range in <Math mode="inline" tex="V:=\{v\in\Lambda^{0}:v\Lambda V_{N,i}\neq\emptyset\}" text="V assign conditional-set@(v element-of Lambda ^ 0, v * Lambda * V _ (list@(N, i)) not-equals empty-set)" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m8">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m8.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m8.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m8.3">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m8.4">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>

                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m8.1"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m8.2"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m8.1">N</XMTok>

                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m8.2">i</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,t)" text="open-interval@(q, t)" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m9">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m9.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m9.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m9.1">q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m9.2">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be a generating Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda_{N}" text="Lambda _ N" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m10">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> family in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N)" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m11">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m11.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m11.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m11.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m11.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. Then the subalgebra</text></p>
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex9">
            <Math mode="display" tex="C_{n,i}:={\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{t_{\mu}t_{\nu^{*}}:\mu,\nu\in\Lambda_%&#10;{N},s(\mu)=s(\nu)\in V_{N,i}\}" text="C _ (list@(n, i)) assign span@(t _ mu * t _ (nu ^ *) colon list@(mu, nu) element-of Lambda _ N, s * mu = s * nu element-of V _ (list@(N, i)))" xml:id="S5.Ex9.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex9.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex9.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex9.m1.1">n</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex9.m1.2">i</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex9.m1.9"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex9.m1.10"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex9.m1.11"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.Ex9.m1.9">span</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex9.m1.10">
                          <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex9.m1.5"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex9.m1.6"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex9.m1.5">μ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex9.m1.6">ν</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex9.m1.11">
                          <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>

                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex9.m1.8"/>

                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>

                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>

              </Math> is canonically isomorphic to <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N,i})" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda _ (list@(N, i)))" xml:id="S5.Thmthm5.p1.m13">

      </theorem>
      <proof>

          <p>Set <Math mode="inline" tex="P_{{{i}}}=\sum_{\alpha\in\Lambda^{\blueV}_{N,i}}t_{\alpha}t_{\alpha^{*}}" text="P _ i = (sum _ (alpha element-of (Lambda ^ [\blueV]) _ (list@(N, i))))@(t _ alpha * t _ (alpha ^ *))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p10.m1">

        <para xml:id="S5.SS1.p11">
          <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha,\beta\in v\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{blue}}}}V_{N,i}" text="list@(alpha, beta) element-of v * Lambda ^ blue * V _ (list@(N, i))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p11.m1.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p11.m1.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m1.3">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m1.4">β</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">blue</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p11.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p11.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m1.1">N</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m1.2">i</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\alpha)=d(\beta)" text="d * alpha = d * beta" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p11.m2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m2.1">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p11.m2.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m2.2">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> because <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{blue}}}}" text="Lambda ^ blue" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">blue</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a Bratteli diagram.
Thus</p>
          <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx12">

          <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx13">
            <equation xml:id="S5.Ex13">
              <MathFork>
                <Math tex="\displaystyle P_{i}t_{\mu}P_{i}=\sum_{\alpha,\beta\in\Lambda^{\blueV}_{N,i}}t_%&#10;{\alpha}t_{\alpha^{*}}t_{\mu}t_{\beta}t_{\beta^{*}}=\sum_{\alpha\in r(\mu)%&#10;\Lambda^{\blueV}_{N,i}}\sum_{\beta\in s(\mu)\Lambda^{\blueV}_{N,i}}t_{\alpha}t%&#10;_{\alpha^{*}}t_{\mu\beta}t_{\beta^{*}}" text="P _ i * t _ mu * P _ i = (sum _ (list@(alpha, beta) element-of (Lambda ^ [\blueV]) _ (list@(N, i))))@(t _ alpha * t _ (alpha ^ *) * t _ mu * t _ beta * t _ (beta ^ *)) = (sum _ (alpha element-of r * mu * (Lambda ^ [\blueV]) _ (list@(N, i))))@((sum _ (beta element-of s * mu * (Lambda ^ [\blueV]) _ (list@(N, i))))@(t _ alpha * t _ (alpha ^ *) * t _ (mu * beta) * t _ (beta ^ *)))" xml:id="S5.Ex13.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>

                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>

                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid9"/>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>

                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                            </XMDual>

                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>

                                <XMApp>

                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>

              <MathFork>
                <Math tex="\displaystyle=\sum_{\beta\in s(\mu)\Lambda^{\blueV}_{N,i}}t_{\mu\beta}t_{\beta%&#10;^{*}}\quad\text{(by KP3${}^{\prime}$ because such $\alpha$ must have $d(\alpha%&#10;)=d(\mu\beta)$)}" text="absent = list@((sum _ (beta element-of s * mu * (Lambda ^ [\blueV]) _ (list@(N, i))))@(t _ (mu * beta) * t _ (beta ^ *)), [(by KP3′ because such α must have =⁢d(α)⁢d(⁢μβ))])" xml:id="S5.Ex14.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex14.m3.5"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex14.m3.4"/>

                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid9"/>

                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                          <XMText xml:id="S5.Ex14.m3.4">(by KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S5.Ex14.m2.m1.mf">
                              <XMath>
                                <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="11">
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMath>
                            </Math> because such <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S5.Ex14.m2.m2.mf">
                              <XMath>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                              </XMath>
                            </Math> must have <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\alpha)=d(\mu\beta)" text="d * alpha = d * mu * beta" xml:id="S5.Ex14.m2.m3.mf">
                              <XMath>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
