          <p>A similar calculation gives <Math mode="inline" tex="P_{i}t_{\mu^{*}}P_{i}=P_{i}t_{\mu^{*}}" text="P _ i * t _ (mu ^ *) * P _ i = P _ i * t _ (mu ^ *)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. The above relations help to reduce the Kumjian-Pask relations for <Math mode="inline" tex="(Q,T)" text="open-interval@(Q, T)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>

                  <XMWrap>

                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m6.2">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> to the Kumjian-Pask relations for <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,t)" text="open-interval@(q, t)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p11.m7.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m7.2">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p11.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>

            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S5.SS1.p12">
          <p>To see (KP1) holds, let <Math mode="inline" tex="v,w\in\Lambda_{N,i}^{0}" text="list@(v, w) element-of (Lambda _ (list@(N, i))) ^ 0" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m1.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m1.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m1.3">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m1.4">w</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m1.1">N</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m1.2">i</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then</p>
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex16">
            <Math mode="display" tex="Q_{v}Q_{w}=P_{i}q_{v}P_{i}^{2}q_{w}P_{i}=P_{i}^{3}q_{v}q_{w}P_{i}=\delta_{v,w}%&#10;P_{i}q_{v}P_{i}=\delta_{v,w}Q_{v}." text="Q _ v * Q _ w = P _ i * q _ v * (P _ i) ^ 2 * q _ w * P _ i = (P _ i) ^ 3 * q _ v * q _ w * P _ i = delta _ (list@(v, w)) * P _ i * q _ v * P _ i = delta _ (list@(v, w)) * Q _ v" xml:id="S5.Ex16.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex16.m1.5"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex16.m1.5">
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>

                  <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle T_{\lambda^{*}}T_{\mu}" text="T _ (lambda ^ *) * T _ mu" xml:id="S5.Ex18.m1">

          <p>To see (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>) holds, let <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{N}}^{2}\setminus\{0\}" text="n element-of N ^ 2 set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m8.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m8.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda_{N,i}^{0}" text="v element-of (Lambda _ (list@(N, i))) ^ 0" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m9.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m9.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m9.1">N</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m9.2">i</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then</p>
          <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx15">
            <equation xml:id="S5.Ex21">
              <MathFork>

            <equation xml:id="S5.Ex22">
              <MathFork>
                <Math tex="\displaystyle=P_{i}\Big{(}\sum_{\lambda\in v\Lambda_{N,i}^{\leq n}}t_{\lambda}%&#10;t_{\lambda^{*}}\Big{)}P_{i}=P_{i}\Big{(}\sum_{\beta\in v\Lambda_{N,i}^{\leq(n_%&#10;{1}+N,n_{2})}}t_{\beta}\ t_{\beta^{*}}\Big{)}P_{i}" text="absent = P _ i * (sum _ (lambda element-of v * (Lambda _ (list@(N, i))) ^ (absent less= n)))@(t _ lambda * t _ (lambda ^ *)) * P _ i = P _ i * (sum _ (beta element-of v * (Lambda _ (list@(N, i))) ^ (absent less= open-interval@(n _ 1 + N, n _ 2))))@(t _ beta * t _ (beta ^ *)) * P _ i" xml:id="S5.Ex22.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex22.m3.7"/>

          <p>Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="(Q,T)" text="open-interval@(Q, T)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m10.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m10.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m10.1">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m10.2">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda_{N,i}" text="Lambda _ (list@(N, i))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m11.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m11.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m11.1">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m11.2">i</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-family in <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{N,i}" text="C _ (list@(N, i))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>

                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m12.2">i</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Write <Math mode="inline" tex="(q^{i},t^{i})" text="open-interval@(q ^ i, t ^ i)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>

                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for the universal Kumjian-Pask family in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N,i})" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda _ (list@(N, i)))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m14">

              </XMath>
            </Math>. The universal property of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N,i})" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda _ (list@(N, i)))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m15">

              </XMath>
            </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}(t_{\mu}^{i}t_{\nu^{*}}^{i})=P_{i}t_{\mu}P_{i}t_{\nu^{*}}P_{i}=P_{i}t%&#10;_{\mu}t_{\nu^{*}}P_{i}" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T)) * (t _ mu) ^ i * (t _ (nu ^ *)) ^ i = P _ i * t _ mu * P _ i * t _ (nu ^ *) * P _ i = P _ i * t _ mu * t _ (nu ^ *) * P _ i" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m20">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m20.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m20.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m20.1">Q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m20.2">T</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m20.3"/>

                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="P_{i}" text="P _ i" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m21">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is homogeneous of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m22">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> it follows that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m23">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m23.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m23.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m23.1">Q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m23.2">T</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is graded. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m24">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m24.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m24.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m24.1">Q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m24.2">T</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is injective by the graded-uniqueness (Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:gut"/>). Finally, the range of <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{Q,T}" text="pi _ (list@(Q, T))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m25">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m25.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m25.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m25.1">Q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m25.2">T</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is</p>
          <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx16">
            <equation xml:id="S5.Ex24">
              <MathFork>

                                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex24.m2.4">ν</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                                          <XMDual>
                                            <XMApp>
                                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex24.m2.1"/>
                                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex24.m2.2"/>
                                            </XMApp>
                                            <XMWrap>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex24.m2.1">N</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex24.m2.2">i</XMTok>
                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                        </XMApp>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex24.m2.8.2">
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex24.m2.5"/>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex24.m2.5">μ</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex24.m2.8.3">
                                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                                        <XMDual>
                                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex24.m2.6"/>
                                          <XMWrap>
                                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex24.m2.6">ν</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                          </XMWrap>
                                        </XMDual>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMath>
                    </Math></td>
                </MathBranch>
              </MathFork>
            </equation>
          </equationgroup>
          <p>which is equal to <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{N,i}" text="C _ (list@(N, i))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m26">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m26.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p12.m26.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m26.1">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p12.m26.2">i</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:lem-restrict-iso" xml:id="S5.Thmthm6">
        <tags>
          <tag>Lemma 5.6</tag>

        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 5.6</text></tag>.</title>
        <para xml:id="S5.Thmthm6.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda_{N}" text="Lambda _ N" xml:id="S5.Thmthm6.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be a rank-<Math mode="inline" tex="2" text="2" xml:id="S5.Thmthm6.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> Bratteli diagram of depth <Math mode="inline" tex="N" text="N" xml:id="S5.Thmthm6.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. Suppose that the set of sources in <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{blue}}}}" text="Lambda ^ blue" xml:id="S5.Thmthm6.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">blue</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> are the vertices on a single isolated cycle in <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{red}}}}" text="Lambda ^ red" xml:id="S5.Thmthm6.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">red</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="P" text="P" xml:id="S5.Thmthm6.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be the idempotent <Math mode="inline" tex="P=\sum_{v\in V_{0}}p_{v}" text="P = (sum _ (v element-of V _ 0))@(p _ v)" xml:id="S5.Thmthm6.p1.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="X=V_{0}\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{blue}}}}V_{N}" text="X = V _ 0 * Lambda ^ blue * V _ N" xml:id="S5.Thmthm6.p1.m8">
                <XMath>

                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="P\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})P" text="P * (KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N) * P" xml:id="S5.Thmthm6.p1.m9">

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is isomorphic to <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{X}(R[x,x^{-1}])" text="M _ X * R * closed-interval@(x, x ^ (- 1))" xml:id="S5.Thmthm6.p1.m10">

              </Math>.

        </para>
      </theorem>
      <proof>
        <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
        <para xml:id="S5.SS1.p13">
          <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="Y=\Lambda^{{\operatorname{\mathrm{blue}}}}V_{N}" text="Y = Lambda ^ blue * V _ N" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">blue</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and fix <Math mode="inline" tex="\dagger\in V_{N}" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="dagger" role="MULOP" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m2.1">†</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m2.2">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\theta(\alpha,\beta)" text="theta * open-interval@(alpha, beta)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m3.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m3.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m3.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m3.2">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be the matrix units defined at (<ref labelref="LABEL:matrixunits"/>). The graph <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda_{N}" text="Lambda _ N" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> satisfies the hypotheses of Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop3.5"/>, and hence</p>
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex25">
            <Math mode="display" tex="w\mapsto\big{(}\theta(\dagger,\alpha)w\theta(\beta,\dagger)\big{)}_{\alpha,%&#10;\beta\in Y}" text="w maps-to (theta * open-interval@(dagger, alpha) * w * theta * open-interval@(beta, dagger)) _ (list@(alpha, beta) element-of Y)" xml:id="S5.Ex25.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex25.m1.7"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex25.m1.7">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex25.m1.3"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex25.m1.4"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok name="dagger" role="MULOP" xml:id="S5.Ex25.m1.3">†</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex25.m1.4">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex25.m1.5"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex25.m1.6"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex25.m1.5">β</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok name="dagger" role="MULOP" xml:id="S5.Ex25.m1.6">†</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex25.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex25.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex25.m1.1">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex25.m1.2">β</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>is an isomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="\psi" text="psi" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m6.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m6.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> onto <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{Y}(p_{\dagger}\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})p_{\dagger})" text="M _ Y * p _ dagger * (KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N) * p _ dagger" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m7.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m7.1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m7.1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m7.1.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m7.1.2">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{\dagger}\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})p_{\dagger}" text="p _ dagger * (KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N) * p _ dagger" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m8.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m8.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m8.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m8.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is isomorphic to <Math mode="inline" tex="R[x,x^{-1}]" text="R * closed-interval@(x, x ^ (- 1))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m9.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m9.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m9.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m9.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>

                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> (see Lemmas <ref labelref="LABEL:lemma-rowan"/> and <ref labelref="LABEL:lem-badapple"/> for how the isomorphism of Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop3.5"/> decomposes). It suffices to prove that the restriction of <Math mode="inline" tex="\psi" text="psi" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> to <Math mode="inline" tex="P\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})P" text="P * (KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N) * P" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m11.1"/>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m11.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m11.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> has range <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{X}(p_{\dagger}\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})p_{\dagger})" text="M _ X * p _ dagger * (KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N) * p _ dagger" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m12">
              <XMath>

                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m12.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>

                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
We observe that</p>
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex26">
            <Math mode="display" tex="\theta(\dagger,\alpha)PwP\theta(\beta,\dagger)=\begin{cases}\theta(\dagger,%&#10;\alpha)w\theta(\beta,\dagger)&amp;\text{if $r(\alpha),r(\beta)\in V_{0}$;}\\&#10;0&amp;\text{else}.\end{cases}" text="theta * open-interval@(dagger, alpha) * P * w * P * theta * open-interval@(beta, dagger) = cases@(theta * open-interval@(dagger, alpha) * w * theta * open-interval@(beta, dagger), [if ∈⁢r(α),⁢r(β)V0;], 0, [else])" xml:id="S5.Ex26.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                      <XMArray>
                        <XMRow>
                          <XMCell align="left">
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex26.m1.1">

                            <XMText xml:id="S5.Ex26.m1.2">if <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\alpha),r(\beta)\in V_{0}" text="list@(r * alpha, r * beta) element-of V _ 0" xml:id="S5.Ex26.m1.m1">

                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>

                                    </XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>

                                </XMath>
                              </Math>;</XMText>
                          </XMCell>
                        </XMRow>
                        <XMRow>
                          <XMCell align="left">
                            <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S5.Ex26.m1.3">0</XMTok>
                          </XMCell>

                            <XMDual xml:id="S5.Ex26.m1.4">
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex26.m1.4.1"/>

                        </XMRow>
                      </XMArray>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>It follows first, that <Math mode="inline" tex="\theta(\dagger,\alpha)PwP\theta(\beta,\dagger)\neq 0" text="theta * open-interval@(dagger, alpha) * P * w * P * theta * open-interval@(beta, dagger) not-equals 0" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m13.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m13.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="dagger" role="MULOP" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m13.1">†</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m13.2">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m13.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m13.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m13.3">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="dagger" role="MULOP" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m13.4">†</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> implies <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha,\beta\in X" text="list@(alpha, beta) element-of X" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m14">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m14.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m14.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m14.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m14.2">β</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and second, if <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha,\beta\in X" text="list@(alpha, beta) element-of X" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m15">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m15.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m15.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m15.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m15.2">β</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, then</p>
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex27">
            <Math mode="display" tex="\theta(\dagger,\alpha)P\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})P\theta(\beta,\dagger%&#10;)=\theta(\dagger,\alpha)\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})\theta(\beta,\dagger%&#10;)=p_{\dagger}\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})p_{\dagger}." text="theta * open-interval@(dagger, alpha) * P * (KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N) * P * theta * open-interval@(beta, dagger) = theta * open-interval@(dagger, alpha) * (KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N) * theta * open-interval@(beta, dagger) = p _ dagger * (KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N) * p _ dagger" xml:id="S5.Ex27.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex27.m1.9"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex27.m1.9">
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex27.m1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex27.m1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="dagger" role="MULOP" xml:id="S5.Ex27.m1.1">†</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex27.m1.2">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex27.m1.9.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex27.m1.9.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex27.m1.9.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex27.m1.9.2">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex27.m1.3"/>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="dagger" role="MULOP" xml:id="S5.Ex27.m1.4">†</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                        <XMDual>

                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex27.m1.7"/>

                          <XMWrap>

                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex27.m1.9.5">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex27.m1.9.6">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\psi|" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m16">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is onto <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{X}(p_{\dagger}\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda_{N})p_{\dagger})" text="M _ X * p _ dagger * (KP _ R)@(Lambda _ N) * p _ dagger" xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m17">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m17.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m17.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m17.1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p13.m17.1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m17.1.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p13.m17.1.2">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>

                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dagger" role="MULOP">†</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
      <para xml:id="S5.SS1.p14">
        <p>An idempotent <Math mode="inline" tex="p" text="p" xml:id="S5.SS1.p14.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.SS1.p14.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">infinite</text> if there exist orthogonal nonzero idempotents <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{1},p_{2}\in R" text="list@(p _ 1, p _ 2) element-of R" xml:id="S5.SS1.p14.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p14.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p14.m3.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p14.m3.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p14.m3.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
and elements <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y\in R" text="list@(x, y) element-of R" xml:id="S5.SS1.p14.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p14.m4.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p14.m4.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p14.m4.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p14.m4.2">y</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex28">
          <Math mode="display" tex="p=p_{1}+p_{2},\ x\in pRp_{1},\ y\in p_{1}Rp,\ p=xy\text{ and }\ p_{1}=yx." text="formulae@(p = p _ 1 + p _ 2, formulae@(x element-of p * R * p _ 1, formulae@(y element-of p _ 1 * R * p, p = x * y * [ and ] * p _ 1 = y * x)))" xml:id="S5.Ex28.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex28.m1.1"/>

                            <XMApp>

                            <XMApp>

                            </XMApp>

                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
