                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>Partition <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{N}" text="V _ N" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> into subsets <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{N,i}" text="V _ (list@(N, i))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m4.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m4.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m4.1">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m4.2">i</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, each consisting of the vertices of one isolated red cycle. We claim that if <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\mu)" text="s * mu" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m5.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\alpha)" text="s * alpha" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m6.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are in different <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{N,i}" text="V _ (list@(N, i))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m7.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m7.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m7.1">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m7.2">i</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\mu^{*}}t_{\alpha}=0" text="t _ (mu ^ *) * t _ alpha = 0" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. By way of contradiction, suppose not. By Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:lspfamily"/>, there exists <Math mode="inline" tex="(\sigma,\tau)\in\Lambda_{N}\times\Lambda_{N}" text="open-interval@(sigma, tau) element-of Lambda _ N * Lambda _ N" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m9.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m9.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m9.1">σ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m9.2">τ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu\sigma=\alpha\tau" text="mu * sigma = alpha * tau" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\mu\sigma)=d(\mu)\wedge d(\alpha)" text="d * mu * sigma = d * mu and d * alpha" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m11.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m11.3">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m11.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m11.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m11.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m11.2">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\mu)=s(\alpha)\in V_{N}" text="s * mu = s * alpha element-of V _ N" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m12.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m12.1">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m12.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m12.2">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, both <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma" text="sigma" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\tau" text="tau" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m14">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are red paths. But <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\sigma)=s(\tau)" text="s * sigma = s * tau" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m15">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m15.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m15.1">σ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m15.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m15.2">τ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> implies <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma" text="sigma" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m16">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\tau" text="tau" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m17">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> lie on the same isolated red cycle, and this implies that <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\mu)=r(\sigma)" text="s * mu = r * sigma" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m18">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m18.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m18.1">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m18.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m18.2">σ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\alpha)=r(\tau)" text="s * alpha = r * tau" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m19">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m19.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m19.1">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m19.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m19.2">τ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are in the same <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{N,i}" text="V _ (list@(N, i))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m20">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m20.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m20.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m20.1">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m20.2">i</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, a contradiction. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\mu^{*}}t_{\alpha}=0" text="t _ (mu ^ *) * t _ alpha = 0" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m21">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, as claimed. It follows that <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{K}(\Lambda_{N})" text="(KP _ K)@(Lambda _ N)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m22">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m22.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m22.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m22.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m22.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is the direct sum of the subalgebras</p>
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex30">
            <Math mode="display" tex="C_{N,i}:={\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{t_{\lambda}t_{\mu^{*}}:s(\lambda)=s(%&#10;\mu)\in V_{N,i}\}," text="C _ (list@(N, i)) assign span@(t _ lambda * t _ (mu ^ *) colon s * lambda = s * mu element-of V _ (list@(N, i)))" xml:id="S5.Ex30.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex30.m1.8"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex30.m1.8">
                      <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex30.m1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex30.m1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex30.m1.1">N</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex30.m1.2">i</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex30.m1.7"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex30.m1.8.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.Ex30.m1.7">span</XMTok>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex30.m1.8.1">
                              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex30.m1.5"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex30.m1.5">λ</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex30.m1.6"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex30.m1.6">μ</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex30.m1.3"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex30.m1.4"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex30.m1.3">N</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex30.m1.4">i</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>and we have</p>
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex31">
            <Math mode="display" tex="Q_{0}\operatorname{KP}_{K}(\Lambda_{N})Q_{0}=\bigoplus_{i}Q_{0}C_{N,i}Q_{0}." text="Q _ 0 * (KP _ K)@(Lambda _ N) * Q _ 0 = (direct-sum _ i)@(Q _ 0 * C _ (list@(N, i)) * Q _ 0)" xml:id="S5.Ex31.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex31.m1.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex31.m1.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex31.m1.3.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex31.m1.3.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex31.m1.3.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex31.m1.3.2">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                          <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="display" meaning="direct-sum" name="bigoplus" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex31.m1.1"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex31.m1.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex31.m1.1">N</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex31.m1.2">i</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>The elements <Math mode="inline" tex="p" text="p" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m23">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{1}" text="p _ 1" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m24">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{2}" text="p _ 2" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m25">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m26">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="y" text="y" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m27">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="Q_{0}\operatorname{KP}_{K}(\Lambda_{N})Q_{0}" text="Q _ 0 * (KP _ K)@(Lambda _ N) * Q _ 0" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m28">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m28.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m28.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m28.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m28.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> all have direct sum decompositions, and the elements satisfy the relations (<ref labelref="LABEL:infinrels"/>). The component of <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{2}" text="p _ 2" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m29">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is nonzero in at least one summand, and then the same component of the rest must be nonzero too. So we may assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="p" text="p" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m30">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{1}" text="p _ 1" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m31">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{2}" text="p _ 2" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m32">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m33">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="y" text="y" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m34">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are all in <Math mode="inline" tex="Q_{0}C_{N,i}Q_{0}" text="Q _ 0 * C _ (list@(N, i)) * Q _ 0" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m35">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m35.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p17.m35.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m35.1">N</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m35.2">i</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="i" text="i" xml:id="S5.SS1.p17.m36">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S5.SS1.p18">
          <p>Now consider the subgraph <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda_{N,i}" text="Lambda _ (list@(N, i))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m1.1">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m1.2">i</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda_{N}" text="Lambda _ N" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of paths with source and range in <Math mode="inline" tex="\{v\in\Lambda^{0}:v\Lambda V_{N,{{{i}}}}\neq\emptyset\}" text="conditional-set@(v element-of Lambda ^ 0, v * Lambda * V _ (list@(N, i)) not-equals empty-set)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m3.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m3.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m3.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m3.4">
                      <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m3.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m3.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m3.1">N</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m3.2">i</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. By Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:break-up"/>, <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{N,i}" text="C _ (list@(N, i))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m4.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m4.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m4.1">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m4.2">i</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is canonically isomorphic to <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{K}(\Lambda_{N,i})" text="(KP _ K)@(Lambda _ (list@(N, i)))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m5.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m5.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m5.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m5.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m5.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m5.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m5.1">N</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m5.2">i</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and by Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop3.5"/>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{K}(\Lambda_{N,i})" text="(KP _ K)@(Lambda _ (list@(N, i)))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m6.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m6.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m6.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m6.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m6.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m6.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m6.1">N</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m6.2">i</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is isomorphic to a matrix algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{Y}(K[x,x^{-1}])" text="M _ Y * K * closed-interval@(x, x ^ (- 1))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m7.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m7.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for a certain set <Math mode="inline" tex="Y" text="Y" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem-restrict-iso"/> this isomorphism restricts to an isomorphism of <Math mode="inline" tex="Q_{0}C_{N,i}Q_{0}" text="Q _ 0 * C _ (list@(N, i)) * Q _ 0" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m9">
              <XMath>

                  <XMApp>

                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m9.1"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m9.1">N</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m9.2">i</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> onto <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{X}(K[x,x^{-1}])" text="M _ X * K * closed-interval@(x, x ^ (- 1))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m10.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>

                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m10.2.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m10.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m10.2.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> where <Math mode="inline" tex="X\subseteq Y" text="X subset-of-or-equals Y" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
Pulling the five elements through all these isomorphisms gives us nonzero idempotents <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="q_{1}" text="q _ 1" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="q_{2}" text="q _ 2" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m14">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and elements <Math mode="inline" tex="f" text="f" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m15">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="g" text="g" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m16">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{X}(K[x,x^{-1}])" text="M _ X * K * closed-interval@(x, x ^ (- 1))" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m17">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m17.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m17.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m17.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p18.m17.2.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m17.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p18.m17.2.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that</p>
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex32">
            <Math mode="display" tex="q=q_{1}+q_{2},\quad q_{1}q_{2}=q_{2}q_{1}=0,\quad fg=q\quad\text{and}\quad gf=%&#10;q_{1}." text="formulae@(formulae@(q = q _ 1 + q _ 2, q _ 1 * q _ 2 = q _ 2 * q _ 1 = 0), formulae@(f * g = list@(q, [and]), g * f = q _ 1))" xml:id="S5.Ex32.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex32.m1.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S5.Ex32.m1.3">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex32.m1.3.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex32.m1.3.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMDual xml:id="S5.Ex32.m1.3.1">
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex32.m1.3.1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex32.m1.3.1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>

                              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                              <XMApp>

                                <XMApp>

                                </XMWrap>

                              </XMApp>
