                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I2.ix14.p1.m1.4">y</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>,</p>
          </para>
        </item>
        <item xml:id="S6.I2.ix15">
          <tags>
            <tag>(P2)</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">item (P2)</tag>
          </tags>
          <para xml:id="S6.I2.ix15.p1">
            <p><Math mode="inline" tex="m-m\wedge d(x)=p-p\wedge d(y)" text="(m - m) and d * x = (p - p) and d * y" xml:id="S6.I2.ix15.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I2.ix15.p1.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I2.ix15.p1.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I2.ix15.p1.m1.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I2.ix15.p1.m1.2">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and</p>
          </para>
        </item>
        <item xml:id="S6.I2.ix16">
          <tags>
            <tag>(P3)</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">item (P3)</tag>
          </tags>
          <para xml:id="S6.I2.ix16.p1">
            <p><Math mode="inline" tex="n-m=q-p" text="n - m = q - p" xml:id="S6.I2.ix16.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.</p>
          </para>
        </item>
      </enumerate>
      <p>Again, it is straightforward to check that <Math mode="inline" tex="\sim" text="similar-to" xml:id="S6.p3.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="similar-to" name="sim" role="RELOP">∼</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is an equivalence relation, and we denote the class of <Math mode="inline" tex="(x;(m,n))" text="list@(x, open-interval@(m, n))" xml:id="S6.p3.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m4.3"/>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m4.4"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m4.3">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                <XMDual xml:id="S6.p3.m4.4">
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m4.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m4.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m4.1">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m4.2">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> by <Math mode="inline" tex="[x;(m,n)]" text="list@(x, open-interval@(m, n))" xml:id="S6.p3.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m5.3"/>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m5.4"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m5.3">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                <XMDual xml:id="S6.p3.m5.4">
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m5.1">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m5.2">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. The next proposition is <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="W" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proposition 4.9]</cite>, and says that we can view each <Math mode="inline" tex="[x;(m,n)]\in P_{\Lambda}/\!\!\sim" xml:id="S6.p3.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m6.3">x</XMTok>
              <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m6.1">m</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m6.2">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
            </XMWrap>
            <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
            <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP" rpadding="-3.3pt">/</XMTok>
            <XMTok meaning="similar-to" name="sim" role="RELOP">∼</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
as a morphism between vertices <Math mode="inline" tex="[(x;n)]" text="delimited-[]@(list@(x, n))" xml:id="S6.p3.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>

                <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m7.3"/>

                    <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m7.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m7.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m7.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m7.2">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="[(x;m)]" text="delimited-[]@(list@(x, m))" xml:id="S6.p3.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m8.3"/>
              </XMApp>

                    <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m8.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m8.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m8.2">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{\Lambda}/\!\!\approx" xml:id="S6.p3.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
            <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP" rpadding="-3.3pt">/</XMTok>
            <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="approx" role="RELOP">≈</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of degree <Math mode="inline" tex="n-m" text="n - m" xml:id="S6.p3.m10">
          <XMath>

              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_prop" inlist="thm theorem:prop" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Proposition 6.1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">6.1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Proposition 6.1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Proposition 6.1</text></tag> (Farthing, Webster).</title>
      <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a locally convex, row-finite
<Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph.
Define</text></p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx17">

                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex5.m2.1">y</XMTok>

                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex5.m2.10"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>

        </equationgroup>
        <p class="ltx_emph"><text font="italic">Each of these functions is well defined, and
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}=({\tilde{\Lambda}}^{0},{\tilde{\Lambda}},r,s,\operatorname{%&#10;id},\circ,d)" text="tilde@(Lambda) = vector@((tilde@(Lambda)) ^ 0, tilde@(Lambda), r, s, id, compose, d)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3.7"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3.4"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3.5"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3.6"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3.7">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3.1">
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3.2">r</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3.3">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3.4">id</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3.5">∘</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3.6">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph without sources. We call <Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> the
</text>desourcification<text font="italic"> of <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S6.p4">
      <p>We have decided to use <Math mode="inline" tex="d,r" text="list@(d, r)" xml:id="S6.p4.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p4.m1.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p4.m1.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p4.m1.1">d</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p4.m1.2">r</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="s" text="s" xml:id="S6.p4.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> to denote the appropriate maps in
both <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S6.p4.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S6.p4.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. This doesn’t seem to cause any confusion. The following remark and lemmas
give insight into the structure of <Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{\Lambda}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S6.p4.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_rmk" inlist="thm theorem:rmk" labels="LABEL:rmk-structurelambda0" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2">

            <para xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1">
              <p>The map
<Math mode="inline" tex="\iota:\Lambda\to{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="iota colon Lambda to tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1.m1">

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> defined by <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(\lambda)=[\lambda x;(0,d(\lambda))]" text="iota * lambda = list@(lambda * x, open-interval@(0, d * lambda))" xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                </Math>
for <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in s(\lambda)\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="x element-of s * lambda * Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>

                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="absent"/>

                          </XMApp>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> is a well-defined, injective <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>-graph
morphism <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="W" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proposition 4.13]</cite>. Notice that if <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1.m5">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(v)=[x;(0,0)]" text="iota * v = list@(x, open-interval@(0, 0))" xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1.m6">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I3.i1.p1.m6.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1.m6.1">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I3.i1.p1.m6.4"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I3.i1.p1.m6.5"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1.m6.4">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1.m6.5">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.I3.i1.p1.m6.2"/>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1.m6.2">0</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1.m6.3">0</XMTok>

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in v\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="x element-of v * Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1.m7">
                  <XMath>
