            <para xml:id="S6.I3.i2.p1">
              <p>The map
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pi:{\tilde{\Lambda}}\to\iota(\Lambda)" text="pi colon tilde@(Lambda) to iota * Lambda" xml:id="S6.I3.i2.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.I3.i2.p1.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I3.i2.p1.m1.1">Λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> defined by
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pi([y;(m,n)]=[y;(m\wedge d(y),n\wedge d(y))]" xml:id="S6.I3.i2.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I3.i2.p1.m2.3">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I3.i2.p1.m2.1">m</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I3.i2.p1.m2.2">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
is a well-defined, surjective <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S6.I3.i2.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>-graph morphism such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi\circ\pi=\pi" text="pi compose pi = pi" xml:id="S6.I3.i2.p1.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> and
<!--  %**** String Line 1025 **** --><Math mode="inline" tex="\pi\circ\iota=\iota" text="pi compose iota = iota" xml:id="S6.I3.i2.p1.m5">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="W" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, page 168]</cite>.</p>
            </para>
          </item>
          <item labels="LABEL:item-c" xml:id="S6.I3.i3">
            <tags>
              <tag>(3)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 3</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S6.I3.i3.p1">
              <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu,\lambda\in\iota(\Lambda^{0}){\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="list@(mu, lambda) element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0 * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S6.I3.i3.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I3.i3.p1.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I3.i3.p1.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I3.i3.p1.m1.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I3.i3.p1.m1.2">λ</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I3.i3.p1.m1.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.I3.i3.p1.m1.3">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> such
that <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)=d(\mu)" text="d * lambda = d * mu" xml:id="S6.I3.i3.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I3.i3.p1.m2.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I3.i3.p1.m2.1">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I3.i3.p1.m2.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I3.i3.p1.m2.2">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(\lambda)=\pi(\mu)" text="pi * lambda = pi * mu" xml:id="S6.I3.i3.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I3.i3.p1.m3.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I3.i3.p1.m3.1">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I3.i3.p1.m3.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I3.i3.p1.m3.2">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda=\mu" text="lambda = mu" xml:id="S6.I3.i3.p1.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="W" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 4.19]</cite>.</p>
            </para>
          </item>
        </enumerate>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:lem:extending_bd_paths" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 6.3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">6.3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 6.3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 6.3</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu:=[z;(0,n)]\in{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="mu assign list@(z, open-interval@(0, n)) element-of tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1.3">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1.4">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1.2">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu\in\iota(\Lambda)" text="mu element-of iota * Lambda" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> if and only if
<Math mode="inline" tex="d(z)\geq n" text="d * z &gt;= n" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S6.p5">
        <p>Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu=[z;(0,n)]=\iota(\lambda)" text="mu = list@(z, open-interval@(0, n)) = iota * lambda" xml:id="S6.p5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m1.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m1.5"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m1.3">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S6.p5.m1.5">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p5.m1.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m1.2">n</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m1.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m1.4">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\in\Lambda" text="lambda element-of Lambda" xml:id="S6.p5.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota" text="iota" xml:id="S6.p5.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is degree-preserving, <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)=n" text="d * lambda = n" xml:id="S6.p5.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m4.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi\circ\iota=\iota" text="pi compose iota = iota" xml:id="S6.p5.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we have <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(\mu)=[z;(0,n\wedge d(z))]=\iota(\lambda)" text="pi * mu = list@(z, open-interval@(0, n and d * z)) = iota * lambda" xml:id="S6.p5.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m6.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m6.4"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m6.6"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m6.4">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S6.p5.m6.6">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m6.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m6.6.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p5.m6.3">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p5.m6.6.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m6.2"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m6.2">z</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m6.5"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m6.5">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="n\wedge d(z)=n" text="n and d * z = n" xml:id="S6.p5.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m7.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m7.1">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, that is, <Math mode="inline" tex="d(z)\geq n" text="d * z &gt;= n" xml:id="S6.p5.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m8.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m8.1">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p6">
        <p>Conversely, suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="d(z)\geq n" text="d * z &gt;= n" xml:id="S6.p6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p6.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p6.m1.1">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then factor <Math mode="inline" tex="z=\lambda y" text="z = lambda * y" xml:id="S6.p6.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> where <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\in\Lambda^{n}" text="lambda element-of Lambda ^ n" xml:id="S6.p6.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="y\in\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="y element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S6.p6.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Now <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu=[z;(0,n)]=[\lambda y;(0,d(\lambda))]=\iota(\lambda)" text="mu = list@(z, open-interval@(0, n)) = list@(lambda * y, open-interval@(0, d * lambda)) = iota * lambda" xml:id="S6.p6.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p6.m5.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p6.m5.7"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p6.m5.3">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S6.p6.m5.7">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p6.m5.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p6.m5.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p6.m5.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p6.m5.2">n</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p6.m5.8"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p6.m5.9"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p6.m5.8">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S6.p6.m5.9">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p6.m5.5"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p6.m5.9.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p6.m5.5">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p6.m5.9.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p6.m5.4"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p6.m5.4">λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p6.m5.6"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p6.m5.6">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S6.p7">
      <p>The following straightforward lemma is very
useful and is used without proof in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="W" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:lem:0dlambda" xml:id="S6.Thmthm4">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 6.4</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">6.4</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 6.4</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 6.4</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\in{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="lambda element-of tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that
<Math mode="inline" tex="r(\lambda)\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="r * lambda element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m2.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m2.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m2.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then there exists
<Math mode="inline" tex="x\in\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="x element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda=[x;(0,d(\lambda))]" text="lambda = list@(x, open-interval@(0, d * lambda))" xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m4.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m4.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m4.3">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m4.4">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m4.2"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m4.4.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m4.2">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m4.4.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m4.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m4.1">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
<!--  %**** String Line 1050 **** --></text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S6.p8">
        <p>Write <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda=[z;(m,n)]" text="lambda = list@(z, open-interval@(m, n))" xml:id="S6.p8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m1.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m1.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m1.3">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S6.p8.m1.4">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m1.1">m</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m1.2">n</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="m,n\in{\mathbb{N}}^{k}" text="list@(m, n) element-of N ^ k" xml:id="S6.p8.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m2.1">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m2.2">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="z element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S6.p8.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
If <Math mode="inline" tex="m=0" text="m = 0" xml:id="S6.p8.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="d(\lambda)=n" text="d * lambda = n" xml:id="S6.p8.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m5.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and we are done. So suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="m&gt;0" text="m &gt; 0" xml:id="S6.p8.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Because
<Math mode="inline" tex="[z;m]=r(\lambda)\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="list@(z, m) = r * lambda element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S6.p8.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m7.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m7.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m7.1">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m7.2">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m7.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m7.3">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m7.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p8.m7.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
<Math mode="inline" tex="[z;m]\approx[y;0]" text="list@(z, m) approximately-equals list@(y, 0)" xml:id="S6.p8.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="approx" role="RELOP">≈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m8.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m8.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m8.1">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m8.2">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m8.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m8.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m8.3">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p8.m8.4">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="y\in\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="y element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S6.p8.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. By (V2) <Math mode="inline" tex="m-m\wedge d(z)=0" text="(m - m) and d * z = 0" xml:id="S6.p8.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m10.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m10.1">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Then <Math mode="inline" tex="m=m\wedge d(z)" text="m = m and d * z" xml:id="S6.p8.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m11.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m11.1">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and hence <Math mode="inline" tex="m\leq d(z)" text="m less= d * z" xml:id="S6.p8.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m12.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m12.1">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="x:=\sigma^{m}(z)" text="x assign sigma ^ m * z" xml:id="S6.p8.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m13.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m13.1">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
It suffices to show that <Math mode="inline" tex="(x;(0,n-m))\sim(z;(m,n))" text="list@(x, open-interval@(0, n - m)) similar-to list@(z, open-interval@(m, n))" xml:id="S6.p8.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="similar-to" name="sim" role="RELOP">∼</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m14.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m14.6"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m14.2">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S6.p8.m14.6">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m14.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m14.6.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p8.m14.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p8.m14.6.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m14.5"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m14.7"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m14.5">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S6.p8.m14.7">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m14.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p8.m14.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m14.3">m</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p8.m14.4">n</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Items (P2) and (P3) are obvious. To see (P1), notice</p>
