          <equation xml:id="S6.Ex8">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle=x(0,n\wedge d(z)-m)=x(0,(n-m)\wedge d(x))" text="absent = x * open-interval@(0, (n and d * z) - m) = x * open-interval@(0, (n - m) and d * x)" xml:id="S6.Ex8.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex8.m3.2"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex8.m3.5"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.Ex8.m3.2">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex8.m3.5">
                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S6.Ex8.m3.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex8.m3.1">z</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex8.m3.4"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex8.m3.6"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.Ex8.m3.4">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex8.m3.6">
                            <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex8.m3.6.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex8.m3.6.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex8.m3.3"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex8.m3.3">x</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
              <MathBranch>
                <td align="right"/>
                <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle=x(0,n\wedge d(z)-m)=x(0,(n-m)\wedge d(x))" text="absent = x * open-interval@(0, (n and d * z) - m) = x * open-interval@(0, (n - m) and d * x)" xml:id="S6.Ex8.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex8.m2.2"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex8.m2.5"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.Ex8.m2.2">0</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex8.m2.5">
                                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex8.m2.1"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex8.m2.1">z</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex8.m2.4"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex8.m2.6"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.Ex8.m2.4">0</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex8.m2.6">
                                <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S6.Ex8.m2.6.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex8.m2.6.1">
                                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S6.Ex8.m2.3"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex8.m2.3">x</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
        <p>as needed.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:lem:Claire_13_14" xml:id="S6.Thmthm5">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 6.5</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">6.5</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 6.5</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 6.5</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm5.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="v element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S6.Thmthm5.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm5.p1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm5.p1.m1.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\in v\tilde{\Lambda}^{n}" text="lambda element-of v * (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ n" xml:id="S6.Thmthm5.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(\lambda)=v" text="pi * lambda = v" xml:id="S6.Thmthm5.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm5.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm5.p1.m3.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. If
<Math mode="inline" tex="\mu\in v\tilde{\Lambda}^{n}" text="mu element-of v * (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ n" xml:id="S6.Thmthm5.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,
then <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda=\mu" text="lambda = mu" xml:id="S6.Thmthm5.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S6.p9">
        <p>By <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="W" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 4.19]</cite> (see Remark <ref labelref="LABEL:rmk-structurelambda0"/>(<ref labelref="LABEL:it:rmk6.2a"/>)),
it suffices to show that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(\mu)=\pi(\lambda)" text="pi * mu = pi * lambda" xml:id="S6.p9.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m1.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m1.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m1.2">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
<!--  %**** String Line 1075 **** -->Since <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\lambda)=r(\mu)=v\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="r * lambda = r * mu = v element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S6.p9.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m2.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m2.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m2.2">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m2.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p9.m2.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:0dlambda"/>
there exist <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y\in\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="list@(x, y) element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S6.p9.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m3.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m3.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m3.2">y</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex9">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\lambda=[y;(0,n)],\mu=[x;(0,n)]\text{ and }[x,0]=[y,0]=v." text="formulae@(lambda = list@(y, open-interval@(0, n)), mu = list@(x, open-interval@(0, n)) * [ and ] * closed-interval@(x, 0) = closed-interval@(y, 0) = v)" xml:id="S6.Ex9.m1">

          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>By definition of <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S6.p9.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex10">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\pi(\lambda)=[y;(0,n\wedge d(y))]\text{ and }\\&#10;\pi(\mu)=[x;(0,n\wedge d(x))]." text="pi * lambda = list@(y, open-interval@(0, n and d * y)) * [ and ] * pi * mu = list@(x, open-interval@(0, n and d * x))" xml:id="S6.Ex10.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex10.m1.9"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex10.m1.9">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex10.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex10.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex10.m1.4"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex10.m1.9.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex10.m1.4">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S6.Ex10.m1.9.1">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex10.m1.3"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex10.m1.9.1.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.Ex10.m1.3">0</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex10.m1.9.1.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S6.Ex10.m1.2"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex10.m1.2">y</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMText> and </XMText>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex10.m1.5"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex10.m1.5">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex10.m1.8"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex10.m1.9.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex10.m1.8">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                        <XMDual xml:id="S6.Ex10.m1.9.2">
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.Ex10.m1.7"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.Ex10.m1.9.2.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.Ex10.m1.7">0</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex10.m1.9.2.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S6.Ex10.m1.6"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex10.m1.6">x</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>By assumption, <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(\lambda)=v" text="pi * lambda = v" xml:id="S6.p9.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m5.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and hence <Math mode="inline" tex="n\wedge d(y)=0" text="n and d * y = 0" xml:id="S6.p9.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m6.1">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
We need to show that <Math mode="inline" tex="n\wedge d(x)=0" text="n and d * x = 0" xml:id="S6.p9.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m7.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m7.1">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as well; we do this by showing that if <Math mode="inline" tex="n_{i}\neq 0" text="n _ i not-equals 0" xml:id="S6.p9.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> then <Math mode="inline" tex="d(x)_{i}=0" text="d * x _ i = 0" xml:id="S6.p9.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m9.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m9.1">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="n_{i}\neq 0" text="n _ i not-equals 0" xml:id="S6.p9.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="n\wedge d(y)=0" text="n and d * y = 0" xml:id="S6.p9.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m11.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m11.1">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we have <Math mode="inline" tex="d(y)_{i}=0" text="d * y _ i = 0" xml:id="S6.p9.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m12.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m12.1">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Since <Math mode="inline" tex="y" text="y" xml:id="S6.p9.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a boundary path,
<Math mode="inline" tex="0\Omega_{k,d(y)}^{\leq e_{i}}=\{0\}" text="0 * (Omega _ (list@(k, d * y))) ^ (absent less= e _ i) = set@(0)" xml:id="S6.p9.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Omega" role="UNKNOWN">Ω</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m14.2"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m14.3"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m14.2">k</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p9.m14.3">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m14.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m14.1">y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m14.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p9.m14.4">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Now condition (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:boundarypath"/>) gives
<Math mode="inline" tex="y(0)\Lambda^{\leq e_{i}}=\{y(0)\}" text="y * 0 * Lambda ^ (absent less= e _ i) = set@(y * 0)" xml:id="S6.p9.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m15.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p9.m15.1">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m15.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p9.m15.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m15.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p9.m15.2">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Hence <Math mode="inline" tex="y(0)\Lambda^{e_{i}}=v\Lambda^{e_{i}}=\emptyset" text="y * 0 * Lambda ^ (e _ i) = v * Lambda ^ (e _ i) = empty-set" xml:id="S6.p9.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m16.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p9.m16.1">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. But <Math mode="inline" tex="x(0)=v" text="x * 0 = v" xml:id="S6.p9.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m17.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p9.m17.1">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and so <Math mode="inline" tex="d(x)_{i}=0" text="d * x _ i = 0" xml:id="S6.p9.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m18.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m18.1">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as well. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="n\wedge d(x)=0" text="n and d * x = 0" xml:id="S6.p9.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m19.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m19.1">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Now <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(\lambda)=v=\pi(\mu)" text="pi * lambda = v = pi * mu" xml:id="S6.p9.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m20.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m20.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m20.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m20.2">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu" text="list@(lambda, mu)" xml:id="S6.p9.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m21.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m21.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m21.1">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m21.2">μ</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> have the same degree, so <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda=\mu" text="lambda = mu" xml:id="S6.p9.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="W" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 4.19]</cite>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:lem-minextensions" xml:id="S6.Thmthm6">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 6.6</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">6.6</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 6.6</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 6.6</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm6.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda" xml:id="S6.Thmthm6.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm6.p1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm6.p1.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm6.p1.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm6.p1.m1.2">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{\Lambda}^{\min}(\iota(\lambda),\iota(\mu))=\iota(\Lambda)^{\min}(\iota(%&#10;\lambda),\iota(\mu))" text="(tilde@(Lambda)) ^ minimum * open-interval@(iota * lambda, iota * mu) = iota * Lambda ^ minimum * open-interval@(iota * lambda, iota * mu)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm6.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">min</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm6.p1.m2.6"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm6.p1.m2.7"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm6.p1.m2.6">

                          <XMTok name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm6.p1.m2.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>

                              <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm6.p1.m2.7">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>

              </XMath>

<!--  %**** String Line 1100 **** -->    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S6.p10">
        <p>This is essentially <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="W" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 4.22]</cite>. Since
<Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(\Lambda)\subseteq{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="iota * Lambda subset-of-or-equals tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S6.p10.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m1.1">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we have</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex11">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\iota(\Lambda)^{\min}(\iota(\lambda),\iota(\mu))\subseteq\tilde{\Lambda}^{\min%&#10;}(\iota(\lambda),\iota(\mu))." text="iota * Lambda ^ minimum * open-interval@(iota * lambda, iota * mu) subset-of-or-equals (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ minimum * open-interval@(iota * lambda, iota * mu)" xml:id="S6.Ex11.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex11.m1.6"/>
                <XMWrap>

                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex11.m1.6.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex11.m1.6.2"/>

                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>

                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex11.m1.6.3"/>

                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex11.m1.6.4">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex11.m1.5"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex11.m1.5">μ</XMTok>

                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="(\alpha,\beta)\in\tilde{\Lambda}^{\min}(\iota(\lambda),\iota(\mu))" text="open-interval@(alpha, beta) element-of (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ minimum * open-interval@(iota * lambda, iota * mu)" xml:id="S6.p10.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m2.1">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m2.2">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">min</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m2.5"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m2.6"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p10.m2.5">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m2.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m2.3">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p10.m2.6">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m2.4"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m2.4">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Then</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex12">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\iota(\lambda)\alpha=\iota(\mu)\beta=[z;(0,d(\lambda)\vee d(\mu))]" text="iota * lambda * alpha = iota * mu * beta = list@(z, open-interval@(0, d * lambda or d * mu))" xml:id="S6.Ex12.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.Ex12.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex12.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.Ex12.m1.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex12.m1.2">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.Ex12.m1.6"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.Ex12.m1.7"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex12.m1.6">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S6.Ex12.m1.7">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex12.m1.5"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex12.m1.7.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.Ex12.m1.5">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex12.m1.7.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex12.m1.3"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex12.m1.3">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex12.m1.4"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex12.m1.4">μ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>for some <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="z element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S6.p10.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:0dlambda"/>.
Now</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex13">
          <Math mode="display" tex="(\iota(\lambda)\alpha)(0,d(\lambda))=\iota(\lambda)=[z;(0,d(\lambda))]" text="iota * lambda * alpha * open-interval@(0, d * lambda) = iota * lambda = list@(z, open-interval@(0, d * lambda))" xml:id="S6.Ex13.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.8"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex13.m1.8">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex13.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.9"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.Ex13.m1.3">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex13.m1.9">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex13.m1.4">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.7"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.10"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex13.m1.7">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S6.Ex13.m1.10">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.6"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.10.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.Ex13.m1.5"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
