                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>by the factorisation property in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S6.p10.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. So <Math mode="inline" tex="d(z)\geq d(\lambda)" text="d * z &gt;= d * lambda" xml:id="S6.p10.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m5.1">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m5.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m5.2">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:extending_bd_paths"/>. Similarly, <Math mode="inline" tex="d(z)\geq d(\mu)" text="d * z &gt;= d * mu" xml:id="S6.p10.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m6.1">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m6.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m6.2">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Hence <Math mode="inline" tex="d(z)\geq d(\lambda)\vee d(\mu)" text="d * z &gt;= d * lambda or d * mu" xml:id="S6.p10.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m7.1">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m7.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m7.2">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m7.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m7.3">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and so <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(\lambda)\alpha\in\iota(\Lambda)" text="iota * lambda * alpha element-of iota * Lambda" xml:id="S6.p10.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m8.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m8.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m8.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m8.2">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:0dlambda"/> again.
Now by the unique factorisation property, both <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S6.p10.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\beta" text="beta" xml:id="S6.p10.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are in <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(\Lambda)" text="iota * Lambda" xml:id="S6.p10.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m11.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m11.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Thus</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex14">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\tilde{\Lambda}^{\min}(\iota(\lambda),\iota(\mu))\subseteq\iota(\Lambda)^{\min%&#10;}(\iota(\lambda),\iota(\mu))" text="(tilde@(Lambda)) ^ minimum * open-interval@(iota * lambda, iota * mu) subset-of-or-equals iota * Lambda ^ minimum * open-interval@(iota * lambda, iota * mu)" xml:id="S6.Ex14.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">min</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex14.m1.6"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex14.m1.7"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex14.m1.6">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex14.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex14.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex14.m1.7">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex14.m1.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex14.m1.2">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex14.m1.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex14.m1.3">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">min</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex14.m1.8"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex14.m1.9"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex14.m1.8">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex14.m1.4"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex14.m1.4">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex14.m1.9">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex14.m1.5"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex14.m1.5">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>as needed.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
  </section>

    <para xml:id="S7.p1">
      <p>Throughout this section, <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S7.p1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S7.p1.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>

          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a commutative ring with <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S7.p1.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
We start by identifying <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p1.m5">
          <XMath>

            </XMDual>

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm1.p1.m8.6.2">

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. There is a graded isomorphism of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.Thmthm1.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm1.p1.m9.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm1.p1.m9.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm1.p1.m9.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmthm1.p1.m9.1">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> onto <Math mode="inline" tex="B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.Thmthm1.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm1.p1.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm1.p1.m10.1">
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S7.p2">
        <p>We show that <Math mode="inline" tex="(q\circ\iota,t\circ\iota)" text="open-interval@(q compose iota, t compose iota)" xml:id="S7.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p2.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p2.m1.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p2.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p2.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S7.p2.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.p2.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p2.m3.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p2.m3.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p2.m3.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p2.m3.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>;
we start by verifying (KP1), (KP2) and (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S7.p2.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>), and then we use Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor-altKP3'"/> to verify (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S7.p2.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>).</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p3">
        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,t)" text="open-interval@(q, t)" xml:id="S7.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p3.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p3.m1.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p3.m1.1">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p3.m1.2">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{\Lambda}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p3.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family,
<Math mode="inline" tex="\{q_{v}:v\in\tilde{\Lambda}^{0}\}" text="conditional-set@(q _ v, v element-of (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ 0)" xml:id="S7.p3.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p3.m3.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p3.m3.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p3.m3.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p3.m3.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is an orthogonal set of idempotents, and hence so is
<Math mode="inline" tex="\{q_{\iota(w)}:w\in\Lambda^{0}\}" text="conditional-set@(q _ (iota * w), w element-of Lambda ^ 0)" xml:id="S7.p3.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p3.m4.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p3.m4.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p3.m4.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p3.m4.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p3.m4.1">w</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p3.m4.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. This gives (KP1) for <Math mode="inline" tex="(q\circ\iota,t\circ\iota)" text="open-interval@(q compose iota, t compose iota)" xml:id="S7.p3.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p3.m5.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p3.m5.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p3.m5.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p3.m5.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p4">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda^{\neq 0}" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda ^ (absent not-equals 0)" xml:id="S7.p4.m1">
            <XMath>

                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>

                  <XMApp>

                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\mu)=r(\lambda)" text="r * mu = r * lambda" xml:id="S7.p4.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p4.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p4.m2.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p4.m2.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p4.m2.2">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since
(KP2) holds for <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,t)" text="open-interval@(q, t)" xml:id="S7.p4.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p4.m3.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p4.m3.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p4.m3.1">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p4.m3.2">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
and <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota" text="iota" xml:id="S7.p4.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a graph morphism,
<Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\iota(\lambda)}t_{\iota(\mu)}=t_{\iota(\lambda)\iota(\mu)}=t_{\iota(\lambda%&#10;\mu)}" text="t _ (iota * lambda) * t _ (iota * mu) = t _ (iota * lambda * iota * mu) = t _ (iota * lambda * mu)" xml:id="S7.p4.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>

                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p4.m5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p4.m5.1">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p4.m5.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p4.m5.2">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p4.m5.3"/>

                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p4.m5.3">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p4.m5.4"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p4.m5.4">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p4.m5.5"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.p4.m5.5">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Similarly, the other equations in (KP2) hold for <Math mode="inline" tex="(q\circ\iota,t\circ\iota)" text="open-interval@(q compose iota, t compose iota)" xml:id="S7.p4.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p4.m6.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p4.m6.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p4.m6.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p4.m6.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p5">
        <p>For (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S7.p5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>), it suffices by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem-kp4alt"/> to show that for <Math mode="inline" tex="1\leq i\leq k" text="1 less= i less= k" xml:id="S7.p5.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with
<Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda^{e_{i}}\neq\emptyset" text="v * Lambda ^ (e _ i) not-equals empty-set" xml:id="S7.p5.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq-kp4alt" xml:id="S7.Ex1">
          <Math mode="display" tex="q_{\iota(v)}=\sum_{\lambda\in v\Lambda^{e_{i}}}t_{\iota(\lambda)}t_{\iota(%&#10;\lambda)^{*}}." text="q _ (iota * v) = (sum _ (lambda element-of v * Lambda ^ (e _ i)))@(t _ (iota * lambda) * t _ (iota * lambda ^ *))" xml:id="S7.Ex1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex1.m1.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex1.m1.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex1.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex1.m1.1">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex1.m1.2"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex1.m1.2">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex1.m1.3"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex1.m1.3">λ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda^{e_{i}}\neq\emptyset" text="v * Lambda ^ (e _ i) not-equals empty-set" xml:id="S7.p5.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and let <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu\in\iota(v){\tilde{\Lambda}}^{e_{i}}" text="mu element-of iota * v * (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ (e _ i)" xml:id="S7.p5.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p5.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p5.m5.1">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu=[x;(0,e_{i})]" text="mu = list@(x, open-interval@(0, e _ i))" xml:id="S7.p5.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p5.m6.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p5.m6.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p5.m6.2">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S7.p5.m6.3">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p5.m6.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p5.m6.3.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.p5.m6.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.p5.m6.3.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in v\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="x element-of v * Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S7.p5.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:0dlambda"/>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda^{e_{i}}\neq\emptyset" text="v * Lambda ^ (e _ i) not-equals empty-set" xml:id="S7.p5.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="r(x)=v" text="r * x = v" xml:id="S7.p5.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p5.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p5.m9.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we have <Math mode="inline" tex="d(x)\geq e_{i}" text="d * x &gt;= e _ i" xml:id="S7.p5.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p5.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p5.m10.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu=\iota(\lambda)" text="mu = iota * lambda" xml:id="S7.p5.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p5.m11.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p5.m11.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\in v\Lambda^{e_{i}}" text="lambda element-of v * Lambda ^ (e _ i)" xml:id="S7.p5.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:extending_bd_paths"/>, and this <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda" text="lambda" xml:id="S7.p5.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is unique because <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota" text="iota" xml:id="S7.p5.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is injective.

                            <XMText xml:id="S7.Ex2.m2.2">by (KP4) for <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,t)" text="open-interval@(q, t)" xml:id="S7.Ex2.m2.m1">

                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex2.m2.m1.1"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex2.m2.m1.2"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex2.m2.m1.1">q</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex2.m2.m1.2">t</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMath>
                              </Math>,</XMText>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>
          <equation xml:id="S7.Ex3">

        <p>Thus (KP4<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S7.p5.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) holds for <Math mode="inline" tex="(q\circ\iota,t\circ\iota)" text="open-interval@(q compose iota, t compose iota)" xml:id="S7.p5.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p5.m16.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p5.m16.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p5.m16.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p5.m16.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p6">
        <p>For (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S7.p6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>), let <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda,\mu\in\Lambda" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of Lambda" xml:id="S7.p6.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p6.m2.1">λ</XMTok>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then</p>

                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>

        <p>By Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor-altKP3'"/>, (KP3<Math mode="inline" tex="{}^{\prime}" text="^prime" xml:id="S7.p6.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUPERSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) holds for <Math mode="inline" tex="(q\circ\iota,t\circ\iota)" text="open-interval@(q compose iota, t compose iota)" xml:id="S7.p6.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p6.m4.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p6.m4.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p6.m4.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p6.m4.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and hence
<Math mode="inline" tex="(q\circ\iota,t\circ\iota)" text="open-interval@(q compose iota, t compose iota)" xml:id="S7.p6.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p6.m5.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p6.m5.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p6.m5.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p6.m5.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S7.p6.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.p6.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p6.m7.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p6.m7.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p6.m7.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p6.m7.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p7">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="(p,s)" text="open-interval@(p, s)" xml:id="S7.p7.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m1.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p7.m1.1">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p7.m1.2">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a generating Kumjian-Pask <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S7.p7.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p7.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m3.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m3.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m3.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p7.m3.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="(q\circ\iota,t\circ\iota)" text="open-interval@(q compose iota, t compose iota)" xml:id="S7.p7.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m4.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m4.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m4.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m4.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
is a <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S7.p7.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-family in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.p7.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m6.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m6.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m6.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m6.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the universal property of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p7.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m7.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m7.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m7.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> (Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm-KP"/>(<ref labelref="LABEL:item-a"/>)) gives an <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S7.p7.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-algebra homomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{q\circ\iota,t\circ\iota}:\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)\to\operatorname{%&#10;KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="pi _ (list@(q compose iota, t compose iota)) colon (KP _ R)@(Lambda) to (KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.p7.m9">

            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{q\circ\iota,t\circ\iota}(p_{v})=q_{\iota(v)}" text="pi _ (list@(q compose iota, t compose iota)) * p _ v = q _ (iota * v)" xml:id="S7.p7.m10">

          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{q\circ\iota,t\circ\iota}(s_{\lambda})=t_{\iota(\lambda)}" text="pi _ (list@(q compose iota, t compose iota)) * s _ lambda = t _ (iota * lambda)" xml:id="S7.p7.m11">

                  <XMApp>

            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota" text="iota" xml:id="S7.p7.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is degree preserving, <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{q\circ\iota,t\circ\iota}" text="pi _ (list@(q compose iota, t compose iota))" xml:id="S7.p7.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m14.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m14.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m14.1">
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m14.2">
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is graded. The graded-uniqueness
theorem (Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:gut"/>)
implies <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{q\circ\iota,t\circ\iota}" text="pi _ (list@(q compose iota, t compose iota))" xml:id="S7.p7.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m15.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m15.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m15.1">
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m15.2">
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is injective. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\{q\circ\iota(v),t\circ\iota(\lambda),t\circ\iota(\mu^{*})\}" text="set@((q compose iota) * v, (t compose iota) * lambda, (t compose iota) * mu ^ *)" xml:id="S7.p7.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m16.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m16.4"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m16.5"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m16.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m16.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p7.m16.1">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m16.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m16.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p7.m16.2">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m16.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m16.5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m16.5.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> generates <Math mode="inline" tex="B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p7.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m17.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m17.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the range of <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{q\circ\iota,t\circ\iota}" text="pi _ (list@(q compose iota, t compose iota))" xml:id="S7.p7.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m18.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m18.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m18.1">
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m18.2">
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p7.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p7.m19.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p7.m19.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
<!--  %**** String Line 1175 **** -->∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_prop" inlist="thm theorem:prop" labels="LABEL:lem:KPiotaL" xml:id="S7.Thmthm2">
