    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S7.p8">
        <p>The <Math mode="inline" tex="\subseteq" text="subset-of-or-equals" xml:id="S7.p8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> direction is obvious. To see the other containment, consider <Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\alpha}t_{\beta^{*}}" text="t _ alpha * t _ (beta ^ *)" xml:id="S7.p8.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> where
<Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha,\beta\in\tilde{\Lambda},r(\alpha),r(\beta)\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="formulae@(list@(alpha, beta) element-of tilde@(Lambda), list@(r * alpha, r * beta) element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0)" xml:id="S7.p8.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p8.m3.5"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p8.m3.6"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p8.m3.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

                            <XMRef idref="S7.p8.m3.3"/>

                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
We may assume <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\alpha)=s(\beta)" text="s * alpha = s * beta" xml:id="S7.p8.m4">

          </Math> by (KP2) and (KP1).

        <p>by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:0dlambda"/>.
Using the definition of <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S7.p8.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and the factorisation property in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p8.m9">

            </XMath>
          </Math>, there exist

<Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma^{\prime}=[y;(d(\beta)\wedge d(y),d(\beta))]" text="gamma ^ prime = list@(y, open-interval@(d * beta and d * y, d * beta))" xml:id="S7.p8.m14">
            <XMath>

                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p8.m14.4">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S7.p8.m14.5">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p8.m14.5.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p8.m14.5.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.p8.m14.5.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.p8.m14.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p8.m14.1">β</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.p8.m14.2"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p8.m14.2">y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.p8.m14.5.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.p8.m14.3"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p8.m14.3">β</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p9">
        <p>We claim that <Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma=\gamma^{\prime}." text="gamma = gamma ^ prime" xml:id="S7.p9.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p9.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p9.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
To prove the claim, we show that items (P1)–(P3) hold for <Math mode="inline" tex="(x;(d(\alpha)\wedge d(x),d(\alpha)))" text="list@(x, open-interval@(d * alpha and d * x, d * alpha))" xml:id="S7.p9.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>

                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p9.m2.4">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S7.p9.m2.5">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                      <XMRef idref="S7.p9.m2.5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p9.m2.5.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.p9.m2.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p9.m2.1">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.p9.m2.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                          </XMDual>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p9.m2.5.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p9.m2.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p9.m2.3">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>

                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
and <Math mode="inline" tex="(y;(d(\beta)\wedge d(y),d(\beta)))" text="list@(y, open-interval@(d * beta and d * y, d * beta))" xml:id="S7.p9.m3">

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p9.m3.5.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p9.m3.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p9.m3.3">β</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>

          </Math>.
First notice that (P2) is trivial; both the left and right-hand
sides of the (P2) equation are 0.
Now (V1) implies that</p>

        </equation>
        <p>Notice that equation (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:alphabeta_v2"/>) is precisely
(P3), and (P1) follows immediately from (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:alpha_beta_v1"/>). Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma=\gamma^{\prime}" text="gamma = gamma ^ prime" xml:id="S7.p9.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
as claimed.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p10">
        <p>Now we have</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:talphatbeta*" xml:id="S7.E3">
          <tags>
            <tag>(7.3)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">7.3</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="t_{\alpha}t_{\beta^{*}}=t_{\pi(\alpha)}t_{\gamma}t_{\gamma^{*}}t_{\pi(\beta)^{%&#10;*}}." text="t _ alpha * t _ (beta ^ *) = t _ (pi * alpha) * t _ gamma * t _ (gamma ^ *) * t _ (pi * beta ^ *)" xml:id="S7.E3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.E3.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.E3.m1.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.E3.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.E3.m1.1">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.E3.m1.2"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.E3.m1.2">β</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
<!--  %**** String Line 1225 **** -->                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Our next claim is that
<Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\gamma}t_{\gamma^{*}}=q_{r(\gamma)}" text="t _ gamma * t _ (gamma ^ *) = q _ (r * gamma)" xml:id="S7.p10.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p10.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p10.m1.1">γ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Since <Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p10.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has no sources, (KP4) says that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex8">
          <Math mode="display" tex="q_{r(\gamma)}=\sum_{\delta\in r(\gamma){\tilde{\Lambda}}^{d(\gamma)}}t_{\delta%&#10;}t_{\delta^{*}}." text="q _ (r * gamma) = (sum _ (delta element-of r * gamma * (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ (d * gamma)))@(t _ delta * t _ (delta ^ *))" xml:id="S7.Ex8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex8.m1.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex8.m1.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex8.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex8.m1.1">γ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">

                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex8.m1.3"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex8.m1.3">γ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S7.Ex8.m1.2"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex8.m1.2">γ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>But <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(\gamma)=r(\gamma)" text="pi * gamma = r * gamma" xml:id="S7.p10.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p10.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p10.m3.1">γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p10.m3.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p10.m3.2">γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> so
<Math mode="inline" tex="r(\gamma){\tilde{\Lambda}}^{d(\gamma)}=\{\gamma\}" text="r * gamma * (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ (d * gamma) = set@(gamma)" xml:id="S7.p10.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p10.m4.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p10.m4.2">γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p10.m4.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p10.m4.1">γ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p10.m4.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p10.m4.3">γ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:Claire_13_14"/>.
Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="q_{r(\gamma)}=t_{\gamma}t_{\gamma^{*}}" text="q _ (r * gamma) = t _ gamma * t _ (gamma ^ *)" xml:id="S7.p10.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p10.m5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p10.m5.1">γ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as claimed.
Finally, from (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:talphatbeta*"/>)
we have
<Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\alpha}t_{\beta^{*}}=t_{\pi(\alpha)}q_{r(\gamma)}t_{\pi(\beta^{*})}=t_{\pi(%&#10;\alpha)}t_{\pi(\beta^{*})}\in B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="t _ alpha * t _ (beta ^ *) = t _ (pi * alpha) * q _ (r * gamma) * t _ (pi * beta ^ *) = t _ (pi * alpha) * t _ (pi * beta ^ *) element-of B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p10.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>

                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>

                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p10.m6.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p10.m6.1">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p10.m6.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p10.m6.2">γ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p10.m6.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.p10.m6.3">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>

                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p10.m6.4"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p10.m6.4">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p10.m6.5"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.p10.m6.5">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p10.m6.6"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p10.m6.6">
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> since the range of <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S7.p10.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(\Lambda)" text="iota * Lambda" xml:id="S7.p10.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p10.m8.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p10.m8.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S7.p11">
      <p>We are ready to show <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p11.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m1.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m1.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S7.p11.m1.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p11.m1.1">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.p11.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m2.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m2.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S7.p11.m2.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p11.m2.1">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> are Morita equivalent. First, consider
how the analogous proof proceeds in the <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S7.p11.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-setting in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="W" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> and <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="F" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>.
Let <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S7.p11.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be a <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S7.p11.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra and <Math mode="inline" tex="p" text="p" xml:id="S7.p11.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> a projection in the multiplier algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="M(A)" text="M * A" xml:id="S7.p11.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m7.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p11.m7.1">A</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S7.p11.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="pAp" text="p * A * p" xml:id="S7.p11.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
is a sub <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S7.p11.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S7.p11.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\overline{ApA}" text="overline@(A * p * A)" xml:id="S7.p11.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is an ideal of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S7.p11.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="pA" text="p * A" xml:id="S7.p11.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>–<Math mode="inline" tex="\overline{ApA}" text="overline@(A * p * A)" xml:id="S7.p11.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
imprimitivity bimodule , giving a <Math mode="inline" tex="pAp" text="p * A * p" xml:id="S7.p11.m17">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>–<Math mode="inline" tex="\overline{ApA}" text="overline@(A * p * A)" xml:id="S7.p11.m18">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> Morita equivalence <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="tfb" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Example 2.12]</cite>.
Both Farthing and Webster show that the <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S7.p11.m19">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(\Lambda)" text="C ^ * * Lambda" xml:id="S7.p11.m20">

                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of a <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S7.p11.m21">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graph <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S7.p11.m22">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is
Morita equivalent to the <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S7.p11.m23">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="C ^ * * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p11.m24">

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of the desourcification <Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{\Lambda}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p11.m25">

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
that <Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{v\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})}q_{v}" text="(sum _ (v element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0))@(q _ v)" xml:id="S7.p11.m26">
          <XMath>

              <XMApp>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                      <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m26.1"/>

                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.p11.m26.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> converges to a projection <Math mode="inline" tex="p" text="p" xml:id="S7.p11.m27">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="M(C^{*}(\tilde{\Lambda}))" text="M * C ^ * * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p11.m28">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              <XMDual>

                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p11.m28.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m28.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.p11.m28.1">
                          <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
that <Math mode="inline" tex="p" text="p" xml:id="S7.p11.m29">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is full in the sense that <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(\tilde{\Lambda})pC^{*}(\tilde{\Lambda})=C^{*}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="C ^ * * tilde@(Lambda) * p * C ^ * * tilde@(Lambda) = C ^ * * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p11.m30">
          <XMath>

                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m30.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p11.m30.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m30.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p11.m30.2">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m30.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p11.m30.3">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>

              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and
identify <Math mode="inline" tex="pC^{*}(\tilde{\Lambda})p" text="p * C ^ * * tilde@(Lambda) * p" xml:id="S7.p11.m31">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m31.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p11.m31.1">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(\Lambda)" text="C ^ * * Lambda" xml:id="S7.p11.m32">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m32.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p11.m32.1">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. The work required to do this in the algebraic setting of Kumjian-Pask algebras is similar: the sum <Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{v\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})}q_{v}" text="(sum _ (v element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0))@(q _ v)" xml:id="S7.p11.m33">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m33.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.p11.m33.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> may not add up to an idempotent <Math mode="inline" tex="p" text="p" xml:id="S7.p11.m34">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.p11.m35">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m35.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p11.m35.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S7.p11.m35.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p11.m35.1">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, but we can write down

        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})p" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda)) * p" xml:id="S7.p11.m37">

        </Math> without explicit reference to <Math mode="inline" tex="p" text="p" xml:id="S7.p11.m38">

If <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S7.p11.m39">

        </Math> is finite, then <Math mode="inline" tex="p=\sum_{v\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})}q_{v}" text="p = (sum _ (v element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0))@(q _ v)" xml:id="S7.p11.m40">

        </Math>; notice that the right-hand-side still makes sense when <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S7.p11.m43">

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is infinite.</p>

    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:lem-helpMorita" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3">

      <para xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">The subset</text></p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex9">
          <Math mode="display" tex="M:={\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{t_{\lambda}t_{\mu^{*}}:\lambda,\mu\in\tilde%&#10;{\Lambda},r(\mu)\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})\}" text="M assign span@(t _ lambda * t _ (mu ^ *) colon list@(lambda, mu) element-of tilde@(Lambda), r * mu element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0)" xml:id="S7.Ex9.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>

                  <XMApp>

                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex9.m1.5">
                        <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>

                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>

          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>

                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1">

                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is closed under multiplication on the left by <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m2.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m2.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1">
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and on the right by <Math mode="inline" tex="B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1">
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. The subset</text></p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex10">
          <Math mode="display" tex="N:={\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{t_{\lambda}t_{\mu^{*}}:\lambda,\mu\in\tilde%&#10;{\Lambda},r(\lambda)\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})\}" text="N assign span@(t _ lambda * t _ (mu ^ *) colon list@(lambda, mu) element-of tilde@(Lambda), r * lambda element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0)" xml:id="S7.Ex10.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.Ex10.m1.4"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.Ex10.m1.5"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.Ex10.m1.6"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S7.Ex10.m1.4">span</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex10.m1.5">
                        <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex10.m1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex10.m1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex10.m1.1">λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex10.m1.2">μ</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex10.m1.6">
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex10.m1.3"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex10.m1.3">λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex10.m1.6.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex10.m1.6.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m4">
              <XMath>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is closed under multiplication on the left by <Math mode="inline" tex="B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m5">
              <XMath>

            </Math> and on the right by <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m6">

                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Further,</text></p>

    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S7.p12">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\alpha}t_{\beta^{*}}\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="t _ alpha * t _ (beta ^ *) element-of (KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.p12.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m1.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m1.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p12.m1.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p12.m1.1">
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\lambda}t_{\mu^{*}}\in M" text="t _ lambda * t _ (mu ^ *) element-of M" xml:id="S7.p12.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>

                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\eta}t_{\xi^{*}}\in B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="t _ eta * t _ (xi ^ *) element-of B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p12.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
