                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="a=d(\beta)\vee d(\lambda)" text="a = d * beta or d * lambda" xml:id="S7.p12.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m4.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p12.m4.1">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m4.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p12.m4.2">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="b=d(\mu)\vee d(\eta)" text="b = d * mu or d * eta" xml:id="S7.p12.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p12.m5.1">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m5.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p12.m5.2">η</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. By Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:lspfamily"/>,</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex13">
          <Math mode="display" tex="t_{\alpha}t_{\beta^{*}}t_{\lambda}t_{\mu^{*}}=\sum_{d(\beta\sigma)=a,\beta%&#10;\sigma=\lambda\tau}t_{\alpha\sigma}t_{(\mu\tau)^{*}}\in M" text="t _ alpha * t _ (beta ^ *) * t _ lambda * t _ (mu ^ *) = (sum _ (formulae@(d * beta * sigma = a, beta * sigma = lambda * tau)))@(t _ (alpha * sigma) * t _ ((mu * tau) ^ *)) element-of M" xml:id="S7.Ex13.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex13.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex13.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex13.m1.1">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex13.m1.1.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex13.m1.1.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex13.m1.2">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex13.m1.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex13.m1.3">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>because <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\mu\tau)=r(\mu)\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="r * mu * tau = r * mu element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S7.p12.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m6.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p12.m6.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p12.m6.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m6.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p12.m6.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Similarly,</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex14">
          <Math mode="display" tex="t_{\lambda}t_{\mu^{*}}t_{\eta}t_{\xi^{*}}=\sum_{d(\mu\sigma)=b,\mu\sigma=\eta%&#10;\tau}t_{\lambda\sigma}t_{(\xi\tau)^{*}}\in M" text="t _ lambda * t _ (mu ^ *) * t _ eta * t _ (xi ^ *) = (sum _ (formulae@(d * mu * sigma = b, mu * sigma = eta * tau)))@(t _ (lambda * sigma) * t _ ((xi * tau) ^ *)) element-of M" xml:id="S7.Ex14.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex14.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex14.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex14.m1.1">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>

                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex14.m1.2">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex14.m1.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex14.m1.3">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>because <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\xi\tau)=r(\xi)\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="r * xi * tau = r * xi element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S7.p12.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m7.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p12.m7.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p12.m7.1">ξ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m7.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p12.m7.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="M" text="M" xml:id="S7.p12.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is closed under multiplication on the left by <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.p12.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m9.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m9.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p12.m9.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p12.m9.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and on the right by <Math mode="inline" tex="B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p12.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p12.m10.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p12.m10.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The analogous assertion about <Math mode="inline" tex="N" text="N" xml:id="S7.p12.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> follows from Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:lspfamily"/> in the same way.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p13">
        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="M,N\subseteq\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="list@(M, N) subset-of-or-equals (KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.p13.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p13.m1.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p13.m1.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p13.m1.2">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p13.m1.3">N</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p13.m1.4"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p13.m1.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p13.m1.4">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p13.m1.1">
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, so is <Math mode="inline" tex="MN" text="M * N" xml:id="S7.p13.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. For the other inclusion, consider <Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\alpha}t_{\beta^{*}}\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="t _ alpha * t _ (beta ^ *) element-of (KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.p13.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

            </XMath>
          </Math>. We may assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\alpha}t_{\beta^{*}}\neq 0" text="t _ alpha * t _ (beta ^ *) not-equals 0" xml:id="S7.p13.m4">

Then (KP3) gives
<!--  %**** String Line 1275 **** --></p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex15">
          <Math mode="display" tex="t_{\alpha}t_{\beta^{*}}=t_{\alpha}q_{s(\alpha)}t_{\beta^{*}}=t_{\alpha}t_{%&#10;\lambda^{*}}t_{\lambda}t_{\beta^{*}}\in MN." text="t _ alpha * t _ (beta ^ *) = t _ alpha * q _ (s * alpha) * t _ (beta ^ *) = t _ alpha * t _ (lambda ^ *) * t _ lambda * t _ (beta ^ *) element-of M * N" xml:id="S7.Ex15.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex15.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex15.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex15.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex15.m1.1">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="MN=\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="M * N = (KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.p13.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p13.m14.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p13.m14.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p13.m14.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p13.m14.1">
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p14">
        <p>Next consider <Math mode="inline" tex="n=t_{\gamma}t_{\delta^{*}}\in N" text="n = t _ gamma * t _ (delta ^ *) element-of N" xml:id="S7.p14.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  </XMApp>

                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="m=t_{\lambda}t_{\mu^{*}}\in M" text="m = t _ lambda * t _ (mu ^ *) element-of M" xml:id="S7.p14.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>

                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="c=d(\mu)\vee d(\gamma)" text="c = d * mu or d * gamma" xml:id="S7.p14.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m3.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p14.m3.1">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m3.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p14.m3.2">γ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. By Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:lspfamily"/>,</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex16">
          <Math mode="display" tex="nm=\sum_{d(\delta\sigma)=c,\delta\sigma=\lambda\tau}t_{\gamma\sigma}t_{(\mu%&#10;\tau)^{*}}." text="n * m = (sum _ (formulae@(d * delta * sigma = c, delta * sigma = lambda * tau)))@(t _ (gamma * sigma) * t _ ((mu * tau) ^ *))" xml:id="S7.Ex16.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex16.m1.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex16.m1.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex16.m1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex16.m1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex16.m1.1">
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S7.Ex16.m1.1.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex16.m1.1.1">
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex16.m1.2">
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex16.m1.3"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex16.m1.3">
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>In each summand, <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\gamma\sigma)=r(\gamma)\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="r * gamma * sigma = r * gamma element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S7.p14.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m4.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p14.m4.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p14.m4.1">γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m4.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p14.m4.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\mu\tau)=r(\mu)\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="r * mu * tau = r * mu element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S7.p14.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m5.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p14.m5.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p14.m5.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m5.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p14.m5.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and hence each summand is in <Math mode="inline" tex="B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p14.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m6.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p14.m6.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:KPiotaL"/>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="NM\subseteq B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="N * M subset-of-or-equals B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p14.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p14.m7.1">
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. For the other inclusion, consider <Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\eta}t_{\xi^{*}}\in B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="t _ eta * t _ (xi ^ *) element-of B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p14.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m8.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p14.m8.1">
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\eta}t_{\xi^{*}}=t_{\eta}q_{s(\eta)}q_{s(\xi)}t_{\xi^{*}}=t_{\eta}t_{s(\eta%&#10;)}t_{s(\xi)}t_{\xi^{*}}\in NM" text="t _ eta * t _ (xi ^ *) = t _ eta * q _ (s * eta) * q _ (s * xi) * t _ (xi ^ *) = t _ eta * t _ (s * eta) * t _ (s * xi) * t _ (xi ^ *) element-of N * M" xml:id="S7.p14.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m9.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p14.m9.1">η</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m9.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p14.m9.2">ξ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m9.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p14.m9.3">η</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m9.4"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p14.m9.4">ξ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="NM=B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="N * M = B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p14.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p14.m10.1">
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S7.p15">
      <p>Now we recall the notion of a Morita context from <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="GS" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, page 41]</cite>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S7.p15.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S7.p15.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be rings, <Math mode="inline" tex="M" text="M" xml:id="S7.p15.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> an <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S7.p15.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>–<Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S7.p15.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> bimodule, <Math mode="inline" tex="N" text="N" xml:id="S7.p15.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> a <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S7.p15.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>–<Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S7.p15.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> bimodule, and</p>

      <p>bimodule homomorphisms satisfying</p>

        <Math mode="display" tex="n^{\prime}\cdot\psi(m\otimes n)=\phi(n^{\prime}\otimes m)\cdot n\text{ and }m^%&#10;{\prime}\cdot\phi(n\otimes m)=\psi(m^{\prime}\otimes n)\cdot m" text="(n ^ prime cdot psi) * (m tensor-product n) = ((((phi * (n ^ prime tensor-product m)) cdot n) * [ and ] * m ^ prime) cdot phi) * (n tensor-product m) = (psi * (m ^ prime tensor-product n)) cdot m" xml:id="S7.E4.m1">

          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>for <Math mode="inline" tex="n,n^{\prime}\in N" text="list@(n, n ^ prime) element-of N" xml:id="S7.p15.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m9.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m9.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p15.m9.1">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p15.m9.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="m,m^{\prime}\in M" text="list@(m, m ^ prime) element-of M" xml:id="S7.p15.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m10.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m10.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p15.m10.1">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p15.m10.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
Then <Math mode="inline" tex="(A,B,M,N,\psi,\phi)" text="vector@(A, B, M, N, psi, phi)" xml:id="S7.p15.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m11.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m11.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m11.3"/>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m11.4"/>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m11.5"/>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m11.6"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p15.m11.1">A</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p15.m11.2">B</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p15.m11.3">M</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p15.m11.4">N</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p15.m11.5">ψ</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p15.m11.6">ϕ</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">Morita context</text> between <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S7.p15.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S7.p15.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>; it is called <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">surjective</text> if <Math mode="inline" tex="\psi" text="psi" xml:id="S7.p15.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S7.p15.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> are surjective.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_thm" inlist="thm theorem:thm" labels="LABEL:thm:m_context" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem 7.4</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">7.4</tag>

              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>

            </Math> its
desourcification. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,t)" text="open-interval@(q, t)" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m4">

          <item labels="LABEL:item-bb" xml:id="S7.I1.i2">
            <tags>
              <tag>(2)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">2</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 2</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S7.I1.i2.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">there are surjective maps
</text><Math mode="inline" tex="\psi:M\otimes_{B(\tilde{\Lambda})}N\to\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="psi colon M tensor-product _ (B * tilde@(Lambda)) N to (KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S7.I1.i2.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp meaning="tensor-product" role="MULOP">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S7.I1.i2.p1.m1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.I1.i2.p1.m1.1">
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.I1.i2.p1.m1.3"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.I1.i2.p1.m1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.I1.i2.p1.m1.3">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> and </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\phi:N\otimes_{\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})}M\to\operatorname{KP}_{R%&#10;}(\Lambda)" text="phi colon N tensor-product _ ((KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))) M to (KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.I1.i2.p1.m2">

    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S7.p16">
      <p>Composing with the isomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{q\circ\iota,t\circ\iota}:\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)\to B(\tilde{%&#10;\Lambda})" text="pi _ (list@(q compose iota, t compose iota)) colon (KP _ R)@(Lambda) to B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S7.p16.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p16.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p16.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p16.m1.1">
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p16.m1.2">
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p16.m1.5"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p16.m1.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p16.m1.5">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    </XMWrap>

                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p16.m1.4">
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
