        <p>and <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S8.p4.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is saturated, <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(v)\in H" text="pi * v element-of H" xml:id="S8.p4.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p4.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p4.m3.1">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as well.
Conversely, suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(v)\in H" text="pi * v element-of H" xml:id="S8.p4.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p4.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p4.m4.1">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\lambda)=\pi(v)\in H" text="r * lambda = pi * v element-of H" xml:id="S8.p4.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p4.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p4.m5.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p4.m5.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p4.m5.2">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
and <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S8.p4.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> hereditary implies <Math mode="inline" tex="v=s(\lambda)\in H" text="v = s * lambda element-of H" xml:id="S8.p4.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p4.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p4.m7.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S8.p5">
      <p>Following <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="T" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, we say an ideal <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S8.p5.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p5.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S8.p5.m2.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S8.p5.m2.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S8.p5.m2.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p5.m2.1">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">basic ideal</text> if <Math mode="inline" tex="rp_{v}\in I" text="r * p _ v element-of I" xml:id="S8.p5.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S8.p5.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="r\in R\setminus\{0\}" text="r element-of R set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S8.p5.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p5.m5.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S8.p5.m5.1">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
imply <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{v}\in I" text="p _ v element-of I" xml:id="S8.p5.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
We say <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p5.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S8.p5.m7.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S8.p5.m7.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S8.p5.m7.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p5.m7.1">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">basically simple</text> if its only basic ideals are <Math mode="inline" tex="\{0\}" text="set@(0)" xml:id="S8.p5.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                <XMRef idref="S8.p5.m8.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S8.p5.m8.1">0</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p5.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S8.p5.m9.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S8.p5.m9.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S8.p5.m9.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p5.m9.1">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S8.p6">
      <p>The Morita context of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:m_context"/> induces a lattice isomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="L" text="L" xml:id="S8.p6.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> between the ideals
of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S8.p6.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S8.p6.m2.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S8.p6.m2.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S8.p6.m2.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p6.m2.1">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and ideals of <Math mode="inline" tex="B({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p6.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S8.p6.m3.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p6.m3.1">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="L(I)=NIM" text="L * I = N * I * M" xml:id="S8.p6.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p6.m4.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p6.m4.1">I</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="GS" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proposition 3.5]</cite>.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_prop" inlist="thm theorem:prop" labels="LABEL:prop:basicideals" xml:id="S8.Thmthm2">
      <tags>
        <tag>Proposition 8.2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">8.2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Proposition 8.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Proposition 8.2</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="(\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}}),B({\tilde{\Lambda}}),M,N)" text="vector@((KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda)), B * tilde@(Lambda), M, N)" xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m1.5"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m1.6"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m1.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m1.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m1.5">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m1.5.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m1.1"/>
                      </XMApp>

                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>

                          </XMApp>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>

                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m1.2">
                            <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m1.3">M</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m1.4">N</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be the Morita context
of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:m_context"/> and <Math mode="inline" tex="L:I\mapsto NIM" text="L colon I maps-to N * I * M" xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>

                  <XMApp>

                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be
be the induced lattice isomorphism from the ideals of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m3.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m3.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m3.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m3.1">
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> to the ideals of
<Math mode="inline" tex="B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m4.1">
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
Then <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a basic ideal in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m6.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m6.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m6.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m6.1">
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="L(I)" text="L * I" xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m7.1">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a basic ideal in <Math mode="inline" tex="B({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m8.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S8.Thmthm2.p1.m8.1">
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S8.p7">
        <p>Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S8.p7.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a basic ideal of
<!--  %**** String Line 1400 **** --><Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S8.p7.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p7.m2.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p7.m2.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p7.m2.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S8.p7.m2.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Fix <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="v element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S8.p7.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p7.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S8.p7.m3.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and nonzero <Math mode="inline" tex="r\in R" text="r element-of R" xml:id="S8.p7.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="rp_{v}\in L(I)" text="r * p _ v element-of L * I" xml:id="S8.p7.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p7.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p7.m5.1">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Since
<Math mode="inline" tex="N" text="N" xml:id="S8.p7.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="M" text="M" xml:id="S8.p7.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are subsets of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S8.p7.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p7.m8.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p7.m8.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p7.m8.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S8.p7.m8.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S8.p7.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is an ideal of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S8.p7.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p7.m10.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p7.m10.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p7.m10.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S8.p7.m10.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we have <Math mode="inline" tex="L(I)=NIM\subseteq I" text="L * I = N * I * M subset-of-or-equals I" xml:id="S8.p7.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p7.m11.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p7.m11.1">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus
<Math mode="inline" tex="rp_{v}\in I" text="r * p _ v element-of I" xml:id="S8.p7.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and hence <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{v}\in I" text="p _ v element-of I" xml:id="S8.p7.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> because <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S8.p7.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a basic ideal.
Since <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="v element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S8.p7.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p7.m15.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S8.p7.m15.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we have <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{v}\in M\cap N" text="p _ v element-of M intersection N" xml:id="S8.p7.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Now</p>
        <equation xml:id="S8.Ex5">
          <Math mode="display" tex="p_{v}=p_{v}p_{v}p_{v}\in NIM=L(I)." text="p _ v = p _ v * p _ v * p _ v element-of N * I * M = L * I" xml:id="S8.Ex5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S8.Ex5.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.Ex5.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S8.Ex5.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.Ex5.m1.1">I</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="L(I)" text="L * I" xml:id="S8.p7.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p7.m17.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p7.m17.1">I</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a basic ideal of <Math mode="inline" tex="B({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p7.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p7.m18.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S8.p7.m18.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S8.p8">
        <p>Conversely, let <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S8.p8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be an ideal in <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S8.p8.m2">
            <XMath>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m2.2"/>

                  </XMApp>

                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S8.p8.m2.1">

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="L(I)" text="L * I" xml:id="S8.p8.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a basic ideal of <Math mode="inline" tex="B({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p8.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m4.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S8.p8.m4.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We will
show <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S8.p8.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a basic ideal.
Fix <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in{\tilde{\Lambda}}^{0}" text="v element-of (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ 0" xml:id="S8.p8.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and nonzero <Math mode="inline" tex="r\in R" text="r element-of R" xml:id="S8.p8.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="rp_{v}\in I" text="r * p _ v element-of I" xml:id="S8.p8.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Then <Math mode="inline" tex="v" text="v" xml:id="S8.p8.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is an element of</p>
        <equation xml:id="S8.Ex6">
          <Math mode="display" tex="H_{I,r}:=\{v\in{\tilde{\Lambda}}^{0}:rp_{v}\in I\}," text="H _ (list@(I, r)) assign conditional-set@(v element-of (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ 0, r * p _ v element-of I)" xml:id="S8.Ex6.m1">

              <XMDual>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S8.Ex6.m1.3.1">

                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>

                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>which is saturated and hereditary by <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 5.2]</cite>. Hence <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(v)\in H_{I,r}" text="pi * v element-of H _ (list@(I, r))" xml:id="S8.p8.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m10.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p8.m10.3">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m10.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m10.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p8.m10.1">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p8.m10.2">r</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:sat_pi"/> which means <Math mode="inline" tex="rp_{\pi(v)}\in I" text="r * p _ (pi * v) element-of I" xml:id="S8.p8.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m11.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p8.m11.1">v</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Notice that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(v)\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="pi * v element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S8.p8.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m12.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p8.m12.1">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m12.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S8.p8.m12.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and so <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{\pi(v)}\in M\cap N" text="p _ (pi * v) element-of M intersection N" xml:id="S8.p8.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m13.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p8.m13.1">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then</p>
        <equation xml:id="S8.Ex7">
          <Math mode="display" tex="rp_{\pi(v)}=p_{\pi(v)}rp_{\pi(v)}p_{\pi(v)}\in NIM=L(I)." text="r * p _ (pi * v) = p _ (pi * v) * r * p _ (pi * v) * p _ (pi * v) element-of N * I * M = L * I" xml:id="S8.Ex7.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S8.Ex7.m1.6"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.Ex7.m1.6">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S8.Ex7.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.Ex7.m1.1">v</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S8.Ex7.m1.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>

                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>

                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        <XMApp>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S8.Ex7.m1.5"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.Ex7.m1.5">I</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Therefore <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{\pi(v)}\in L(I)" text="p _ (pi * v) element-of L * I" xml:id="S8.p8.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m14.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p8.m14.1">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m14.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p8.m14.2">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> because <Math mode="inline" tex="L(I)" text="L * I" xml:id="S8.p8.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m15.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p8.m15.1">I</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is basic.
Thus we have</p>
        <equation xml:id="S8.Ex8">
          <Math mode="display" tex="p_{\pi(v)}=p_{\pi(v)}p_{\pi(v)}p_{\pi(v)}\in ML(I)N=I." text="p _ (pi * v) = p _ (pi * v) * p _ (pi * v) * p _ (pi * v) element-of M * L * I * N = I" xml:id="S8.Ex8.m1">

        <p>Now <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(v)\in H_{I,1}" text="pi * v element-of H _ (list@(I, 1))" xml:id="S8.p8.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m16.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p8.m16.3">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m16.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m16.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p8.m16.1">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S8.p8.m16.2">1</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> which is saturated and hereditary by <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 5.2]</cite>.
Therefore <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in H_{I,1}" text="v element-of H _ (list@(I, 1))" xml:id="S8.p8.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m17.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S8.p8.m17.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p8.m17.1">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S8.p8.m17.2">1</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:sat_pi"/>; that is <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{v}\in I" text="p _ v element-of I" xml:id="S8.p8.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>

    <para xml:id="S8.p10">
      <p>Next we want to transfer results about <Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p10.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> to <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S8.p10.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. To use results
already in the literature we need to reconcile some (of the many) aperiodicity conditions that have been used.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:lem-pain" xml:id="S8.Thmthm4">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 8.4</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">8.4</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 8.4</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 8.4</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S8.Thmthm4.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S8.Thmthm4.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S8.Thmthm4.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph.</text></p>
        <enumerate xml:id="S8.I1">
          <item labels="LABEL:paina" xml:id="S8.I1.i1">
            <tags>
              <tag>(1)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 1</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S8.I1.i1.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">Suppose that </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S8.I1.i1.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> has no sources. The following aperiodicity conditions are equivalent:</text></p>
              <enumerate xml:id="S8.I1.I1">
                <item labels="LABEL:itemii" xml:id="S8.I1.i1.i1">
                  <tags>
                    <tag>(a)</tag>
                    <tag role="refnum">1a</tag>
                    <tag role="typerefnum">item 1a</tag>
                  </tags>
                  <para xml:id="S8.I1.i1.i1.p1">
                    <p>(“Condition B” from <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RSY03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Theorem 4.3]</cite> for graphs without sources; our (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:aperiodic"/>) reduces to this)<break/><text font="italic">For every </text><Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S8.I1.i1.i1.p1.m1">
                        <XMath>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>

                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMath>
                      </Math><text font="italic"> there exists </text><Math mode="inline" tex="x\in v\Lambda^{\infty}" text="x element-of v * Lambda ^ infinity" xml:id="S8.I1.i1.i1.p1.m2">
                        <XMath>
                          <XMApp>

                        <XMath>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>

                      </Math><text font="italic"> such that
