          </item>
          <item labels="LABEL:painb" xml:id="S8.I1.i2">
            <tags>
              <tag>(2)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">2</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 2</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S8.I1.i2.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">Suppose that </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is locally convex. The following aperiodicity conditions on </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> are equivalent:</text></p>
              <enumerate xml:id="S8.I1.I2">
                <item xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i1">
                  <tags>
                    <tag>(a)</tag>
                    <tag role="refnum">2a</tag>
                    <tag role="typerefnum">item 2a</tag>
                  </tags>
                  <para xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i1.p1">
                    <p>(“Condition B” from <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RSY03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Theorem 4.3]</cite>, this is our (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:aperiodic"/>))<break/><text font="italic">For every </text><Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i1.p1.m1">
                        <XMath>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMath>
                      </Math><text font="italic">, there exists </text><Math mode="inline" tex="x\in v\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="x element-of v * Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i1.p1.m2">
                        <XMath>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMath>
                      </Math><text font="italic">
such that </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha\neq\beta\in\Lambda" text="alpha not-equals beta element-of Lambda" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i1.p1.m3">
                        <XMath>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMath>
                      </Math><text font="italic"> implies </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha x\neq\beta x" text="alpha * x not-equals beta * x" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i1.p1.m4">
                        <XMath>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMath>
                      </Math><text font="italic">.</text></p>
                  </para>
                </item>
                <item xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i2">
                  <tags>
                    <tag>(b)</tag>
                    <tag role="refnum">2b</tag>
                    <tag role="typerefnum">item 2b</tag>
                  </tags>
                  <para xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1">
                    <p>(The “no local periodicity condition” from <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RS2009" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Definition 3.2]</cite>)<break/><text font="italic">For every </text><Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m1">
                        <XMath>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMath>
                      </Math><text font="italic"> and all </text><Math mode="inline" tex="m\neq n\in{\mathbb{N}}^{k}" text="m not-equals n element-of N ^ k" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m2">
                        <XMath>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMath>
                      </Math><text font="italic">, there exists </text><Math mode="inline" tex="x\in\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="x element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m3">
                        <XMath>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                                <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMath>
                      </Math><text font="italic"> such that either </text><Math mode="inline" tex="m-m\wedge d(x)\neq n-n\wedge d(x)" text="(m - m) and d * x not-equals (n - n) and d * x" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m4">
                        <XMath>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m4.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m4.1">x</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m4.2"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m4.2">x</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMath>
                      </Math><text font="italic"> or </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma^{m\wedge d(x)}(x)\neq\sigma^{n\wedge d(x)}(x)" text="sigma ^ (m and d * x) * x not-equals sigma ^ (n and d * x) * x" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m5">
                        <XMath>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m5.1"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m5.3"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m5.3">x</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="and" name="wedge" role="ADDOP">∧</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m5.2"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m5.2">x</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m5.4"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.I1.i2.i2.p1.m5.4">x</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMath>
                      </Math><text font="italic">.</text></p>
                  </para>
                </item>
              </enumerate>
            </para>
          </item>
        </enumerate>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S8.p11">
        <p>For the equivalences in (<ref labelref="LABEL:paina"/>), see <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RS2009" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 3.2]</cite>, and for the equivalences in (<ref labelref="LABEL:painb"/>), see
<cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Shotwell" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proposition 2.11]</cite>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S8.p12">
      <p>A locally convex, row-finite graph <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S8.p12.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graph <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S8.p12.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is said to be <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">cofinal</text> in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RS2009" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Definition 3.1]</cite>
if for every <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in\Lambda^{\leq\infty}" text="x element-of Lambda ^ (absent less= infinity)" xml:id="S8.p12.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and every <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\Lambda^{0}" text="v element-of Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S8.p12.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, there exists <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{N}}^{k}" text="n element-of N ^ k" xml:id="S8.p12.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="n\leq d(x)" text="n less= d * x" xml:id="S8.p12.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p12.m6.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p12.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda x(n)\neq\emptyset" text="v * Lambda * x * n not-equals empty-set" xml:id="S8.p12.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p12.m7.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p12.m7.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. When <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S8.p12.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> has no sources, the cofinality condition reduces
to the one given in section <ref labelref="LABEL:sec_cofinal"/>.
<!--  %**** String Line 1475 **** --></p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_thm" inlist="thm theorem:thm" xml:id="S8.Thmthm5">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem 8.5</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">8.5</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem 8.5</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem 8.5</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S8.Thmthm5.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S8.Thmthm5.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S8.Thmthm5.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-graph and <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S8.Thmthm5.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a commutative ring with <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S8.Thmthm5.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then</text></p>
        <enumerate xml:id="S8.I2">
          <item labels="LABEL:item-bs" xml:id="S8.I2.i1">
            <tags>
              <tag>(1)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 1</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S8.I2.i1.p1">
              <p><Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.I2.i1.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S8.I2.i1.p1.m1.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S8.I2.i1.p1.m1.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S8.I2.i1.p1.m1.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.I2.i1.p1.m1.1">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is basically simple if and only if </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S8.I2.i1.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is cofinal and aperiodic;</text></p>
            </para>
          </item>
          <item labels="LABEL:item-s" xml:id="S8.I2.i2">
            <tags>
              <tag>(2)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">2</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 2</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S8.I2.i2.p1">
              <p><Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.I2.i2.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S8.I2.i2.p1.m1.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S8.I2.i2.p1.m1.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S8.I2.i2.p1.m1.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.I2.i2.p1.m1.1">Λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is simple if and only if </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S8.I2.i2.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is cofinal and aperiodic, and </text><Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S8.I2.i2.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is a field.</text></p>
            </para>
          </item>
        </enumerate>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S8.p13">
        <p>(<ref labelref="LABEL:item-bs"/>)
By Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor:basicsimple"/>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p13.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p13.m1.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p13.m1.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p13.m1.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p13.m1.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is basically simple if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S8.p13.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p13.m2.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p13.m2.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p13.m2.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S8.p13.m2.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is basically simple.
Since <Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p13.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is row-finite with no sources, by <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Theorem 5.14]</cite>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S8.p13.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p13.m4.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p13.m4.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p13.m4.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S8.p13.m4.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is basically simple if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p13.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is cofinal and aperiodic in the sense of condition (<ref labelref="LABEL:itemiii"/>) of Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem-pain"/>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S8.p14">
        <p>By <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RS2009" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proposition 3.5]</cite>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p14.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is cofinal if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S8.p14.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is cofinal. By <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="RS2009" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proposition 3.6]</cite>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p14.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has
no local periodicity if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S8.p14.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has no local periodicity.
Using Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem-pain"/> it follows that <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p14.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p14.m5.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p14.m5.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p14.m5.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p14.m5.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is basically simple if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S8.p14.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is cofinal and aperiodic
(in the sense of the equivalent conditions of Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem-pain"/>(<ref labelref="LABEL:painb"/>)).</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S8.p15">
        <p>(<ref labelref="LABEL:item-s"/>) By Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor-Morita"/>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p15.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p15.m1.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p15.m1.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p15.m1.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p15.m1.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is Morita equivalent to <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S8.p15.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p15.m2.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p15.m2.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p15.m2.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S8.p15.m2.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p15.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p15.m3.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p15.m3.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p15.m3.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p15.m3.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is simple if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S8.p15.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p15.m4.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p15.m4.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p15.m4.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S8.p15.m4.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is. By <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Theorem 6.1]</cite>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S8.p15.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p15.m5.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p15.m5.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p15.m5.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S8.p15.m5.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is simple if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S8.p15.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a field and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p15.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is cofinal and aperiodic. The same shenanigans as in (<ref labelref="LABEL:item-bs"/>) now give that <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S8.p15.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p15.m8.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S8.p15.m8.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S8.p15.m8.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S8.p15.m8.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is simple if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S8.p15.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a field and <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S8.p15.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is cofinal and aperiodic.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
  </section>
  <section inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:sec-ideals" xml:id="S9">
    <tags>
      <tag>9</tag>
      <tag role="refnum">9</tag>
      <tag role="typerefnum">§9</tag>
    </tags>
    <title><tag close=". ">9</tag>The ideal structure</title>
    <toctitle><tag close=" ">9</tag>The ideal structure</toctitle>
    <para xml:id="S9.p1">
      <p>Throughout this section <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda" text="Lambda" xml:id="S9.p1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S9.p1.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graph, and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S9.p1.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is its desourcification. Recall that <Math mode="inline" tex="B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S9.p1.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m4.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S9.p1.m4.1">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is the subalgebra of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S9.p1.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m5.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m5.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S9.p1.m5.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S9.p1.m5.1">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> generated by <Math mode="inline" tex="\{q_{\iota(v)},t_{\iota(\lambda)},t_{\iota(\mu)}:v\in\Lambda^{0},\lambda,\mu%&#10;\in\Lambda\}" text="conditional-set@(list@(q _ (iota * v), t _ (iota * lambda), t _ (iota * mu)), formulae@(v element-of list@(Lambda ^ 0, lambda), mu element-of Lambda))" xml:id="S9.p1.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m6.5"/>
                <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m6.6"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMDual xml:id="S9.p1.m6.5">
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m6.5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m6.5.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m6.5.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p1.m6.5.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m6.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p1.m6.1">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p1.m6.5.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m6.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p1.m6.2">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p1.m6.5.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m6.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p1.m6.3">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMDual xml:id="S9.p1.m6.6">
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m6.6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m6.6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p1.m6.6.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m6.6.1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m6.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S9.p1.m6.6.1.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p1.m6.4">λ</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p1.m6.6.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and is canonically isomorphic to <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S9.p1.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m7.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m7.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S9.p1.m7.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p1.m7.1">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> by Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:Claire_Prop_11''"/>. We now use the Morita context between <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S9.p1.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m8.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m8.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S9.p1.m8.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S9.p1.m8.1">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="B({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S9.p1.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m9.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S9.p1.m9.1">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> to show that there is a lattice isomorphism from the hereditary, saturated subsets of <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{0}" text="Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S9.p1.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> onto the basic, graded ideals of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S9.p1.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m11.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S9.p1.m11.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp xml:id="S9.p1.m11.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p1.m11.1">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. This extends <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Theorem 5.1]</cite> to locally convex, row-finite <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S9.p1.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-graphs.</p>
    </para>

      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 9.1</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S9.Thmthm1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi:{\tilde{\Lambda}}\to\iota(\Lambda)" text="pi colon tilde@(Lambda) to iota * Lambda" xml:id="S9.Thmthm1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>

                    <XMApp>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be the projection defined in Remark <ref labelref="LABEL:rmk-structurelambda0"/>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="H\mapsto\pi(H)" text="H maps-to pi * H" xml:id="S9.Thmthm1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>

                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a lattice isomorphism of the hereditary, saturated subsets of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}^{0}" text="(tilde@(Lambda)) ^ 0" xml:id="S9.Thmthm1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> onto the hereditary, saturated subsets of <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S9.Thmthm1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

            </Math>.</text></p>

    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S9.p2">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S9.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a hereditary, saturated subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}^{0}" text="(tilde@(Lambda)) ^ 0" xml:id="S9.p2.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. To see that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(H)" text="pi * H" xml:id="S9.p2.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p2.m3.1">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a hereditary subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S9.p2.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m4.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p2.m4.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, let <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\pi(H)" text="v element-of pi * H" xml:id="S9.p2.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p2.m5.1">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\in v\iota(\Lambda)" text="lambda element-of v * iota * Lambda" xml:id="S9.p2.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p2.m6.1">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\lambda)\in\pi(H)" text="r * lambda element-of pi * H" xml:id="S9.p2.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p2.m7.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m7.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p2.m7.2">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we have <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\lambda)\in H" text="r * lambda element-of H" xml:id="S9.p2.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m8.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p2.m8.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:sat_pi"/>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\lambda)\in H" text="s * lambda element-of H" xml:id="S9.p2.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p2.m9.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> because <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S9.p2.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is hereditary. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\in\iota(\Lambda)" text="lambda element-of iota * Lambda" xml:id="S9.p2.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m11.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p2.m11.1">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S9.p2.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a graph morphism, we have <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\lambda)=s(\pi(\lambda))=\pi(s(\lambda))\in\pi(H)" text="s * lambda = s * pi * lambda = pi * s * lambda element-of pi * H" xml:id="S9.p2.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m13.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p2.m13.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m13.5"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p2.m13.5">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m13.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p2.m13.2">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m13.6"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p2.m13.6">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m13.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p2.m13.3">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m13.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p2.m13.4">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(H)" text="pi * H" xml:id="S9.p2.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p2.m14.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p2.m14.1">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is hereditary.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S9.p3">
        <p>To see that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(H)" text="pi * H" xml:id="S9.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p3.m1.1">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is saturated, let <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="v element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S9.p3.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p3.m2.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and suppose that
<Math mode="inline" tex="s(v\iota(\Lambda^{\leq e_{i}}))\subseteq\pi(H)" text="s * v * iota * Lambda ^ (absent less= e _ i) subset-of-or-equals pi * H" xml:id="S9.p3.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m3.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p3.m3.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m3.2.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S9.p3.m3.2.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                                <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p3.m3.1">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="1\leq i\leq k" text="1 less= i less= k" xml:id="S9.p3.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. There are two cases. First, suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda^{\leq e_{i}}=\{v\}" text="v * Lambda ^ (absent less= e _ i) = set@(v)" xml:id="S9.p3.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m5.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p3.m5.1">v</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="\{v\}=s(v\iota(\Lambda^{\leq e_{i}}))\subseteq\pi(H)" text="set@(v) = s * v * iota * Lambda ^ (absent less= e _ i) subset-of-or-equals pi * H" xml:id="S9.p3.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m6.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p3.m6.1">v</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m6.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p3.m6.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m6.3.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
