                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S9.p3.m6.3.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                                <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m6.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p3.m6.2">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> gives <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\pi(H)" text="v element-of pi * H" xml:id="S9.p3.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p3.m7.1">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as required. Second, suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="v\Lambda^{\leq e_{i}}=v\Lambda^{e_{i}}" text="v * Lambda ^ (absent less= e _ i) = v * Lambda ^ (e _ i)" xml:id="S9.p3.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="v\iota(\Lambda^{\leq e_{i}})=v{\tilde{\Lambda}}^{e_{i}}" text="v * iota * Lambda ^ (absent less= e _ i) = v * (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ (e _ i)" xml:id="S9.p3.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p3.m9.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Also <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(H)\subseteq H" text="pi * H subset-of-or-equals H" xml:id="S9.p3.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p3.m10.1">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:sat_pi"/>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="s(v\tilde{\Lambda}^{e_{i}})\subseteq H" text="s * v * (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ (e _ i) subset-of-or-equals H" xml:id="S9.p3.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m11.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p3.m11.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and since <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S9.p3.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is saturated in <Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{\Lambda}^{0}" text="(tilde@(Lambda)) ^ 0" xml:id="S9.p3.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we get <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in H" text="v element-of H" xml:id="S9.p3.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Now <Math mode="inline" tex="v=\pi(v)\in\pi(H)" text="v = pi * v element-of pi * H" xml:id="S9.p3.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m15.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p3.m15.1">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m15.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p3.m15.2">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as required. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(H)" text="pi * H" xml:id="S9.p3.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m16.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p3.m16.1">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a saturated subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(\Lambda)" text="iota * Lambda" xml:id="S9.p3.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p3.m17.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p3.m17.1">Λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S9.p4">
        <p>To see that <Math mode="inline" tex="H\mapsto\pi(H)" text="H maps-to pi * H" xml:id="S9.p4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p4.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p4.m1.1">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is injective, suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(H)=\pi(K)" text="pi * H = pi * K" xml:id="S9.p4.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p4.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p4.m2.1">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p4.m2.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p4.m2.2">K</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in H" text="v element-of H" xml:id="S9.p4.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(v)\in\pi(H)=\pi(K)" text="pi * v element-of pi * H = pi * K" xml:id="S9.p4.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p4.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p4.m4.1">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p4.m4.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p4.m4.2">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p4.m4.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p4.m4.3">K</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and hence <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in K" text="v element-of K" xml:id="S9.p4.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:sat_pi"/>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="H\subseteq K" text="H subset-of-or-equals K" xml:id="S9.p4.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and the other set inclusion follows by symmetry. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="H=K" text="H = K" xml:id="S9.p4.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="H\mapsto\pi(H)" text="H maps-to pi * H" xml:id="S9.p4.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p4.m8.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p4.m8.1">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is injective.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S9.p5">
        <p>To see that <Math mode="inline" tex="H\mapsto\pi(H)" text="H maps-to pi * H" xml:id="S9.p5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m1.1">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is onto, let <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S9.p5.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a hereditary, saturated subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S9.p5.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p5.m3.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(\pi^{-1}(G))=G" text="pi * pi ^ (- 1) * G = G" xml:id="S9.p5.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m4.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p5.m4.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m4.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m4.1">G</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, it suffices to show that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi^{-1}(G)" text="pi ^ (- 1) * G" xml:id="S9.p5.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m5.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m5.1">G</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a hereditary, saturated subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{\Lambda}^{0}" text="(tilde@(Lambda)) ^ 0" xml:id="S9.p5.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\pi^{-1}(G)" text="v element-of pi ^ (- 1) * G" xml:id="S9.p5.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m7.1">G</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\in v{\tilde{\Lambda}}" text="lambda element-of v * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S9.p5.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\pi(\lambda))=\pi(r(\lambda))=\pi(v)\in G" text="r * pi * lambda = pi * r * lambda = pi * v element-of G" xml:id="S9.p5.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m9.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p5.m9.4">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m9.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m9.1">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m9.5"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p5.m9.5">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m9.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m9.2">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m9.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m9.3">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S9.p5.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is hereditary, <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\pi(\lambda))=\pi(s(\lambda))\in G" text="s * pi * lambda = pi * s * lambda element-of G" xml:id="S9.p5.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m11.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p5.m11.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m11.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m11.1">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m11.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p5.m11.4">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m11.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m11.2">λ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\lambda)\in\pi^{-1}(G)" text="s * lambda element-of pi ^ (- 1) * G" xml:id="S9.p5.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m12.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m12.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m12.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m12.2">G</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and hence <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi^{-1}(G)" text="pi ^ (- 1) * G" xml:id="S9.p5.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m13.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m13.1">G</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is hereditary. To see <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi^{-1}(G)" text="pi ^ (- 1) * G" xml:id="S9.p5.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m14.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m14.1">G</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is saturated, let <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in{\tilde{\Lambda}}^{0}" text="v element-of (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ 0" xml:id="S9.p5.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="s(v\tilde{\Lambda}^{e_{i}})\subseteq\pi^{-1}(G)" text="s * v * (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ (e _ i) subset-of-or-equals pi ^ (- 1) * G" xml:id="S9.p5.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m16.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p5.m16.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m16.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m16.1">G</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="1\leq i\leq k" text="1 less= i less= k" xml:id="S9.p5.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Then</p>
        <equation xml:id="S9.Ex1">
          <Math mode="display" tex="s(\pi(v)\iota(\Lambda^{\leq e_{i}}))=s(\pi(v)\pi(\tilde{\Lambda}^{e_{i}}))=\pi%&#10;(s(v\tilde{\Lambda}^{e_{i}}))\subseteq G." text="s * pi * v * iota * Lambda ^ (absent less= e _ i) = s * pi * v * pi * (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ (e _ i) = pi * s * v * (tilde@(Lambda)) ^ (e _ i) subset-of-or-equals G" xml:id="S9.Ex1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S9.Ex1.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S9.Ex1.m1.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S9.Ex1.m1.3.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S9.Ex1.m1.3.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S9.Ex1.m1.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.Ex1.m1.1">v</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S9.Ex1.m1.3.1.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S9.Ex1.m1.3.1.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S9.Ex1.m1.3.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S9.Ex1.m1.3.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S9.Ex1.m1.2"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.Ex1.m1.2">v</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S9.Ex1.m1.3.2.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S9.Ex1.m1.3.2.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S9.Ex1.m1.3.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S9.Ex1.m1.3.3">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S9.Ex1.m1.3.3.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S9.Ex1.m1.3.3.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>But <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S9.p5.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is saturated in <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(\Lambda^{0})" text="iota * Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S9.p5.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m19.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p5.m19.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and hence <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(v)\in G" text="pi * v element-of G" xml:id="S9.p5.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m20.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m20.1">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Now <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in\pi^{-1}(G)" text="v element-of pi ^ (- 1) * G" xml:id="S9.p5.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m21.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m21.1">G</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as needed, and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi^{-1}(G)" text="pi ^ (- 1) * G" xml:id="S9.p5.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m22.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m22.1">G</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is saturated. It follows that <Math mode="inline" tex="H\mapsto\pi(H)" text="H maps-to pi * H" xml:id="S9.p5.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p5.m23.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p5.m23.1">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is onto.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S9.p6">
        <p>Finally, <Math mode="inline" tex="H\mapsto\pi(H)" text="H maps-to pi * H" xml:id="S9.p6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p6.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p6.m1.1">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a lattice isomorphism because <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{1}\subseteq H_{2}" text="H _ 1 subset-of-or-equals H _ 2" xml:id="S9.p6.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(H_{1})\subseteq\pi(H_{2})" text="pi * H _ 1 subset-of-or-equals pi * H _ 2" xml:id="S9.p6.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p6.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p6.m3.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p6.m3.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p6.m3.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S9.p7">
      <p>The next lemma is a generalisation of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 5.4]</cite> to graphs with possible sources.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:ideal-gen" xml:id="S9.Thmthm2">
      <tags>
        <tag>Lemma 9.2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">9.2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 9.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 9.2</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S9.Thmthm2.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S9.Thmthm2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a hereditary, saturated subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="\Lambda^{0}" text="Lambda ^ 0" xml:id="S9.Thmthm2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="J_{G}" text="J _ G" xml:id="S9.Thmthm2.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be the ideal of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="(KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S9.Thmthm2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.Thmthm2.p1.m4.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.Thmthm2.p1.m4.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.Thmthm2.p1.m4.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.Thmthm2.p1.m4.1">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> generated by <Math mode="inline" tex="\{p_{v}:v\in G\}" text="conditional-set@(p _ v, v element-of G)" xml:id="S9.Thmthm2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.Thmthm2.p1.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.Thmthm2.p1.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.Thmthm2.p1.m5.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.Thmthm2.p1.m5.2">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
<!--  %**** String Line 1525 **** -->Then</text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq-is-ideal" xml:id="S9.E1">
          <tags>
            <tag>(9.1)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">9.1</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="J_{G}={\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}:\alpha,\beta\in%&#10;\Lambda,s(\alpha)=s(\beta)\in G\}." text="J _ G = span@(s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *) colon list@(alpha, beta) element-of Lambda, s * alpha = s * beta element-of G)" xml:id="S9.E1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
