        </equation>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S9.p8">
        <p>Denote the right-hand side of (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq-is-ideal"/>) by <Math mode="inline" tex="J" text="J" xml:id="S9.p8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. For <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in G" text="v element-of G" xml:id="S9.p8.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, taking <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha=\beta=v" text="alpha = beta = v" xml:id="S9.p8.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> shows <Math mode="inline" tex="p_{v}\in J" text="p _ v element-of J" xml:id="S9.p8.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="J_{G}" text="J _ G" xml:id="S9.p8.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is contained in the ideal generated by <Math mode="inline" tex="J" text="J" xml:id="S9.p8.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. But each <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}\in J" text="s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *) element-of J" xml:id="S9.p8.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is in <Math mode="inline" tex="J_{G}" text="J _ G" xml:id="S9.p8.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> because <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}=s_{\alpha}p_{s(\alpha)}s_{\beta^{*}}" text="s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *) = s _ alpha * p _ (s * alpha) * s _ (beta ^ *)" xml:id="S9.p8.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S9.p8.m9.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p8.m9.1">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq-is-ideal"/>) will follow if <Math mode="inline" tex="J" text="J" xml:id="S9.p8.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is an ideal. To see this, let <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\mu}s_{\nu^{*}}\in\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\Lambda)" text="s _ mu * s _ (nu ^ *) element-of (KP _ R)@(Lambda)" xml:id="S9.p8.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p8.m11.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p8.m11.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p8.m11.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p8.m11.1">Λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}\in J" text="s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *) element-of J" xml:id="S9.p8.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\mu}s_{\nu^{*}}s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}\neq 0" text="s _ mu * s _ (nu ^ *) * s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *) not-equals 0" xml:id="S9.p8.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\alpha)=r(\nu)" text="r * alpha = r * nu" xml:id="S9.p8.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p8.m14.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p8.m14.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p8.m14.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p8.m14.2">ν</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and by Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor-altKP3'"/>, <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\mu}s_{\nu^{*}}s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}=\sum_{(\gamma,\delta)\in\Lambda^{%&#10;\min}(\nu,\alpha)}s_{\mu\gamma}s_{(\beta\delta)^{*}}" text="s _ mu * s _ (nu ^ *) * s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *) = (sum _ (open-interval@(gamma, delta) element-of Lambda ^ minimum * open-interval@(nu, alpha)))@(s _ (mu * gamma) * s _ ((beta * delta) ^ *))" xml:id="S9.p8.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p8.m15.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p8.m15.2"/>

                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S9.p8.m15.3"/>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p8.m15.3">ν</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p8.m15.4">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p8.m15.5"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S9.p8.m15.5">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. For any nonzero summand, <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\delta)=s(\alpha)\in H" text="r * delta = s * alpha element-of H" xml:id="S9.p8.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p8.m16.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p8.m16.1">δ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p8.m16.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p8.m16.2">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> implies <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\delta)=s(\gamma)\in G" text="s * delta = s * gamma element-of G" xml:id="S9.p8.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p8.m17.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p8.m17.1">δ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p8.m17.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p8.m17.2">γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> since <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S9.p8.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is hereditary. Thus each <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\mu\gamma}s_{(\beta\delta)^{*}}\in J" text="s _ (mu * gamma) * s _ ((beta * delta) ^ *) element-of J" xml:id="S9.p8.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S9.p8.m19.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S9.p8.m19.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and hence <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\mu}s_{\nu^{*}}s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}\in J" text="s _ mu * s _ (nu ^ *) * s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *) element-of J" xml:id="S9.p8.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as well. Similarly <Math mode="inline" tex="s_{\alpha}s_{\beta^{*}}s_{\mu}s_{\nu^{*}}\in J" text="s _ alpha * s _ (beta ^ *) * s _ mu * s _ (nu ^ *) element-of J" xml:id="S9.p8.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and it follows that <Math mode="inline" tex="J" text="J" xml:id="S9.p8.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is an ideal.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_prop" inlist="thm theorem:prop" labels="LABEL:MOrita-graded" xml:id="S9.Thmthm3">
      <tags>
        <tag>Proposition 9.3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">9.3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Proposition 9.3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Proposition 9.3</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S9.Thmthm3.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="L" text="L" xml:id="S9.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be
the lattice isomorphism from the ideals of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S9.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.Thmthm3.p1.m2.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.Thmthm3.p1.m2.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1">
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> to the ideals of
<Math mode="inline" tex="B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S9.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1">
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> induced by the Morita context of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:m_context"/>.</text></p>
        <enumerate xml:id="S9.I1">
          <item labels="LABEL:MOrita-graded-a" xml:id="S9.I1.i1">
            <tags>
              <tag>(1)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 1</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S9.I1.i1.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">Then </text><Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S9.I1.i1.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is a graded ideal of </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S9.I1.i1.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S9.I1.i1.p1.m2.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S9.I1.i1.p1.m2.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S9.I1.i1.p1.m2.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S9.I1.i1.p1.m2.1">
                            <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> if and only if </text><Math mode="inline" tex="L(I)" text="L * I" xml:id="S9.I1.i1.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S9.I1.i1.p1.m3.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.I1.i1.p1.m3.1">I</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is a graded ideal of </text><Math mode="inline" tex="B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S9.I1.i1.p1.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S9.I1.i1.p1.m4.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S9.I1.i1.p1.m4.1">
                            <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">.</text></p>
            </para>
          </item>
          <item labels="LABEL:MOrita-graded-b" xml:id="S9.I1.i2">
            <tags>
              <tag>(2)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">2</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 2</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S9.I1.i2.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">Let </text><Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S9.I1.i2.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> be a hereditary, saturated subset of </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{\Lambda}}^{0}" text="(tilde@(Lambda)) ^ 0" xml:id="S9.I1.i2.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">. Then
</text><Math mode="inline" tex="L(I_{H})=J_{\pi(H)}." text="L * I _ H = J _ (pi * H)" xml:id="S9.I1.i2.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S9.I1.i2.p1.m3.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S9.I1.i2.p1.m3.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S9.I1.i2.p1.m3.2.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S9.I1.i2.p1.m3.2.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S9.I1.i2.p1.m3.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.I1.i2.p1.m3.1">H</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"></text></p>
            </para>
          </item>
        </enumerate>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S9.p9">
        <p>(<ref labelref="LABEL:MOrita-graded-a"/>) Here <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S9.p9.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p9.m1.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p9.m1.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S9.p9.m1.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p9.m1.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="B({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S9.p9.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>

                  <XMRef idref="S9.p9.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p9.m2.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are graded by the subgroups</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_gather" xml:id="A0.EGx22">

        <p>respectively. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="m\in M" text="m element-of M" xml:id="S9.p9.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

              </XMApp>

          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="n\in N" text="n element-of N" xml:id="S9.p9.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="M" text="M" xml:id="S9.p9.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="N" text="N" xml:id="S9.p9.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are submodules of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S9.p9.m7">
            <XMath>

                  <XMRef idref="S9.p9.m7.2"/>

            </XMath>
          </Math>, we can write <Math mode="inline" tex="m=\sum m_{i}" text="m = sum@(m _ i)" xml:id="S9.p9.m8">

      </para>
      <para xml:id="S9.p10">
        <p>Now suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S9.p10.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a graded ideal of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S9.p10.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p10.m2.2"/>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S9.p10.m2.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p10.m2.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. To check that <Math mode="inline" tex="L(I)=NIM" text="L * I = N * I * M" xml:id="S9.p10.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p10.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p10.m3.1">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is graded it suffices to check that every element of <Math mode="inline" tex="L(I)" text="L * I" xml:id="S9.p10.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>

                  <XMRef idref="S9.p10.m4.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p10.m4.1">I</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a sum of elements in <Math mode="inline" tex="\cup_{j}(L(I)\cap B({\tilde{\Lambda}})_{j})" text="union _ j (L * I intersection B * (tilde@(Lambda)) _ j)" xml:id="S9.p10.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="union" role="ADDOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p10.m5.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p10.m5.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S9.p10.m5.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p10.m5.1">I</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>

                      <XMApp>

                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S9.p10.m5.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S9.p10.m5.2">
                                <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                                <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>

                          </XMDual>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in I" text="x element-of I" xml:id="S9.p10.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and write <Math mode="inline" tex="x=\sum x_{l}" text="x = sum@(x _ l)" xml:id="S9.p10.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> where each <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{l}\in I\cap\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})_{l}" xml:id="S9.p10.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">KP</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S9.p10.m8.1">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. For an element <Math mode="inline" tex="y=nxm\in L(I)" text="y = n * x * m element-of L * I" xml:id="S9.p10.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p10.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p10.m9.1">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we have
<Math mode="inline" tex="y=\sum_{i,j,l}m_{i}x_{l}n_{j};" text="y = (sum _ (list@(i, j, l)))@(m _ i * x _ l * n _ j)" xml:id="S9.p10.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S9.p10.m10.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S9.p10.m10.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S9.p10.m10.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S9.p10.m10.2"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S9.p10.m10.3"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p10.m10.1">i</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p10.m10.2">j</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>

                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
each <Math mode="inline" tex="m_{i}x_{l}n_{j}\in I\cap\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})_{i+j+l}=I\cap B%&#10;({\tilde{\Lambda}})_{i+j+l}" xml:id="S9.p10.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

              <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>

                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S9.p10.m11.1">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="L(I)" text="L * I" xml:id="S9.p10.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p10.m12.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p10.m12.1">I</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a graded ideal of <Math mode="inline" tex="B({\tilde{\Lambda}})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S9.p10.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMRef idref="S9.p10.m13.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p10.m13.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The other direction follows in the same way.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S9.p11">
        <p>(<ref labelref="LABEL:MOrita-graded-b"/>) By <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="ACaHR" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lemma 5.4]</cite>,
<Math mode="inline" tex="I_{H}={\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{t_{\alpha}t_{\beta^{*}}:\alpha,\beta\in{%&#10;\tilde{\Lambda}},s(\alpha)=s(\beta)\in H\}" text="I _ H = span@(t _ alpha * t _ (beta ^ *) colon list@(alpha, beta) element-of tilde@(Lambda), s * alpha = s * beta element-of H)" xml:id="S9.p11.m1">

        <p>Consider a term <Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\lambda}t_{\mu^{*}}t_{\alpha}t_{\beta^{*}}t_{\sigma}t_{\tau^{*}}" text="t _ lambda * t _ (mu ^ *) * t _ alpha * t _ (beta ^ *) * t _ sigma * t _ (tau ^ *)" xml:id="S9.p11.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>

            </XMath>
          </Math> as in (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq-mess"/>). By three applications of Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor-altKP3'"/>,</p>

            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle t_{\lambda}(t_{\mu^{*}}t_{\alpha})(t_{\beta^{*}}t_{\sigma})t_{%&#10;\tau^{*}}=\sum_{(\gamma,\delta)\in\Lambda^{\min}(\mu,\alpha)}\ \sum_{(\xi,\eta%&#10;)\in\Lambda^{\min}(\beta,\sigma)}t_{\lambda}t_{\gamma}(t_{\delta^{*}}t_{\xi})t%&#10;_{\eta^{*}}t_{\tau^{*}}" text="t _ lambda * t _ (mu ^ *) * t _ alpha * t _ (beta ^ *) * t _ sigma * t _ (tau ^ *) = (sum _ (open-interval@(gamma, delta) element-of Lambda ^ minimum * open-interval@(mu, alpha)))@((sum _ (open-interval@(xi, eta) element-of Lambda ^ minimum * open-interval@(beta, sigma)))@(t _ lambda * t _ gamma * t _ (delta ^ *) * t _ xi * t _ (eta ^ *) * t _ (tau ^ *)))" xml:id="S9.Ex5.m3">

                      <XMApp rpadding="5.0pt" scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid9"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S9.Ex5.m3.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S9.Ex5.m3.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

        </equationgroup>
        <p>For each summand <Math mode="inline" tex="t_{\lambda}t_{\gamma}t_{\rho}t_{\epsilon^{*}}t_{\eta^{*}}t_{\tau^{*}}" text="t _ lambda * t _ gamma * t _ rho * t _ (epsilon ^ *) * t _ (eta ^ *) * t _ (tau ^ *)" xml:id="S9.p11.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we have <Math mode="inline" tex="r(\delta\rho)=r(\xi\epsilon)=s(\alpha)\in H" text="r * delta * rho = r * xi * epsilon = s * alpha element-of H" xml:id="S9.p11.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p11.m4.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p11.m4.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p11.m4.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S9.p11.m4.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p11.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p11.m4.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S9.p11.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is hereditary, <Math mode="inline" tex="s(\rho)=s(\epsilon)\in H" text="s * rho = s * epsilon element-of H" xml:id="S9.p11.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p11.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p11.m6.1">ρ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S9.p11.m6.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S9.p11.m6.2">ϵ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus, from (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq-mess"/>),</p>
        <equation xml:id="S9.Ex7">
          <Math mode="display" tex="L(I_{H})={\operatorname{\mathrm{span}}}\{t_{\lambda}t_{\tau^{*}}:\lambda,\tau%&#10;\in{\tilde{\Lambda}},r(\lambda),r(\tau)\in\iota(\Lambda^{0}),s(\lambda)=s(\tau%&#10;)\in H\}" text="L * I _ H = span@(t _ lambda * t _ (tau ^ *) colon list@(lambda, tau) element-of tilde@(Lambda), r * lambda, r * tau element-of iota * Lambda ^ 0, s * lambda = s * tau element-of H)" xml:id="S9.Ex7.m1">

        <p>(the above shows the inclusion <Math mode="inline" tex="\subseteq" text="subset-of-or-equals" xml:id="S9.p11.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and the reverse inclusion is trivial). But <Math mode="inline" tex="B(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="B * tilde@(Lambda)" xml:id="S9.p11.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p11.m8.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S9.p11.m8.1">
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Lambda" role="UNKNOWN">Λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
is the subalgebra of <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{KP}_{R}(\tilde{\Lambda})" text="(KP _ R)@(tilde@(Lambda))" xml:id="S9.p11.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S9.p11.m9.2"/>

          </Math> generated by <Math mode="inline" tex="\{q_{\iota(v)},t_{\iota(\mu)},t_{\iota(\nu)^{*}}:v\in\Lambda^{0},\lambda,\mu%&#10;\in\Lambda\}" text="conditional-set@(list@(q _ (iota * v), t _ (iota * mu), t _ (iota * nu ^ *)), formulae@(v element-of list@(Lambda ^ 0, lambda), mu element-of Lambda))" xml:id="S9.p11.m10">

            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus
